Speaker: none
English: language_id

Speaker: CamTarget1
English: Revered.

Speaker: CamTarget1
English: Exalted.

Speaker: CamTarget1
English: Wise.

Speaker: CamTarget1
English: This is what we owls aspire to be.

Speaker: CamTarget1
English: Over the centuries, <30>we have<nl>worked hard to build up the<nl>respect that people have for us.
Translation: Mendeetan zehar, <30>gogor<nl>lan egin diagu ingurukoek<nl>diguten errespetua irabazteko.

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: And as times get harder, you too,<30><nl>as my student, <30>shall carry the weight<nl>of owlhood upon your shoulders.
Translation: Eta garai zailak iritsi ahala, hik ere, <30><nl>nire ikasle haizenez, <30>hire honztasunaren<nl>pisua bizkar gainean eraman beharko duk.

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: I can see that you are<nl>already a fine young owl,<30> <b>Otus<b>.
Translation: Ikusten diat dagoeneko<nl>hontz gazte eder bat haizela,<30> <b>Otus<b>.

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: In time, I will mold you<nl>into the spitting image of myself!

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: No need to look so nervous!

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: This is a great moment for you!

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: Despite being born as a mute,<20><nl>under my tutelage you will become<nl>one of the pillars of our community!
Translation: Mutu jaio bahintzen ere,<20><nl>nire babespean gure komunitateko<nl>zutabe bilakatuko haiz!

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: Well, I see there's plenty<nl>we will have to work on.
Translation: Tira, ikusten diat<nl>lan asko dugula aurretik.

Speaker: YoungMentor
English: Do not worry, <30>I will straighten you out!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I'll be honest with you, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You haven't been doing<nl>too well in your studies at all.

Speaker: Mentor
English: So I've been thinking that perhaps<30><nl>your talents simply lie elsewhere.
Translation: Hortaz, bururatu zaidak, agian,<30><nl>hire talentua beste nonbait egongo dela.

Speaker: Mentor
English: So today we'll be doing some flying.
Translation: Beraz, gaur hegan egingo diagu tarte batez.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I bet you've been looking<nl>forward to this for a while!
Translation: Ziur une honen zain<nl>egon haizela luzaroan!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Good!<20> Then listen closely.

Speaker: Mentor
English: All you need to do is to<nl><b>jump<b> off the ground.
Translation: Gauza bat besterik ez duk<nl>egin behar: <b>jauzi<b>.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Then, when you're in mid-air,<nl>spread your wings and flap them.
Translation: Eta behin airean haizela, zabaldu<nl>hegoak eta hegan egin.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The owl cloak I gave you<nl>should take care of the rest.
Translation: Eman diadan hontz-kapak<nl>egin beharko likek beste guztia.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Go, Otus!<20> Show me what you can do!
Translation: Tirok, Otus!<20> Erakutsidak zertarako gai haizen!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Why so nervous, Otus?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Of course, you have every reason to be!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You want to know truth?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You mute!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Wouldn't be able to tell anyone anyway!

Speaker: Professor
English: The truth about you?

Speaker: Professor
English: Are you sure you want to hear it?

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus! Don't stray!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I need a word with you, Otus.<nl>Land here beside me.
Translation: Hirekin hitz egin behar diat, Otus.<nl>Lurreratu hemen, nire alboan.

Speaker: Mentor
English: NOW!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Alright, you're flying!<nl><30>Now, try and move around a bit!
Translation: Oso ondo, hegan habil!<nl><30>Orain, saiatu pixka bat mugitzen!

Speaker: Mentor
English: See that platform up there?

Speaker: Mentor
English: Fly up there and land on that island,<nl><30>then I'll teach you the real tricks.
Translation: Egin hegan haraino eta lurreratu uhartean,<nl><30>gero benetako trikimailuak erakutsiko dizkiat.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Hmmm, well, Otus... <30><nl>That was some terrible flying.
Translation: Mmm, begira, Otus... <30><nl>Aspaldi ez nuela halako hegaldi kaxkarrik ikusten.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I have to say, I'm <40>really disappointed.<nl><30>Most students pick this up instantly.
Translation: Aitortu behar diat, <40>oso dezepzionatuta nagok.<nl><30>Ikasle gehienek lehenengoan lortzen ditek.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Tomorrow we'll go back to normal studies.

Speaker: Mentor
English: It pains me to see such inept flying.
Translation: Horren hegakera traketsa ikusteak min ematen zidak.

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Quickly, Otus, they are short on water in Vellie!
Translation: Bizkor, Otus, <20>ia ez ditek urik Vellien!<40>

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: People need our help!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: The drought isn't as patient<nl>with your sluggishness as I am!
Translation: Lehorteak ez dik nik besteko pazientziarik<nl>hire moteltasunarekin!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Why have you left the<nl>water jug on the ground?!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Pick it up immediately!<nl>Hurry up!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Hang on...

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: You've been sloshing the jug around!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Let me check if there's any water left.
Translation: Utzidak ikusten ea urik gelditzen den.

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Put the jug down here.

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Hey! <30>Stop fooling around!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Put the jug down over here!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Place the jug here, next to me!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Are you blind?! <30>Put it down there!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: NO!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: I told you to put it down,<nl>not to smash it!
Translation: Hemen uzteko esan diat,<nl>ez hona botatzeko!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: How are we supposed to bring<nl>water to the villagers now?!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: I will not forget this!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: And I will make sure that<nl>the others are aware of what<nl>your incompetence has cost us!
Translation: Eta neu arduratuko nauk<nl>beste denei ere esaten,<nl>jakin dezaten hire inkonpetentziak<nl>zer kalte egin digun!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Do you understand?!

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: I cannot describe how<nl>disappointed I am in you, Otus.
Translation: Ezin diat azaldu zenbat<nl>dezepzionatu nauan, Otus.

Speaker: PickupMentor
English: Leave me. <30>I will bring water to Vellie myself.
Translation: Utz nazak. <30>Neronek eramango diat ura Velliera.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: Otus, you have failed me again<30> and again<30> and again.
Translation: Otus, huts egin didak,<30> behin<30> eta berriro<30> eta berriro.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: Today there are no lessons.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: All you need to do today<30><nl>is to talk to the other villagers.
Translation: Gaur egin behar duan bakarra<30><nl>herritarrekin hitz egitea duk<30>.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: Simple enough, right?<nl><30>Even for you.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: Have them tell you what they<nl>think of you<30> and your i<2>n<2>e<2>p<2>t<2>i<2>t<2>u<2>d<2>e<10>.
Translation: Galdetuiek ea zer iritzi duten hitaz<nl>eta hire <30> i<2>n<2>u<2>t<2>i<2>l<2>i<2>d<2>a<2>d<2>e<2>a<2>z<10>.

Speaker: CoolMentor
English: Don't come back until you<nl>know what you need to know.
Translation: Ez etorri bueltan<nl>jakin beharrekoa jakin gabe<30>.

Speaker: Mentor
English: <b>[1]Otus!<b>

Speaker: Mentor
English: [1]OTUS!!!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Finally awake,<nl>are you?

Speaker: Mentor
English: We are going to be late!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Good thing I came here to wake you,<nl>or you would have slept for another hour!
Translation: Eskerrak iratzartzera etorri naizena,<nl>edo beste ordubete emango huke lotan!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Get out of bed immediately<nl>and meet me outside.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Welcome, Master Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...I wanted to speak with you and Geddy.
Translation: ... zurekin eta Geddyrekin hitz egin nahi nuen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think it is time to<20> discuss a few things.
Translation: Uste dut badela garaia<20> gauza batzuez eztabaidatzeko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...And<30> I also thought you might<nl>both need someone to talk to.
Translation: ...Eta<30> gainera pentsatu dut agian zuek ere<nl>hitz egiteko norbait beharko duzuela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Ah, Master Otus,<30> Master Geddy.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Forgive me for hiding in your home, Otus.
Translation: Barkadazu zure etxean ezkutatu izana, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It would do no good if the locals saw<nl>you fraternizing with a former pirate.
Translation: Iruditu zitzaidan ez litzatekeela egokia izango<nl>herritarrek zu pirata ohi baten lagun gisa ikustea.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Especially after <30>what has happened.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Advent is destroyed,<30> and <30>there<nl>was nothing we could do to stop it.
Translation: ...Abendu suntsitua dago,<30> eta <30>ezin<nl>genezakeen ezer egin ekiditeko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Molstrom, <30>and the pirates, <30><nl>why would they do such a thing?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alphonse?.. <30>Is there<nl>something you're not telling us?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ALPHONSE!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If you know something, <30>ANYTHING,<nl><30>that can aid us against Molstrom..!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...It might help us prevent<nl>yet another attack on <b>Vellie<b>!
Translation: ...Agian beste eraso bat saihets<nl>genezake, <b>Vellie<b>ren aurkako bat!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: You are most certainly right, Master Geddy.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Molstrom<15>.<15>.<15>. <60>The pirates<15>.<15>.<15>. <60>And myself.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We were all <15>c<3>r<3>e<3>a<3>t<3>e<3>d <45>by the <b>Owls<b>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: WHAT!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Your mentor is right, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Molstrom is gathering ancient <b>owl relics<b>.
Translation: Molstrom antzinako <b>hontzen erlikiak<b> biltzen ari da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And when he gets them all,<nl>he will be unstoppable.
Translation: Eta guztiak eskuratzen dituenean,<nl>geldiezina izango da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I will tell you what I know...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Wait, so... <30>You're saying the pirates<nl>destroyed Advent just to get the relic?
Translation: Itxaron, orduan... <30>Esan nahi duzu Abendu erlikia bat<nl>eskuratzeko soilik suntsitu zutela?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Yes, Master Geddy. <30><nl>And now, <30>only <b>one remains<b>.
Translation: Bai, Maisu Geddy. <30><nl>Eta orain, <30><b>bakarra<b> geratzen da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If he gets the <15>third and <15>final Relic, <nl><30>I'm afraid Molstrom will be unstoppable.
Translation: Molstromek <15>hirugarren eta <15>azken Erlikia bereganatzen badu,<nl><30>zoritxarrez uste dut geldiezina izango dela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is there nothing we can do?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There is, but...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...I admit I am hesitant.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: My suggestion to try to stop the pirates<nl>in Advent put your lives in danger.
Translation: Abendun piratak geldiarazteko egin nuen iradokizunak<nl>zuen biziak arriskuan jarri zituen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps <30>it would be best if we didn't<nl>try to meddle with the pirates anymore.
Translation: Agian <30>hobe litzateke ez bagina<nl>gehiago piraten bidean gurutzatuko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The pirates are threatening Vellie!<nl><30>We have to try and stop them!
Translation: Piratek Vellie mehatxupean daukate!<nl><30>Haiek geldiarazten saiatu beharra dugu!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What happened in Advent wasn't your fault!
Translation: Abendun gertatu zena ez zen zure errua izan!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I screwed up most of all! <60>My sole<nl>duty was to protect us from pirates!
Translation: Nik hondatu nuen guztia! <60>Nire egiteko bakarra<nl>zuok piratengandik babestea zen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If we don't fight back against the pirates,<nl><60>I can't ever make things right!
Translation: Eta ez badiegu piratei kontra egiten,<nl><60>ezingo dut inoiz egindakoa zuzendu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The pirates' next destination<nl>will be a ruin<20> called the <b>Floating Continent<b>.
Translation: Piraten hurrengo helburua<nl><b>Kontinente Hegalaria<b> deituriko hondakinak dira.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: In an ancient owl structure there, the owls<nl>hid the last relic that Molstrom needs.
Translation: Han ezkutatu zuten hontzek Molstromek behar duen<nl>azken erlikia, antzinako egitura batean.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We must leave Vellie, and fly high up into <b>Strato<b>.
Translation: Vellietik alde egin behar dugu, eta <b>Strato<b>raino igo..

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That is where we will find the Floating Continent.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Then we should go to <b>Strato<b> now!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's the only way we can save Vellie.
Translation: Vellie salbatzeko dugun modu bakarra da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I shall be in hiding here<nl>until you get out of the village.
Translation: Hemen ezkutatuko naiz<nl>zuek herritik irten arte.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alright, Otus, you ready?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's go!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! <30>You're awake!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm sorry, Otus...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I should never have left you guys alone.
Translation: Ez zintuzketet inoiz bakarrik utzi beharko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: As soon as I got back to Vellie,<nl>I knew I'd made a mistake.
Translation: Velliera itzuli bezain laster,<nl>ohartu nintzen eginiko akatsaz.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That Twig guy, he was just<nl>being used by the pirates.
Translation: Twig hori, piratek euren<nl>intereserako baliatzen zuten.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I knew that,<30> but...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think I wanted someone<nl>to blame<20> after Advent.
Translation: Uste dut errudun bat behar<nl>nuela<20> Abendukoa eta gero.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I made my way up to the pirates<nl>and went looking for you straight away.
Translation: Piratenganaino igotzea lortu nuen<nl>eta berehala zure bila hasi nintzen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Stole a pirate chopper and everything.
Translation: Helikoptero pirata bat ere lapurtu nuen, pentsa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm glad I made it in time.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Molstrom seemed furious...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But enough about this.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Twig! <30>Alphonse!<30> Otus is awake!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Get in here!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Welcome back, Otus!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: You've been asleep for so long now!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I want to talk about what to do next, guys.
Translation: Mutilak, gure hurrengo ekintzetaz hitz egin behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, <30>Alphonse says he<nl>saw someone fly off with the Relics.
Translation: Otus, <30>Alphonsek dio norbait<nl>ikusi zuela erlikiekin hegan ihes egiten.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed. <30>And that someone went flying up <b>past Mesos<b>.
Translation: Hain zuzen ere. <30>Eta norbait hori <b>Mesos baino haratago<b> joan zen hegan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We haven't figured out who took the relics, yet, <30>but.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Oraindik ez dakigu nork hartu zituen erlikiak, <30>baina.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...But whoever took them must<nl>have been behind all of this.
Translation: ...Baina edonor dela ere,<nl>guzti honen atzean egon behar du.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The pirates were being fed<nl>information about the Relics.
Translation: Piratek nonbaitetik jasotzen zuten<nl>erlikiei buruzko informazioa.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Someone told them to search<nl>in Vellie,<30> and in Advent.
Translation: Norbaitek esan zien<nl>Vellien bilatzeko,<30> eta Abendun.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It would seem that whoever led<nl>them to attack these settlements...
Translation: Balirudike piratak asentamenduok erasotzera<nl>bideratu zituen ezezagun hark...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Have now finally gotten the Relics they wanted.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: So the pirates were just being used?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Serves'em right!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed... But whoever did this must<nl>expect Molstrom to retaliate.
Translation: Ondo merezia dutenez... Baina hau egin duenak<nl>badaki Molstromek kontraerasoa joko duela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: They must be planning to use the Relics soon.
Translation: Erlikiak luze gabe erabiltzeko asmoa izango du.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: With the power of the Relics, they<nl>might escape even Molstrom's wrath.
Translation: Erlikien boterearekin, baliteke<nl>Molstromen haserreari ere izkin egitea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is there any way we can get to them before that happens?
Translation: Ba al dugu beregana hori gertatu aurretik iristeko modurik?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I don't know...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's impossible to fly past the Mesosphere.
Translation: Ezinezkoa da Mesosferatik haratago hegan egitea.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We would have to find some way to travel up there.
Translation: Hara gora bidaiatzeko eraren bat aurkitu beharko genuke.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: With Advent destroyed, finding a ship won't be easy...
Translation: Abendu suntsitua delarik, ez da erraza izango ontzi bat aurkitzea...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Well, let's start looking.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: There's gotta be some way!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There's one more thing, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't be too disappointed when we get to Vellie.
Translation: Ez zaitez gehiegi desengainatu Velliera joatean.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Things have<20> changed a bit.

Speaker: Toby
English: You owls sure are hard-workin'!

Speaker: Toby
English: Strix's students are scurrying about<nl>keeping watch, all the way from <b>Advent<b>...
Translation: Strixen ikasleak <b>Abendu<b>tik honaino harrapaladan<nl>etortzen dituk zaintza lanetarako...

Speaker: Toby
English: ...And here you are too!

Speaker: Toby
English: I prefer to relax in my hot spring!
Translation: Nik nahiago diat ur termaletan erlaxatzea!

Speaker: Toby
English: Heheheh!

Speaker: Toby
English: Yer' turnin' a little red there lad!
Translation: Tomateak bezain gorri ari haiz jartzen, mutil!

Speaker: Toby
English: I guess you're not as thick skinned as old Toby here.
Translation: Antza ez duk Toby xaharrak bezain azal lodia.

Speaker: Toby
English: Even the <b>big-ol pirate capt'n<b><nl>would rust up in these here waters!
Translation: Ur hauetan <b>pirata kapitain zaharra<b> bera ere<nl>herdoiluko lukek!

Speaker: Toby
English: Yer' not doing bad in this heat lad!

Speaker: Toby
English: I guess you might be as thick skinned as old Toby here.
Translation: Antza Toby xaharrak bezain azal lodia duk.

Speaker: Toby
English: Even the <b>big-ol pirate capt'n<b><nl>would rust up in these here waters!
Translation: Ur hauetan <b>pirata kapitain zaharra<b> bera ere<nl>herdoiluko lukek!

Speaker: Toby
English: Heheheh!

Speaker: Toby
English: With age, you'll endure plenty of hard times lad.
Translation: Zahartu ahala, une zailak bizi beharko dituk, mutil.

Speaker: Toby
English: You'll get tougher and tougher each day out there!
Translation: Egunetik egunera gogortuz joango haiz hor kanpoan!

Speaker: Toby
English: Not me tho'!

Speaker: Toby
English: I've been in this spring my entire life!

Speaker: Toby
English: Heheheh!

Speaker: Toby
English: What's wrong, Otus?

Speaker: Toby
English: Did Strix's students do somethin'?

Speaker: Toby
English: Don't mind them, Otus!

Speaker: Toby
English: They're just trying to get you down.
Translation: Hi zirikatzea besterik ez ditek nahi.

Speaker: Toby
English: Here, just soak a bit in the hot spring.<nl>That'll make you feel better.
Translation: Hator, beratu pixkat ur berotan.<nl>Honek goxatuko hau.

Speaker: Toby
English: That's the way, Otus!

Speaker: Toby
English: The hot spring won't make yer' troubles go away, but...
Translation: Ur termalak ez ditik arazoak deusezten, baina...

Speaker: Toby
English: ...Everything will pass.

Speaker: Toby
English: And when we're in here, hard<nl>times don't feel quite as bad.
Translation: Eta hemen barruan, une<nl>latzenek ez ziruditek horren txarrak.

Speaker: Toby
English: Oh, Mandolyn got mugged?

Speaker: Toby
English: No? Someone frightened her, then?

Speaker: Toby
English: Well, maybe you want to<nl>relax here for a while.
Translation: Tira, agian une batez<nl>hemen erlaxatu nahiko duk.

Speaker: Toby
English: I guess Asio has dragged you<nl>out of town at last, eh Otus?
Translation: Azkenean Asiok herritik kanpora<nl>atera hauela, e?

Speaker: Toby
English: Ah, I remember when I was out exploring the world.
Translation: Ai, gogoan diat mundua arakatzera irten ninduan garaia.

Speaker: Toby
English: It's been so long...

Speaker: Toby
English: Don't forget that you're always welcome in Vellie.
Translation: Ez ahaztu Vellien beti izango haizela ongi etorria.

Speaker: Toby
English: And if you ever need a bath,<nl>feel free to use my hot spring!
Translation: Eta inoiz bainu bat hartu nahi baduk,<nl>erabili nire iturria beldur gabe!

Speaker: Toby
English: Otus!

Speaker: Toby
English: Glad to see you're awake!

Speaker: Toby
English: Geddy's around here somewhere.<nl><40>Probably by the <b>graveyard<b>.
Translation: Geddy hemen inguruan zebilek.<nl><40>Seguruenera <b>hilerrian<b> egongo duk.

Speaker: Toby
English: Oh!<20> I forgot!

Speaker: Toby
English: There was a big, red, posh guy checking<nl>on you before the others came back.
Translation: Tipo handikote, gorri, dotore bat etorri duk<nl>hire bila besteak iritsi aurretik.

Speaker: Toby
English: He skedaddled when I came back<nl>to check on you.
Translation: Ziztu bizian alde egin dik hi nola hagoen<nl>ikustera itzuli naizenean.

Speaker: Toby
English: Someone you know?

Speaker: Toby
English: Come to rest up in my hot spring?

Speaker: Toby
English: Oh, Geddy? If he wasn't with you,<nl>he's probably headed to the <b>graveyard<b>.
Translation: O, Geddy? Ez bazagok hirekin,<nl>orduan <b>hilerrira<b> joango zuan.

Speaker: Toby
English: Found Geddy, have ya?

Speaker: Toby
English: Good.<30> I'm sure he's hurting like the rest of us.
Translation: Ondo.<30> Ziur beste guztiok bezain minduta dagoela.

Speaker: Toby
English: We need to take care of each other.

Speaker: Toby
English: I'm glad you're looking after him.
Translation: Pozten naik bera zaintzen ari haizela jakiteak.

Speaker: Toby
English: Want to relax a bit here?

Speaker: Toby
English: This hot spring takes away old aches.
Translation: Iturburu termal honek zauri zaharrak sendatzen dizkik.

Speaker: Toby
English: It might help you recover.

Speaker: Toby
English: Feeling a little down, Otus?

Speaker: Toby
English: Try soaking in the hot spring for a while.
Translation: Probatu iturriko ur termaletan beratzen aldi batez.

Speaker: Toby
English: Can't guarantee it'll help,<nl>but it's something.
Translation: Ez diat bermatuko funtzionatuko duenik,<nl>baina ez dik kalterik egingo.

Speaker: Toby
English: Back already, Otus?

Speaker: Toby
English: You're out there explorin' the world, aren't you?
Translation: Hor zehar mundua arakatzen habil, eztok?

Speaker: Toby
English: Aw, how I wish I could go with you!

Speaker: Toby
English: There's nothing like the feeling<nl>of the wind on a new horizon!
Translation: Ez zagok zerumuga berri bateko haizea<nl>sentitzea bezalakorik!

Speaker: Toby
English: I used to travel all the time!

Speaker: Toby
English: Ah, I miss those days...
Translation: Bai, faltan botatzen ditiat garai haiek...

Speaker: Toby
English: Still, no journey beats soaking in the hot spring!
Translation: Halere, etzagok iturri termaleko uretan<nl>beratzen egotea gaindituko duen bidaiarik!

Speaker: Toby
English: You should persuade some of the<nl>Adventians to try my hot spring.
Translation: Abendutar horietakoren bati nire ur termalak<nl>probatzeko gomendatu beharko hiokek.

Speaker: Toby
English: Can't have'em missing out<nl>on the best part of Vellie!

Speaker: Toby
English: You're looking for Geddy, huh?

Speaker: Toby
English: Sometimes we have to give people time.
Translation: Batzuetan denbora eman behar izaten zioagu elkarri.

Speaker: Toby
English: Everyone's discussing whether<nl>we should stay here or evacuate.
Translation: Denak ari dituk eztabaidan,<nl>hemen gelditu edo ebakuatu beharko ote genukeen.

Speaker: Toby
English: Ya know, before the pirates find us.

Speaker: Toby
English: I think I'll join them if they evacuate.
Translation: Uste diat besteekin joango naizela ebakuatzen badute.

Speaker: Toby
English: I used to travel.

Speaker: Toby
English: Maybe I'll get to see some more great things.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Leave me, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I don't want to see you here again.
Translation: Ez haut hemen berriro ikusi nahi.

Speaker: Asio
English: Despite everything, <30>you have been a remarkable student, Otus.
Translation: Gertatua gertatu, <30>aparteko ikaslea izan haiz, Otus.

Speaker: Asio
English: Courage is a trait lost on most Owls.
Translation: Adorea hontz gehienek galdutako ezaugarria duk.

Speaker: Asio
English: Vellie has been abandoned.

Speaker: Asio
English: The pirates are likely to attack here next.
Translation: Seguruenera hau izango duk piraten hurrengo helburua.

Speaker: Asio
English: I'm going to stay here in Vellie.

Speaker: Asio
English: This is <b>our home<b>.

Speaker: Asio
English: You're<10>.<10>.<10>. leaving again now..?

Speaker: Asio
English: I'll wait for you here.

Speaker: Asio
English: If there's anything I can help you with...

Speaker: Asio
English: Then let me know.

Speaker: Asio
English: A way to get beyond the Mesosphere..?

Speaker: Asio
English: I'm not sure.

Speaker: Asio
English: Maybe you can ask the Professor.

Speaker: Asio
English: I don't like to admit it, but...

Speaker: Asio
English: ...He would probably know better than me.

Speaker: Asio
English: Be careful out there, Otus.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, hi Otus!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Keeping watch today?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I hear there's been a<nl><b>troublemaker<b> lurking about...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I r<5>e<5>a<5>l<5>l<5>y<10> hope it's not a pirate!
Translation: B<5>e<5>n<5>e<5>t<5>a<5>n<10> espero dut ez dela pirata bat izango!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I've heard so many horror stories about pirates.
Translation: Istorio izugarriak entzun ditut piratei buruz.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: There's <15>even rumours of a... <30><b>h<5>u<5>m<5>o<5>n<5>g<5>o<5>u<5>s<b> one!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: How can their ships stay afloat<nl>if there're pirates like that?
Translation: Nola egiten dute haien ontziak ez hondoratzeko<nl>halako piratak existitzen badira?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Haha, but we're safe here in Vellie!
Translation: Jaja, baina hemen, Vellien, babesturik gaude!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Just... try not to play around too much, right Otus?
Translation: Soilik... saiatu hemendik asko ez urruntzen, ados, Otus?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: We'll be fine as long as you stay focused!
Translation: Ez da ezer txarrik gertatuko arretaz ibiliz gero!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Is Geddy working on the cannon today?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: He seems so responsible after<nl>his military training in <b>Advent<b>!
Translation: Mutil arduratsua bihurtu da <b>Abendu<b>n<nl>trebatze militarra egin zuenetik!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: He's way more confident than he used to be.<nl><30>It's like he's a different person!
Translation: Lehen baino konfidantza gehiago du bere buruarengan.<nl><30>Beste norbait dela dirudi!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Not that it matters to me, <15>of <15>course.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: La, la, la!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, how I'd love to perform in <b>Advent<b> one day!
Translation: Oi, nola gustatuko litzaidakeen noizbait <b>Abendu<b>n jotzea!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I hope I can go there soon!<nl>There's so much to see in <b>Advent<b>!
Translation: Espero dut laster joan ahalko naizela hara!<nl>Hainbeste dago ikusteko <b>Abendu<b>n!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Maybe Asio will take you there too, Otus!
Translation: Agian Asiok eramango zaitu bertara zu ere, Otus!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Try to make him proud today!
Translation: Saia zaitez gaur zutaz harro egon dadin lortzen!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Hey, Otus! <30>I was thinking of making some<nl>pie for the village later on.
Translation: Aupa, Otus! <30>Uste dut geroxeago<nl>herri osoarentzat pastelak egingo ditudala.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Maybe <30>Geddy would like to come t<10>o<10>o<10>?
Translation: Baliteke <30>Geddyk ere zatitxo bat probatu nahi i<10>z<10>a<10>t<10>e<10>a<10>?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'll make plenty, just in case! Hee hee!
Translation: Badaezpada ere pare bat gehiago egingo ditut! Ji ji!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I should create a new song!
Translation: Abesti berri bat sortu beharko nuke!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: There's a nice breeze today.
Translation: Ze haize leun gozagarria gaur dagoena!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I like my guitar.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: La, la, la, la.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Dumdi, dumdi, dum.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Hi, Geddy...<40> and Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, Mandolyn. Seen any troublemakers around?
Translation: Kaixo, Mandolyn. Ikusi al duzu bazter-nahaslerik inguruan?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: No,<20> but I'm glad you're watching out for them.
Translation: Ez,<20> baina lasaitzen nau jakiteak<nl>zuek bazterrok zaintzen ari zaretela.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: With Strix's students here,<nl>there are so many owls around!
Translation: Strixen ikasleak ere hemen daudenetik,<nl>hontz ugari daude inguruan!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yup, but me and Otus here's gonna take<nl>care of any trouble, not those slackers!
Translation: Bai, baina Otus eta biok izango gara arazoetaz<nl>arduratuko garenak, ez nagi horiek!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We're a dream team!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm glad you're having fun.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Just watch out for ginormous pirates now, <15>you <15>hear!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, how terribly frightening!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You have to catch that trouble maker!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Please, Otus!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Please stop that trouble maker!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: So you and Geddy will be heading off to <b>Advent<b>?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Are you going to be OK?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm sure you will be!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You're a bit clumsy,<nl>but together you can do it!
Translation: Apur bat baldarrak zarete,<nl>baina elkarrekin, lortuko duzue!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I guess Advent won't be safe for a while...
Translation: Suposatzen dut Abendu ez dela leku segurua uneotan...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'll have to put off my vacation there.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, but what am I talking about?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: The most important thing is that you two are OK.
Translation: Garrantzitsuena da zuek biok ondo zaudetela.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Do your best so Asio won't get all cranky again!
Translation: Ahalegindu zaitez Asio umore petralez egon ez dadin lortzen!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Shouldn't you be going, Otus?
Translation: Ez zenuke jada irtena beharko, Otus?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Asio is depending on you...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: So many people lost their homes...
Translation: Hainbeste jende gelditu da etxe gabe...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: We have to do our best to<nl>help them settle here in Vellie...
Translation: Gure esku den guztia egin behar dugu<nl>Vellien etxean bezala senti daitezen...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh! But you should rest until<nl>you've recovered, Otus!
Translation: O! Baina atseden hartu behar zenuke<nl>guztiz indarberritu arte, Otus!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You still look a little frail.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I... <30>I really hope Geddy is OK.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I've never seen him this... <30>distraught.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Ever since I met him, he's always been the <b>happy guy<b>, you know?
Translation: Ezagutu nuen unetik, beti izan da <b>tipo alaia<b>, ulertzen?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: The guy that makes you want to... <30>play a litte melody.
Translation: Ikusten dudanero sorrarazten dit gogoa... <30>abesti bat kantatzeko.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm sorry Otus, I'm just a little worrier, <15>ha<15>ha.
Translation: Sentitzen dut, Otus, gutxi behar dut kezkatzen hasteko, <15>ja<15>ja.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Hi, Geddy!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Are you and Otus doing okay?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You went through a lot...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't worry about us, Mandolyn.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We have to help receive the refugees.
Translation: Errefuxiatuei harrera egiten lagundu behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is there anything we can do to help?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: .<5>.<5>.<20>I think the two of you should take some time to recover.
Translation: .<5>.<5>.<20>Uste dut zuek indarberritzeko astia hartu behar duzuela.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Let the rest of us take care of things for a while.
Translation: Utzi besteoi egin beharrekoaz arduratzen aldi batez.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Fly around a bit and take your mind off things!
Translation: Egin hegan apur batez, eta hartu atseden!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: How does that sound?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh... Yeah...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You heard her, Otus! Let's explore a bit on our own!
Translation: Entzun diozu, Otus! Goazen gure kabuz esploratzera!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Just relax, you two!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Leave it all to us while you recover!
Translation: Gu arduratuko gara guztiaz zuek suspertu artean!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Geddy!<10> Otus!<10> How are you two?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You've been away for a while...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Are you staying safe?
Translation: Ez zarete nahasteren batean sartuta ibiliko, ezta?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Safe? Umm...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Er... Um...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Of course!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We wouldn't get ourselves into trouble, Mandolyn.
Translation: Ez gara nahasteetan sartu zaleak, Mandolyn.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't worry about us. The pirates<nl>seem to have left for now.
Translation: Ez zaitez gugatik kezkatu. Badirudi<nl>piratek ospa egin dutela, oraingoz.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Mostly.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Good!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I hope you stay for a while,<10> now that you're here.
Translation: Espero dut tarte batez hemen geratuko zaretela,<10> etxera itzuli zaretenez.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Things are getting better here,<nl>now that everyone's settling in.
Translation: Gauzak hobera doaz hemen,<nl>eta mundu guztia egoera berrira moldatzen dabil.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Hmmm, I need to figure out what to cook today.
Translation: Mmmm, gaur jateko zer prestatu pentsatu behar dut.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: There are lots of mouths to feed!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Hey Otus.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Um...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Geddy dropped by and picked up<nl>his things, and then he left...
Translation: Geddy hemendik pasa da bere<nl>gauzak jasotzera, gero alde egin du...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Are...<20> are you two,<10> well,<10> OK?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: He seemed to be really angry about something...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm sure whatever happened,<nl>you did the right thing.
Translation: Ziur naiz, gertatu zena gertatu zela ere,<nl>zuk ondo jokatu duzula.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: We all know that you always mean well, Otus.
Translation: Denok dakigu bihotz onekoa zarela, Otus.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Don't worry, Geddy probably<nl>just has some thinking to do.
Translation: Ez kezkatu, Geddyk seguruenera<nl>hausnartu beharra dauka.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You two are friends!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, you're looking for a way into Mesos?
Translation: Oi, Mesosera igotzeko bide baten bila zabiltza?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I don't know about that, but Bomboman might!
Translation: Nik ez dakit, baina agian Bombomanek ezagutuko du baten bat!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: His family lives in Mesos.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hi, little Otus!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Looking for pirates?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: I think I seen some.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Saw them west, at <b>lookout point<b>.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Maybe check it out.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Also, <30>there be <b>troublemaker<b> around village.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Is not you, <30>is it?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Somebody is stealing my bongos!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Don't be slacking off now!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hm, I think I need new bongos.
Translation: Mm, bongo berriak behar ditudala uste diat.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Maybe I get some in <b>Advent<b>.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Big bongos!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Maybe little Otus will go there some day!
Translation: Agian Otus txikia hara joango duk noizbait!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Life is full of music, Otus.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: All you need to do, <30>is stop and listen!
Translation: Egin behar duan bakarra, <30>gelditu eta entzutea duk!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Like so!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: That is my original song!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: A bombo song!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Don't get distracted by my drums, Otus!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You have job to do!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: ...Alright, I play my Bombo song again for you.
Translation: ...Ongi duk, nire Bombo-abestia joko diat berriro hiretzat.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go. Song for you!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Now back to work!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Listen to the beat, Otus man!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Bom bom bom!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Feel the rhythm.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go. Song for you!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Otus look sad.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Do something wrong again?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Drum a song to make Otus feel better.
Translation: Abesti bat joko diat Otus hobeto sentitzeko.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go. Song for you!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Keep spirits up!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hurry, little Otus!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Must chase troublemaker!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Bomboman would go, but<nl>can't fly on my own!
Translation: Bomboman joango lukek, baina<nl>etzekik hegan egiten!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Counting on you!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Mmmm...

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You going to Advent now?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Bom bom bom!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Remember, Asio is harsh, but he means well.
Translation: Gogoan izan, Asio gogorra duk, baina bihotz onekoa.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You two will stop the pirates,<nl>Bomboman knows it.
Translation: Zuok biok geldiaraziko dituzue piratak, <nl>Bombomanek badaki.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Then Vellie will be safe.
Translation: Eta Vellie salbu izango da berriz.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: So little Otus is going to Advent...

Speaker: Bomboman
English: I'll play song for good luck!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hm... Maybe I should make new one soon.
Translation: Mm... Agian abesti berri bat sortu beharko nikek.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Glad to see you safe, little Otus.
Translation: Pozten naik zu onik ikusteak, Otus txikia.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Heard you were very brave in Advent.
Translation: Entzun diat Abendun oso ausarta izan hintzela.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Don't push yourself too hard.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: We must all help out now.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Must build new houses for refugees.<nl>Then keep Vellie safe.
Translation: Etxe berriak eraiki beharra zagok errefuxiatuentzat.<nl>Eta Vellie babesturik mantendu.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: If pirates come here,<nl>we must be ready.
Translation: Piratak hona etortzen badituk,<nl>gertu egon behar diagu.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: I play song to keep spirits up!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go. Song for morale!
Translation: Hori izan duk dena. Adorearen abestia!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hmm... Must find new song to play.
Translation: Mmm... Abesti berri bat behar diat.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: More cheerful one!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Little Otus is doing his best to help too.
Translation: Otus txikia ere laguntzeko ahal duen guztia egiten ari duk.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Bomboman knows.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You didn't get those bruises from playing.
Translation: Ez dituk zauri horiek jolasean egin.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Just stay safe, you hear?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Bomboman can't protect you outside Vellie.
Translation: Bombomanek ezin hau Vellietik kanpo babestu.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Let me play my song for you again.
Translation: Berriro joko diat nire abestia hiretzako.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Good luck, little Otus.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Geddy didn't look happy<nl>when he dropped by, Otus.
Translation: Geddyk ez zirudian pozik<nl>bisitan etorri zenean, Otus.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hope you didn't do something bad.
Translation: Espero diat ez huela ezer txarrik egingo.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Friends are important.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Don't lose them.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You going to Mesos?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: That's where I grew up.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Some hidden tunnels lead up there.
Translation: Ezkutuko tunel batzuk zeudek<nl>haraino heltzen direnak.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: You should find them in<nl>the east of the Tropos layer.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: I play a song to guide you!
Translation: Abesti bat joko diat hi gidatzeko!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: There you go! Song for guidence.

Speaker: Professor
English: Confound it! <30>I can't make sense of it!

Speaker: Professor
English: The only thing the pirates seems to have<nl>disturbed here in Vellie <30>is this ruin.
Translation: Piratek Vellien gauza bakarra ukitu<nl>dutela dirudi... <30>hondakin hau.

Speaker: Professor
English: They destroyed <b>Advent<b> in minutes.
Translation: <b>Abendu<b> erabat suntsitu zuten minutu gutxiren buruan.

Speaker: Professor
English: If only our plan had worked, <nl><30>the pirates would have been stopped.
Translation: Gure planak funtzionatu izan balu, <nl><30>piratak geldiaraztea lortuko genuke.

Speaker: Professor
English: Geddy says the wind machinery was never even active.
Translation: Geddyk dio haize-makineria ez zela inoiz martxan egon.

Speaker: Professor
English: Then, <45>how come the islands are still shifting<30>.<30>.<30>?
Translation: Orduan, <45>nola azaldu uharteak oraindik mugitzen aritzea<30>.<30>.<30>.?

Speaker: Professor
English: No matter, <30>the pirate threat is far greater!
Translation: Bost axola horrek orain, <30>piraten mehatxua inoiz baino handiagoa da!

Speaker: Professor
English: There must have been something<nl>inside this ruin that the pirates wanted.
Translation: Hondakin honen barruan piratek<nl>nahi zuten zerbaitek egon behar zuen.

Speaker: Professor
English: That stubborn old fool Asio knows<nl>something, <30>but he won't tell me.
Translation: Asio burugogor txoropito hark<nl>badaki zerbait, <30>baina ez dit ezer esan nahi.

Speaker: Professor
English: Could it have been some<nl>powerful old owl artifact?
Translation: Agian antzinako hontzen artefaktu<nl>boteretsuren bat izango da?

Speaker: Professor
English: Why won't Asio just cooperate?!
Translation: Zergatik ez du lagundu nahi Asiok?

Speaker: Professor
English: The pirates didn't come here<nl>to destroy Vellie, that's for sure.
Translation: Piratak ez ziren etorri hona<nl>Vellie suntsitzera, hori argi dago.

Speaker: Professor
English: The only thing they destroyed was this ruin.
Translation: Suntsitu zuten gauza bakarra hondakin hau izan zen.

Speaker: Professor
English: The owls used to make all kinds<nl>of stuff so advanced I can't comprehend it.
Translation: Hontzek tramankulu aurreratu mordoa<nl>sortu zituzten, niretzat ulertezinak direnak.

Speaker: Professor
English: Whatever was in here, it was important<nl>enough that they prioritized coming<nl>here over going to Advent...
Translation: Hemen zegoena zegoela ere, garrantzitsua<nl>behar zuen izan, Abendura baino<nl>lehen hona etortzeko...

Speaker: Professor
English: Confound it! I can't make sense of it!

Speaker: Professor
English: The only thing the pirates seems to have<nl>disturbed in Vellie is this ruin.
Translation: Piratek Vellien gauza bakarra ukitu<nl>dutela dirudi... hondakin hau.

Speaker: Professor
English: Yet... <30>They destroyed <b>Advent<b> in minutes.
Translation: Aldiz... <b>Abendu<b> erabat suntsitu zuten minutu gutxiren buruan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Asio was saying something about<nl><b>relics<b>. He said there was one in Vellie<nl>and one in Advent.
Translation: Asiok <b>erlikia<b> batzuk aipatu zituen.<nl>Esan zuen haietako bat Vellien zegoela,<nl>eta beste bat Abendun.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Does that mean anything to you?

Speaker: Professor
English: Relics..?

Speaker: Professor
English: I don't know what he means by that.
Translation: Ez dakit zer esan nahiko duen horrekin.

Speaker: Professor
English: But it's as I thought!

Speaker: Professor
English: He knows something!

Speaker: Professor
English: If only our plan had worked, <30><nl>the pirates would have been stopped.
Translation: Gure planak funtzionatu izan balu, <30><nl>piratak geldiaraztea lortuko genuke.

Speaker: Professor
English: You say the wind machinery was never active?
Translation: Beraz, haize-makineria ez da inoiz martxan egon?

Speaker: Professor
English: Then, <45>how come the islands are still shifting<30>.<30>.<30>.
Translation: Orduan, <45>nola azaldu uharteak oraindik mugitzen aritzea<30>.<30>.<30>.?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Professor, <30>don't you think the pirate threat is more pressing?
Translation: Irakaslea, <30>ez duzu uste garrantzitsuagoa dela piraten mehatxuari erantzutea?

Speaker: Professor
English: Yes, yes, <30>of course, Geddy.

Speaker: Professor
English: Let me know if you discover anything else.

Speaker: Professor
English: I'll stay here and keep researching.

Speaker: Professor
English: Let me know if you discover anything else.

Speaker: Professor
English: I'll stay here and keep researching.

Speaker: Professor
English: Remember to say goodbye to everyone, Otus.
Translation: Ez ahaztu lagun guztiak agurtzeaz, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: This will be dangerous, and...

Speaker: Professor
English: ...You probably won't be back for a while.

Speaker: Professor
English: I suppose I should bid you farewell, too.
Translation: Suposatzen dut nik ere ikusi arte esan beharko nizuekela.

Speaker: Professor
English: We all know that you've been trying<nl>your best all this time, Otus.
Translation: Guztiok dakigu eginahal guztiak<nl>egin dituzula beti, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: I hope this time it goes well for you.

Speaker: Professor
English: With how things are looking, we might<nl>not have all that much time left.
Translation: Gauzak nola dauden ikusita, baliteke<nl>denbora askorik ez izatea.

Speaker: Professor
English: ...Good luck, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: Don't go until you're ready.

Speaker: Fib
English: Get out of our way, Otus!

Speaker: Fib
English: Can't you see we're doing<nl>important business here!?
Translation: Ez al duk ikusten gai garrantzitsuak<nl>ari garela lantzen hemen!?

Speaker: Fib
English: Gah, Otus, you're cramping my style!
Translation: Hara, Otus, nire estiloa hondatzen ari haiz!

Speaker: Fib
English: Get, go on, get outta here!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Get out of our way, Otus!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Can't you see we're doing<nl>important business here!?
Translation: Ez al duk ikusten gai garrantzitsuak<nl>ari garela lantzen hemen!?

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Gah, Otus, you're cramping my style!
Translation: Hara, Otus, nire estiloa hondatzen ari haiz!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Get, go on, get outta here!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey man! Keeping watch today?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe you want to do something later?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: <b>Otus and Geddy, <30>the unstoppable team<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe we should take that<nl>trip to <b>Advent<b> today!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Lemme know when you're done for the day!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll be here fixing this cannon.<nl>Gotta be prepared for anything, right?
Translation: Hemen egongo naiz kanoi hau konpontzen.<nl>Edozertarako prest egon behar dugu, ezta?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh, <30>by the way!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There seems to be a <30><b>troublemaker<b> <30>around Vellie.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Well, if you see that rascal,<nl>come get me, <30>alright?
Translation: Malapartatu hori ikusten baduzu,<nl>zatoz nire bila, <30>ados?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus and Geddy, <30><b>keepers of peace<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think I like the ring of that better!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OK, <30>s<5>o<5>o<5>n<5> done here Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I can't wait to go to <b>Advent<b>!<nl>I should totally shop for a new blaster pistol!
Translation: Desiratzen nago <b>Abendu<b>ra joateko!<nl>Pistola berria erosi beharko nuke!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll let you know once I'm done here, OK?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Haha, <30>you're persistent, aren't you?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alright, alright! <30>Just do your rounds and then we'll go!
Translation: Ados, ados! <30>Amaitu zure erronda eta abiatuko gara!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If we're quick, maybe we could catch<nl>the theatre while we're in <b>Advent<b>!
Translation: Bizkor bagabiltza, agian <b>Abendu<b>n<nl>antzokira joan ahalko gara!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Any second now!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Just a little bit more.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I like my hammer.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I like fixing stuff.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, come back later! Asio might get mad!
Translation: Otus, itzuli beranduago! Asio haserretuko da azkenean!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Worky, worky!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: La, la, la, la.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Shoo Otus, I gotta concentrate!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Soon done here!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Leaving town, eh?

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Try not to cause any trouble.

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: You've caused enough of that<nl>here, wouldn't you agree?
Translation: Nahikoa arazo sortu duk<nl>hemen, ez duk uste?

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Heheh!

Speaker: GuardRight
English: That's right!

Speaker: Fib
English: What's up, Solus?

Speaker: Fib
English: Going to patrol for pirates today?

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Or are you going to run away if you see anything?
Translation: Ala ospa egingo duk ikusten dituanean?

Speaker: Fib
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Umph!

Speaker: Fib
English: Look at this guy,<30> he can't<nl>even stay on his feet!
Translation: Begira tipo honi,<30> ez duk<nl>zutik mantentzeko gauza!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: YOU BRATS AGAIN!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are you OK, man?

Speaker: Owlboy
English: T-Thank you.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You're one of Strix's students?<nl><30>I haven't met you before.
Translation: Strixen ikasleetariko bat zara?<nl><30>Ez zaitut inoiz inguruan ikusi.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: A-Ah. Yes.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: B-Bonacci and Fib are my c-classmates.
Translation: B-Bonacci eta Fib nire k-klasekideak dira.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Your name's Solus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Listen, they were having a go<nl>at Otus here earlier too.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If they give you any trouble,<nl>just yell for us.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: T-Thanks, you g-guys!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: T-They're right though,<40> I'm a c-c-coward.
Translation: B-Baina egia diote,<40> k-k-koldar hutsa naiz.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't say stuff like that about yourself, man.
Translation: Ez esan horrelakorik zuri buruz, lagun.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Listen, why don't we-

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: [1]EEEEK!!!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: [1]Someone! [1]Help!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: <b>Mandolyn<b>!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh no! It's the <b>troublemaker<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Quick Solus, call for help!<nl>Me and Otus will chase him down!
Translation: Arin, Solus, eskatu laguntza!<nl>Otus eta biok bere atzetik joango gara!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, pick me up, and <b>let's go<b>!

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: G<30>-Good luck!

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Urk!

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Don't do that again, please.
Translation: Ez ezazu berriro hori egin, mesedez.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I haven't slept properly since<nl>before the pirate attack.
Translation: Ez dut behar bezala lo egin<nl>piratek eraso zigutenetik.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I wish I had a bed.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Oh yeah, if you see my daughter,<nl>tell her dinner will be late...
Translation: Oi bai, nire alaba ikusten baduzu,<nl>esaiozu gaur berandu afalduko dugula...

Speaker: Sleepy
English: That's if she finds her way back at all.
Translation: Baldin etxera bueltako bidea inoiz aurkitzen badu.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Man, I wish that guy would stop<nl>playing the drums all the time.
Translation: Motel... Nahiago nuke tipo horrek<nl>danborrak jotzeari utziko balio.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I haven't been kept awake this much since...
Translation: Ez dut lo egin ezinik hainbeste denbora eman ez dakit noiztik...

Speaker: Sleepy
English: ...<20>Well, ever since I had Pipp<nl>I guess haven't slept much.
Translation: ...<20>Tira, Pipp jaio zenetik<nl>ez dut lo askorik egin.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: At least in Advent I could<nl>catch up on sleep at work...
Translation: Gutxienez Abendun banuen aukerarik<nl>lo-kuluxka egiteko lanean nengoela.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Oh yeah, you seem like a nice kid,<nl>so maybe I can ask you a favour.
Translation: Oi bai, mutil atsegina dirudizu,<nl>agian fabore bat eska diezazuket.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Could you please not wake me up when I'm sleeping?
Translation: Inoiz lo hartzea lortzen badut, ez nazazu esnatu, ados?

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Thanks.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: So...

Speaker: Sleepy
English: You woke me up again.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I guess you're not a nice kid after all.
Translation: Ba agian ez zara horren mutil atsegina, azken finean.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Don't take it personally.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: It just means you're like everyone else.
Translation: Beste guztiak modukoa zarela esan nahi du, soilik.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Still here?

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Please stop waking me up.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Your friend ran off, huh?
Translation: Zure lagunak ihes egin du, ezta?

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Well, I don't know either<nl>of you too well, but...
Translation: Beno, ez zaituztet biotako bat ere<nl>ondo ezagutzen, baina...

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Maybe it's for the best, you know?

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I mean, most people are pretty annoying.
Translation: Diodana da jende gehiena nahiko gogaikarria dela.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Now you can get some peace.
Translation: Orain bake apur bat izango duzu.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: A way into the pirate base?

Speaker: Sleepy
English: I don't know, I've lived<nl>in Advent my entire life.
Translation: Ez dakit, bizi osoan<nl>Abendun bizi izan naiz.

Speaker: Sleepy
English: Ask someone else.

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: My beautiful house in Advent is lost...

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: My aviary, and my paintings...

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: Only I and Chirpy made it out!
Translation: Txito eta biok soilik salbatu ginen!

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: My relatives said they'd escape eastward.
Translation: Nire senideek ekialderantz ihes egitea erabaki zuten.

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: I hope they made it out before<nl>the pirate captain appeared...
Translation: Espero dut pirata kapitaina<nl>agertu aurretik irtetea lortuko zutela...

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: Oh, Chirpy...

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: Will we ever get out of this hopeless little village..?
Translation: Irtengo al gara inoiz etorkizunik gabeko herrixka honetatik...?

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: I <30>miss Advent so much<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: We need to evacuate this<nl>shoddy little town at once!
Translation: Herri kaskar hau berehala<nl>ebakuatu behar dugu!

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: All this talk of rebuilding is nonsense!
Translation: Berreraikitzeari buruzko ideia hori erokeria da!

Speaker: BirdGuy
English: We need to get as far away<nl>from the pirates as we can!

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Hmm...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Oh, I don't believe we've met.
Translation: Oi, ez dut uste elkar ezagutzen dugunik.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Forgive me, I have to make<nl>sure I don't miss any shipments.
Translation: Barkadazu, bidalketak ondo<nl>iritsi direla egiaztatu behar dut.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I'm grateful that I have<nl>been allowed to stay in Vellie.
Translation: Eskerturik nago, Vellien gelditzeko<nl>aukera eman zaidalako.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: We'll have to do our best to help the village grow.
Translation: Ahal dugun guztia egin beharko dugu<nl>herrixka hazten laguntzeko.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: We only have enough supplies<nl>for about a week or so...
Translation: Oraingoz astebete ingururako<nl>beharrezko hornigaiak baino ez ditugu...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: We'll either have to plant<nl>new crops or evacuate...
Translation: Uzta berriak landatzen ez baditugu,<nl>ebakuatu beharra izango dugu...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I think my work might go faster if I<nl>didn't have this big owl shouting at me.
Translation: Uste dut bizkorrago lan egingo nukeela<nl>alboan niri oihuka hontz handi hau ez banu.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: But I don't want to create any conflict.
Translation: Baina ez dut gatazkarik sortu nahi.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Perhaps I should just pretend to listen when he speaks..?
Translation: Agian hitz egiten duenean entzungo banu bezala egitea da onena...?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Some distressed fellow went by here.
Translation: Gazte samindu bat igaro da lehen hemendik.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: He had the same uniform as the city guards.
Translation: Hiriko guardek darabilten uniforme bera zeraman jantzita.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Friend of yours?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I hope you two figure it out.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Friendships can be tricky things.
Translation: Adiskidetasuna ez da beti gauza erraza.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Evacuate or stay..?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: But where would we evacuate to..?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Oh, excuse me, I was lost in thought.
Translation: Oi, barka, nire pentsamenduetan galdu naiz.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: A way into the pirate base, hmm?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Well, there are some<nl>unexplored paths in Tropos...
Translation: Tira, Troposen badira<nl>arakatu gabe xendra ugari...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Perhaps that would be a good place to start looking?
Translation: Agian leku ona da, bertan bila hasteko.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Otus! You're awake!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm so happy you're OK!
Translation: Asko pozten nau zu ondo ikusteak!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You were all beaten up when I found you!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, this is all so horrible!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Those poor people from Advent! <30>We're<nl>taking as many refugees as we can.
Translation: Abenduko herritar gajoak! <30>Ahal<nl>ditugun errefuxiatu guztiak hartzen gabiltza.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: And luckily, the Owls from Advent are here as well.<30><nl><b>Strix<b> and his students are doing a really good job!
Translation: Eta, zorionez, Abenduko hontzak ere hemen ditugu.<30><nl><b>Strix<b> eta bere ikasleak lan bikaina egiten ari dira!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: We're all doing what we can,<30> but,<30> well...
Translation: Denok gabiltza ahal duguna egiten,<30> baina,<30> tira...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: ...Asio is out by the lookout point, <30>it's just...

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: He's been there for days, <30>and<30><nl>he doesn't speak to anyone.
Translation: Egunak daramatza han, <30>eta<30><nl>ez dio inori erantzuten.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Maybe <20>he'll talk to you, Otus?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Would you mind checking up on him out there?
Translation: Axola zaizu nola dagoen ikustera joatea?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: At this rate, I worry he might<nl>end up leaving the village.
Translation: Honela jarraitzen badu, beldur naiz<nl>ez ote duen herritik alde egingo.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I guess<45> our village has one of those now.
Translation: Antza<45> gure herriak orain hilerri bat dauka.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: We've located it below the village, down there.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh Otus,<15> it's as if the village<nl>has lost all its colours<30> and brightness.
Translation: Oi, Otus,<15> herriak bere koloreak<nl>eta<30> distira galdu balitu bezala da.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I hope everything will turn out alright.
Translation: Espero dut dena ongi amaituko dela.

Speaker: Kid
English: Hi, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: My name is Pipp!

Speaker: Kid
English: What's your name?

Speaker: Kid
English: Can't talk, huh?

Speaker: Kid
English: That's fine!

Speaker: Kid
English: I'll just call you <b>bro<b>!

Speaker: Kid
English: Owl bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: Nice to meet you, owl bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hi, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: I wish I could fly like you!
Translation: Zuk bezala hegan egin nahiko nuke!

Speaker: Kid
English: I would fly everywhere!

Speaker: Kid
English: WHOOOOSH!!!

Speaker: Kid
English: My mom wanted me to come eat dinner?
Translation: Amatxok ni afaltzera joatea nahi zuen?

Speaker: Kid
English: Hmmmm...

Speaker: Kid
English: NAH!

Speaker: Kid
English: I want to stay outside, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: I'll go home when it's bedtime!
Translation: Lotarako ordua denean joango naiz etxera!

Speaker: Kid
English: Maybe a bit after bedtime!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hi!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hmm..!

Speaker: Kid
English: I guess I'll call you<nl>bro<30>.<10>.<10>. and big bro!
Translation: Uste dut detuko zaituztedala...<nl>Txo<30>.<10>.<10>. eta Gizontxo!

Speaker: Kid
English: My name is Pipp!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hi, bro... and big bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: Are you both out doing grown-up stuff?

Speaker: Kid
English: Don't worry!

Speaker: Kid
English: I'll build all the new houses on my own!
Translation: Etxe berri guztiak neuk erakiko ditut!

Speaker: Kid
English: My mom wanted me to come eat dinner?
Translation: Amatxok ni afaltzera joatea nahi zuen?

Speaker: Kid
English: Hmmmm...

Speaker: Kid
English: NAH!

Speaker: Kid
English: I want to stay outside, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: I'll go home when it's bedtime!
Translation: Lotarako ordua denean joango naiz etxera!

Speaker: Kid
English: Maybe a bit after bedtime!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hey, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: Where's big bro?!

Speaker: Kid
English: Did you annoy him until he left?
Translation: Xirikatu egin duzu joan den arte?

Speaker: Kid
English: Don't worry, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: I do that to my mom all the time!
Translation: Gaza bera egiten diot amatxori nik!

Speaker: Kid
English: It's the best!

Speaker: Kid
English: Cheer up, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: You can fly, after all!

Speaker: Kid
English: That's incredible!

Speaker: Kid
English: Big bro's back, huh?

Speaker: Kid
English: Guess I'm no longer your only best friend!
Translation: Orduan ez naiz zure lagun on bakarra!

Speaker: Kid
English: Shared first place!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'm glad we made it back.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'll hide before the villagers see me.
Translation: Ezkutatu egingo naiz herritarrek ikusi baino lehen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: No... wait...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Where is everyone?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Hi there, boy.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: The counterattack on the<nl>pirates didn't go so well, huh?
Translation: Piraten aurkako kontraerasoa<nl>ez zen ongi atera, e?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I suppose I'm to blame for that as well.
Translation: Suposatzen dut nire errua ere badela.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Don't beat yourself up over it. We<nl>have to think about the future now.
Translation: Ez horregatik martirizatu. Orain<nl>etorkizunean pentsatzeko unea da.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Everyone is talking about leaving<nl>Vellie to hide from the pirates.
Translation: Mundu guztia ari da Vellietik irteteaz<nl>hizketan, piratengandik ezkutatzeko.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: They think they'll attack here next.
Translation: Hurrengo erasoa hemen egingo dutela uste dute.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: In my opinion the only way to escape is upwards.
Translation: Nire ustez ihesbide bakarra gorantz igotzea da.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: You'll see what I mean when I<nl>finish my work on this building.
Translation: Ulertuko duzu esan nahi dudana,<nl>eraikin honetako lanak bukatzen ditudanean.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Excuse me, boy, I'm thinking very intently about something.
Translation: Barkatu, mutil, baina hausnarketa betean nabil ideia bat bueltaka.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: And when I do...<30> I DON'T WANT ANY DISTRACTIONS.
Translation: Eta hala nabilenean...<30> EZ DUT INOLAKO DISTRAZIORIK ONARTZEN.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: AT ALL.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I hope you understand.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: If a task doesn't require focus, it's<nl>not worth doing, in my opinion.
Translation: Egiteko batek ez badu kontzentraziorik eskatzen,<nl>ez du egiterik ere merezi, nire ustez.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: ...Hmmm...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Heh heh! I'm nearly done with this building.
Translation: Je je! Ia bukatu ditut eraikineko lanak.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: You don't see what's different about it, do you?
Translation: Ez duzu ikusten zer daukan berezitik, ezta?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Well, art isn't always so easily visible.
Translation: Tira, artea ez da beti erraz ikusten.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Heh heh heh!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: So, here we are.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Remember, there will be no going back.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Are you sure you're ready for this, Otus?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Good!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Excuse us.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We would all like to come along, Madam Kernelle.
Translation: Guk ere berekin joan nahiko genuke, Kernelle andrea.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: That's right!

Speaker: Professor
English: Otus's friends, are you?

Speaker: Professor
English: Wait a second...

Speaker: Professor
English: Aren't you-

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Not now, Professor!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Alphonse is a pirate, and<nl>I caused some trouble here.
Translation: Alphonse pirata bat da, eta<nl>nik arazoak sortu nituen herrian.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: But we're here to help now.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Yes yes, no need for that.
Translation: Bai bai, barka eskeak soberan daude.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: You're all welcome to come along.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: We're all here, so let's get going!
Translation: Denok hemen gaudenez gero, goazen ba!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yes.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Huh?<30> What are we travelling in?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Oh, you'll see.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Professor, is everything ready?

Speaker: Professor
English: Yes.

Speaker: Professor
English: The radar gave us some coordinates<nl>to aim for, so we should make it.
Translation: Radarrak koordenatu batzuk eman dizkigu<nl>apuntatzeko, beraz, lortu beharko genuke.

Speaker: Professor
English: Assuming your invention works, Kernelle.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Excellent.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Oh, I should probably repeat...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: This will be dangerous.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Should we go get Asio and the other villagers?
Translation: Asio eta beste herritarren bila joan beharko genuke?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Then they can see you off.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't think so.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: They might try to stop us.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't think we want to part on bad terms.
Translation: Eta ez dugu txarrean joan nahi.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: ...Alright.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: In that case, it's time to board.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Board? Board what?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Do you mean this tall building here..?
Translation: Hemengo eraikin garai honi buruz ari zara?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Yes!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Get in!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We're travelling in this thing?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: It looks like it can't even move!
Translation: Ez dirudi mugitzeko gai denik ere!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: QUIET, FOOLS!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: YOU ARE ABOUT TO WITNESS MY TRUE GENIUS!
Translation: NIRE BENETAKO TALENTUAREN LEKUKO IZATEAR ZAUDETE!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: YEARS OF WORK WILL ALL BOIL DOWN TO THIS MOMENT!
Translation: URTE LUZEETAKO LANAK ORAIN EMANGO DU BERE FRUITUA!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: GET IN!

Speaker: Professor
English: Better do it lads,<30> before she changes her mind.
Translation: Egiozue kasu, mutilok,<30> iritziz aldatu baino lehen.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: QUICKLY NOW!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Heheheh..!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: IT IS TIME!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: PREPARE YOURSELVES!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: ALL SYSTEMS ARE READY!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: DETACH!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: IGNITION!!!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: LIFTOFF!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: HAHA!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I KNEW IT WOULD WORK!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: GOOD LUCK, YOU GUYS!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Alright.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Let me know when you're prepared.

Speaker: MandolynHouseDoor
English: D-<20>d-<30>don't come any closer, <40>pirate!

Speaker: MandolynHouseDoor
English: Leave us alone!

Speaker: BomboHouseDoor
English: GO AWAY, PIRATE!

Speaker: Strix
English: Ah, Otus!

Speaker: Strix
English: It is good to see you have come to!

Speaker: Strix
English: As you can see, we are trying to cope with the<nl>poor state your <b>mentor<b> has left this village in.
Translation: Ikusten duanez, hire <b>mentoreak<b> herrixka hau<nl>utzi duen egoera kaxkarrari buelta eman nahian gabiltzak.

Speaker: Strix
English: We never allowed such <30>incompetence <15>in Advent!

Speaker: Strix
English: But fret not, little one!

Speaker: Strix
English: With our guidance, we may<nl>get your village up to snuff yet.

Speaker: Strix
English: My students <15><b>Fib<b> and <15><b>Bonacci<b> <15>are highly trained in goods transport.
Translation: Nire ikasleak, <15><b>Fib<b> eta <15><b>Bonacci<b>, <15>ondo trebatuta zeudek merkantzien garraioan.

Speaker: Strix
English: Being <b>Asio's<b> student, I won't burden you<nl>with high priority tasks like transport, <30>Otus.
Translation: Hi <b>Asio<b>ren ikaslea haizenez, ez haut garraioa moduko<nl>lehentasun handiko zereginekin kargatuko, <30>Otus.

Speaker: Strix
English: If there are any easy requests from your<nl>villagers, you may deal with them as you wish.
Translation: Hire herritarrek eskaera errazak egiten<nl>badizkiate, libre haiz nahi bezala laguntzeko.

Speaker: Strix
English: I'm sorry, Otus, I am rather busy at the moment.
Translation: Sentitzen diat, Otus, oso lanpeturik nagok orain.

Speaker: Strix
English: Being <b>Asio's<b> student, I won't burden you with high priority tasks, <30>Otus.
Translation: Hi <b>Asio<b>ren ikaslea haizenez, ez haut<nl>lehentasun handiko zereginekin kargatuko, <30>Otus.

Speaker: Strix
English: If there are any easy requests from your<nl>villagers, you may deal with them as you wish.
Translation: Hire herritarrek eskaera errazak egiten<nl>badizkiate, libre haiz nahi bezala laguntzeko.

Speaker: Strix
English: Oh! You're back, Otus!

Speaker: Strix
English: No need to look so guilty.

Speaker: Strix
English: In fact, from what I hear about you,<nl>it makes things simpler if you, er...
Translation: Entzun, hitaz entzun diadanarekin,<nl>askoz hobe litzatekek hik, zera...

Speaker: Strix
English: ...If you find something to occupy yourself with.

Speaker: Strix
English: When things have cleared up a bit here,<nl>I'll give you some proper instruction.
Translation: Hemen dena argitzen denean,<nl>esango diat nik zer egin.

Speaker: Strix
English: In the meantime,<10> do as you please.

Speaker: Strix
English: I have little time to talk, Otus.
Translation: Hitz egiteko denbora gutxi zaukeat, Otus.

Speaker: Strix
English: Just do what you want.

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: ...Can't believe it...

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: I wonder what the pirates are up to now.
Translation: Zer ote dute piratek esku artean?!

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: I hope they'll just leave us alone from now on.
Translation: Espero dut hemendik aurrera bakean utziko gaituztela.

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: We should evacuate this city.

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: We need to get as far away<nl>from the pirates as possible.
Translation: Piratengandik ahalik urrunen<nl>alde egin behar dugu.

Speaker: MaleSoldier
English: I don't feel safe here.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: Hello...

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: ...Sorry, I would like to be left alone.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: Looking for someone?

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: A guy walked through here earlier,<nl>with the same uniform as us.
Translation: Lehen tipo bat pasa da hemendik,<nl>gurea moduko uniformearekin.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: He left Vellie again though.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: Don't know where he went.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: I think I should leave too.
Translation: Uste dut nik ere ihes egin beharko nukeela.

Speaker: FemaleSoldier
English: I don't belong here, and we can't<nl>defend this little city anyway.
Translation: Hau ez da nire lekua, eta ezin<nl>dugu herrixka hau babestu, edonola ere.

Speaker: hero
English: This way: Vellie Outpost

Speaker: hero
English: This way: Professor's lab

Speaker: hero
English: This way: Vellie

Speaker: hero
English: This way: Shooting Range<nl>Closed for testing.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Everyone!<15><nl>Quiet down!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Is everyone alright?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Everyone's okay.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Strix's students went to track the pirates.
Translation: Strixen ikasleak piraten atzetik joan dira.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: ...<30>I don't think the pirates were here for us.
Translation: ... <30>Ez dut uste piratak gure bila zetozenik.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Then, <30>why did pirates even come here?

Speaker: Professor
English: Listen, all of you. We have no time for this.
Translation: Entzun denok. Ez dugu honetarako astirik.

Speaker: Professor
English: My readings show that the pirates<nl>are heading toward the capital.

Speaker: Toby
English: They're going to attack Advent?!

Speaker: Professor
English: Yes. We need to warn the city, and quickly.
Translation: Bai. Bertakoei jakinarazi behar diegu, eta bizkor.

Speaker: Professor
English: The pirate ships are slow, but they have a head start on us.
Translation: Pirata-ontziak motelak dira, baina dagoeneko aurretik doaz.

Speaker: Mentor
English: In that case, there's no choice. Professor, we'll have<nl>to use the <b>Owl temple<b> as a <b>defence mechanism<b>.
Translation: Hala bada, ez dugu beste irtenbiderik.<nl>Irakasle, <b>Hontzaren Tenplua<b> erabili<nl>behar dugu <b>babes-mekanismo<b> gisa.

Speaker: Professor
English: Ah yes!

Speaker: Professor
English: The Owl temple has been blowing the<nl>islands in the area apart for decades.
Translation: Hontzaren Tenplua inguru honetako uharteak<nl>bata besteagandik bereizten aritu da hamarkada luzez.

Speaker: Professor
English: If we deactivate the wind generators, the islands<nl>will close in on the pirates<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> and [1]<b>crush them<b>!
Translation: Haize-sorgailuak desaktibatzen baditugu,<nl>uharteak elkartzean piratak tartean harrapatu<5>.<5>.<5>.<20><nl>eta [1]<b>zanpatuko dituzte<b>!

Speaker: Professor
English: (Or so I think...)

Speaker: Mentor
English: So perhaps the ancient Owls<nl>can help us protect Advent...
Translation: Beraz, agian antzinako hontzek<nl>Abendu babesten lagun gaitzakete...

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mentor
English: You will go to the Owl temple.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The Professor and I need to go directly to Advent to warn them.
Translation: Irakaslea eta biok zuzenean Abendura joan behar diagu abisu ematera.

Speaker: Mentor
English: ...And no-one else here can fly.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: But does Otus know his way around the temple?
Translation: Baina Otusek ba al daki tenplurako bidea?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That's right!<20> I should join him, Asio!
Translation: Egia da!<20> Berekin joan beharko nuke, Asio!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Alright.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Be warned, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: ...If you disappoint me again, there will be S<2>E<2>R<2>I<2>O<2>U<2>S<2> C<2>O<2>N<2>S<2>E<2>Q<2>U<2>E<2>N<2>C<2>E<2>S<2>!
Translation: ...berriro desengainatzen banauk, O<2>N<2>D<2>O<2>R<2>I<2>O<2> L<2>A<2>R<2>R<2>I<2>A<2>K<2> egongo dituk!

Speaker: Mentor
English: You put our village in danger by leaving your post today.
Translation: Herria arriskupean jarri duk gaur<nl>zaintza postutik alde egin duanean.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Do not do it again.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus, Geddy, Professor.<30><nl>Get ready to leave.

Speaker: AsioAndProfessor
English: Get to the <b>Owl Temple<b> as quickly as you can!

Speaker: AsioAndProfessor
English: Don't disappoint me, <15>Otus!

Speaker: AsioAndProfessor
English: Guards! <30><b>Open the gates<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Finally, the gate is open!<nl><30>Let's get out of here Otus!
Translation: Azkenean, ateak zabalik daude!<nl><30>Irten gaitezen hemendik, Otus!

Speaker: Toby
English: This sauna here sure's nice!<nl>I come here on weekends.<nl>Weekdays too!
Translation: Sauna hau mundiala duk!<nl>Asteburuero etortzen nauk.<nl>Eta astegunero ere bai!

Speaker: Toby
English: I rub my face with Bomboman's<nl>ointments every day! It keeps ya young!<nl>Wish it kept me young too!
Translation: Egunero Bombomanen ukenduak ematen ditiat<nl>aurpegian! Gazte mantentzen haute!<nl>Ai, ni ere gazte mantenduko banindute...!

Speaker: Toby
English: I've forgotten where I live!
Translation: Non bizi naizen ere ahaztu diat!

Speaker: Toby
English: I remember the day you was born!<nl>Heard all about it right<nl>here in this very hot spring!
Translation: Gogoan diat jaio zinen eguna!<nl>Dena hemen kontatu zidatean,<nl>iturri termal honetantxe!

Speaker: Toby
