English: You set any records in your life?<nl>I'm trying for the record in relaxation!
Translation: Inoiz lortu duk errekorrik?<nl>Ni erlaxazioaren errekorra lortu nahian nabilek!

Speaker: Toby
English: At times like these, it's important to relax.
Translation: Hau moduko uneetan, garrantzitsua duk erlaxatzea.

Speaker: Toby
English: Clear your mind, young'un. These are dark times.
Translation: Uxatu pentsamendu txarrak, gazte. Garai latzak dituk hauek.

Speaker: Toby
English: We have to do what we can, Otus.<nl>We have to calm down, and then do what we can.
Translation: Ahal dugun guztia egin behar diagu, Otus.<nl>Lasaitu beharra diagu, eta gero gure esku dagoen guztia egin.

Speaker: Toby
English: If I'm talking to you right now, it's<nl>a bug. Well done! Please report it.
Translation: Une honetan hizketan banabil, errore bat aurkitu duk.<nl>Bejondeiala! Mesedez eman arazoaren berri jokoaren egileei.

Speaker: Toby
English: We're in danger, laddy!<nl>Get your things and escape while you can!
Translation: Arriskuan gaudek, laguntxo!<nl>Har itzak hire gauzak eta egin ihes ahal duan bitartean!

Speaker: Toby
English: This is not the time for<nl>sauna-bathin', laddy! Get to safety!
Translation: Ez duk saunan bainua hartzeko<nl>momentua, laguntxo! Hoa babespera!

Speaker: Toby
English: Is Bomboman alright there?<nl>Was he inside the house?

Speaker: Toby
English: Don't mind me, boy, save yourself!
Translation: Ez nitaz kezkatu, mutil, salba ezak heure burua!

Speaker: Toby
English: Run! Run while you still can!
Translation: Korri! Korri beranduegi izan baino lehen!

Speaker: Mentor
English: About time, Otus.

Speaker: Asio
English: We will be keeping watch over Vellie today.

Speaker: Asio
English: There have been pirates about lately.<nl>You know the drill - <b>report to me or the guards<b><nl>if you see anything suspicious.
Translation: Azkenaldian piratak zabiltzak inguruotan.<nl>Ezagutzen duk protokoloa:<nl>ezer susmagarririk ikusiz gero<nl><b>jakinarazi neuri edo zaindariei<b>.

Speaker: Asio
English: Any questions? <30>No?

Speaker: Asio
English: Then get to it!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Don't zone out!<30><nl>Get up here!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus! Where have you been?!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Get inside, right now!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get into safety Otus!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Ho there! Looks like we've<nl>got a slacker in the village!
Translation: Hi, aizak! Antza denez alferrontzi bat<nl>diagu herrian!

Speaker: GuardRight
English: True that!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Are you the troublemaker that's<nl>been lurking around town, Otus?
Translation: Hi al haiz herria hankaz gora jarri duen<nl>bazter-nahaslea, Otus?

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: You sure look like a troublemaker to me.

Speaker: GuardRight
English: True that!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: I saw Asio on his way to the professor.

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: For someone as strict as Asio,<nl>he sure lets you off easy.
Translation: Bera den bezain zorrotza izateko,<nl>ze bigun jokatzen dian hirekin!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Now, be a good owl and return to your duties.
Translation: Tirok, izan hontz zintzoa eta itzul hadi hire egitekoetara.

Speaker: GuardRight
English: True that!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: What was that sound?

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Sounded like someone screaming!

Speaker: GuardRight
English: True that!

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: Well, I'm feeling pretty sleepy...

Speaker: GuardLeft
English: ...<10>I'm sure it was nothing!

Speaker: GuardRight
English: True that!

Speaker: Fib
English: Boo!!!

Speaker: Fib
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Heh, you got him good, Fib!

Speaker: Fib
English: Yeah, Bonacci!

Speaker: Fib
English: Guess he can fly after all!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Man, you're such a scaredy-cat Otus!<nl>Owls should be tough and fearless!
Translation: Oilo busti bat haiz, Otus!<nl>Hontzak gogorrak eta izukaitzak izan behar dituk!

Speaker: Fib
English: Are you sure you should be<nl>allowed to keep watch?
Translation: Ziur zaintza lanak egiteko<nl>baimena merezi duala?

Speaker: Fib
English: Doesn't everyone think you're an idiot?
Translation: Ez al ditek denek uste ergel bat baino ez haizela?

Speaker: Fib
English: I mean, are you even a real owl?
Translation: Esan nahi diat, benetako hontza al haiz?

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Asking him questions is pointless, Fib.<nl>He can't reply anyway.
Translation: Alperrik ari haiz galdezka Fib.<nl>Ezin dik erantzun.

Speaker: Fib
English: Oh yeah, he's a mute!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Mute, silly Otus!

Speaker: Fib
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]HEY!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You two lay off Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And get back to patrolling,<nl>or I'll tell Strix!
Translation: Eta itzuli erronda egitera,<nl>edo Strixi esango diot!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't mind them, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: They're just being childish.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, why don't I join you?<nl>I can help you keep watch!
Translation: Ei, eta zurekin banoa?<nl>Zaintza lanetan lagun zaitzaket!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll show them!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Just pick me up and let's go!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Haha, careful where you drop me, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm not very proficient at flying.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm getting better at climbing.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Please stop.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, buddy!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Psst..!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I must not be seen here,<nl>but we must talk.
Translation: Ezin naute hemen ikusi,<nl>baina hitz egin beharra dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let's meet up in your house.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We can talk there in private.
Translation: Han pribatuan hitz egin ahalko dugu.

Speaker: Asio
English: ...A disaster.

Speaker: Asio
English: Advent destroyed.

Speaker: Asio
English: Pirates roaming free.

Speaker: Asio
English: ...And the Professor comes and<nl>tells me that the ruin holding<nl>the <b>relic<b> was opened.
Translation: ...Eta irakasleak esan zidak<nl>barnean <b>erlikia<b> gordetzen zuen hondakina ireki dutela.

Speaker: Asio
English: If the pirates gather all the relics,<nl>then we are all doomed.
Translation: Piratek erlikia guztiak batzea lortzen badute,<nl>gureak egin dik.

Speaker: Asio
English: And with Advent gone, we can't stop them...
Translation: Eta Abendu gabe, ezin ditiagu geldiarazi...

Speaker: Asio
English: Otus.

Speaker: Asio
English: You're here, are you?

Speaker: Asio
English: Leave me.

Speaker: Asio
English: I don't want to see you here again.
Translation: Ez haut hemen berriro ikusi nahi.

Speaker: Asio
English: You <30>fool!

Speaker: Asio
English: Imbecile! <60>Moron!

Speaker: Asio
English: Leave this place at once!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus, <30>why have you come back?

Speaker: Mentor
English: You should leave! <30>Now!

Speaker: Mentor
English: This place is no longer <15>safe.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I couldn't keep the village from harm.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Not me, <30>nor Strix, <30>nor any other owl.
Translation: Ez nik, <30>ez Strixek, <30>ezta beste hontzek ere.

Speaker: Mentor
English: We are... <60>frail. <60>Arrogant. <60>Short sighted.

Speaker: Mentor
English: <30>If you hadn't left the school...

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus...

Speaker: Mentor
English: We have been spared<30> from my own <nl>foolish actions this time.
Translation: Oraingo honetan<30> nire ekintza ergelen ondorioei<nl>izkin egin zieagu.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Fly away as far as you can, Otus.
Translation: Egin hegan ahal duan urrunen, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Hide yourself from others, and never return.
Translation: Ezkuta hadi besteengandik, eta ez berriz itzuli.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Heed my final lesson now, <60>so that<nl>you may live a little longer.
Translation: Egin kasu nire azken irakaspenari, <60>eta agian<nl>bizitza luzexeagoa izango duk.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I <15>am <15>so <15>s<5>o<5>r<5>r<5>y <90>for everything.

Speaker: this
English: Thank you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So many lives lost<15>.<15>.<15>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I<15>.<15>.<15>. I can't believe this happened.
Translation: Ez<15>.<15>.<15>. ezin dut sinetsi gertatu denik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I was right there, <30>and <30>I couldn't help.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: None of the things we accomplished <30>mattered at all...
Translation: Lortu genuen guztiak <30>ez du ezertarako balio izan...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We were doing so great, <30>and yet <30><nl>this is how it all turned out.
Translation: Horren ondo gindoazen, <30>eta halere <30><nl>horrela amaitu da guztia.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We failed them.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We failed them <15>all.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I miss it, <30>Otus. <60>I miss it so much.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Even though we never got<nl>to fully experience Advent.
Translation: Nahiz eta ez genuen Abendu<nl>guztiz ezagutzerik izan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Its streets. <30>Its culture. <30>The people.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We never got to see how it'd all <30>turn out.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Did we<5>.<5>.<5>. <30>Try <30>hard <30>enough?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't know if I can go back there, <30>Otus.
Translation: Ez dakit hara bueltatzeko gai naizen, <30>Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Do you think it makes any difference<nl>what we do from now on?
Translation: Hemendik aurrera egiten duguna<nl>egiten dugula ere, ezer aldatuko al du?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Our future is lost!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Our capital is completely gone!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Think about it. <30>The pirates<nl>destroyed Advent this easily!?
Translation: Jarri pentsatzen. <30>Piratek hain<nl>erraz suntsitu zuten Abendu!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What are we to do?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I...<30> I don't feel like I<nl>belong in this village anymore.
Translation: Nik...<30> Dagoeneko ez dut herri<nl>hau nire sentitzen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I've <60>failed all of them.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is it OK if I stay at your place for a while?
Translation: Axola dizu aldi baterako zure etxean gelditzen banaiz?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I need to <15>get <15>away <15>from here.

Speaker: Fib
English: [1]I am the great master Strix <30>and I<nl>am [3]smart,<30> [3]strong <30>and [3]fantastic!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: I am Asio, <30>and I'm [1]stupid!

Speaker: Fib
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Oh wait, I got another one!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Hum-um!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: I am Asio, <30>and I am, uh,<30> [1]incompetent!
Translation: Ni Asio nauk, <30>eta benetan nauk, e,<30> [1]ezgauza!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: [1]Extremely<30> [1]incompetent!

Speaker: Fib
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Hahaha!

Speaker: Fib
English: Hey now! <15>Look who it is!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Oh man, it's scaredy cat Otus!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: I heard he was <30><b>bravely<b> <30>locked up<nl>by his mentor during the attack!
Translation: Entzun diat <30><b>ausardiaz<b> <30>giltzapetu zuela<nl>bere mentoreak erasoak iraun bitartean!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: And that he <30><b>bravely<b> <30>fainted during the commotion!
Translation: Eta egoeraren larritasunez, <30><b>ausarki<b> <30>zorabiatu zela ere bai!

Speaker: Fib
English: Haha, yeah!

Speaker: Fib
English: Not everyone is out to make a difference, Bonacci!
Translation: Denak ez zaudek mundua aldatzeko eginak, Bonacci!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: That's right, <30>at least we got a crate of<nl>food outta Advent before it was too late!
Translation: Hala duk, <30>guk behintzat Abendutik janari-kutxa<nl>bat ateratzea lortu genian beranduegi izan aurretik!

Speaker: Fib
English: <b>Strix<b> even gave us guard duty<nl>over these supplies! We're the best!
Translation: <b>Strix<b>ek hornigai hauek zaintzeko ardura<nl>ere eman ziguk! Onenak gaituk!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Yeah, so beat it Otus! <30>We've<nl>got this taken care of!
Translation: Bai, beraz alde hemendik, Otus! <30><nl>Hau kontrolpean diagu!

Speaker: Bonacci
English: Vellie will become a much<nl>better place from now on!
Translation: Vellie askoz leku hobea<nl>bilakatuko duk hemendik aurrera!

Speaker: Strix
English: How are we doing on supplies!?

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Ummm.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: This is all there is, sir <b>Strix<b>!

Speaker: Strix
English: This is it!?

Speaker: Strix
English: This village's supplies won't even last a week.
Translation: Herrixka honetako hornigaiek ez diate astebete ere iraungo.

Speaker: Strix
English: Preposterous! <30><b>Asio<b> has done<nl>a lacklustre job here, <15>at <15>best!
Translation: Hau onartezina duk! <30><b>Asiok<b> egindako lana<nl>kaxkarra duk benetan, <15>kaxkarra <15>denez!

Speaker: Strix
English: We need to start planning a long-term<nl>solution for all of Advent's refugees.
Translation: Abenduko errefuxiatu guztientzat epe luzerako<nl>konponbidea planifikatzen hasi behar diagu.

Speaker: Strix
English: Comfort is secondary, survival is top priority!
Translation: Erosotasuna bigarren mailakoa duk, lehentasuna bizirautea duk!

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Hm... Yes, sir!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! What are you doing!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We need to get to the Professor's laboratory!

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: T-This... This is too much<10>.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: I can't believe it, Otus!

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: Everything has gone wrong!

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: I can't stay here in Vellie.

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: ...It's been nice to know you, Otus.

Speaker: SomeGuy
English: I don't think we'll see each other again...
Translation: Ez dut uste berriro elkar ikusiko dugunik...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, Otus! Take me with you!

Speaker: HelpfulStar
English: The present beckons you...

Speaker: Toby
English: You seem to be struggling with the heat, my boy!
Translation: Bero honek ez dik onik egiten, ezta?

Speaker: Toby
English: Let me teach you a little trick to deal with it.

Speaker: Toby
English: Ahhh, feel that?

Speaker: Toby
English: It's all about accepting the scalding water!
Translation: Irakiten dagoen ura onartzea duk sekretua!

Speaker: Toby
English: Relax in it. <30>Soak in it!

Speaker: Toby
English: Give it a try.

Speaker: Toby
English: There you go, lad.

Speaker: Toby
English: Never forget to take your time to relax.
Translation: Etzak inoiz ahaztu erlaxatzeko tartea hartzea.

Speaker: Toby
English: Take it from ol' Toby! <30>He's a relaxer!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Ahhh...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There's nothing like relaxing in the hot spring!
Translation: Ez dago ur termaletan erlaxatzea modukorik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You seem to be getting hot under the collar, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You've gotta relax, buddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Unclench your muscles and let<nl>the heat into your pores!
Translation: Lasaitu giharrak eta utzi<nl>beroari poroetatik sartzen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: C'mon! Try it!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That's the way, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Now we can both enjoy the hot spring!
Translation: Orain biok gozatu dezakegu ur termalez!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I wonder where Toby went.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He never used to leave this hot spring.
Translation: Ez zen inoiz iturri honetatik aldentzen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Mandolyn told me he just<nl>left without saying anything.
Translation: Mandolynek esan dit ezer<nl>esan gabe alde egin duela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll have to become the hot spring<nl>experts until he comes back, huh?
Translation: Gu izan beharko gara ur termaletan<nl>adituak bera itzuli bitartean, e?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Toby's taken good care of this hot spring.
Translation: Tobyk iturri hau ezin hobeki zaindu du.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We should make good use of it while he's away.
Translation: Guk ere ondo zaindu beharko genuke kanpoan den bitartean.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Aahhh...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You feel that, Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Things are tough now, but<nl>there's always time to relax a bit.
Translation: Une latza bizitzen bagabiltza ere,<nl>beti hartu behar da erlaxatzeko tartea.

Speaker: Professor
English: Anyway, my <b>mapping machine<b> is incredible.
Translation: Dena dela, nire <b>kartografia makina<b> ikaragarria da.

Speaker: Professor
English: Even you have to admit that, Asio.
Translation: Zuk ere onartu behar duzu, Asio.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Nonsense.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The owls have done this for centuries.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Your attempt to undermine my<nl>influence in the village is pathetic.
Translation: Herrixkan daukadan indarra ahultzeko<nl>zure saiakerak patetikoak dira.

Speaker: Professor
English: You stubborn old..!

Speaker: Professor
English: You think I'm playing petty politics?!
Translation: Joko politiko ergeletan nabilela uste duzu?!

Speaker: Professor
English: You're far too proud, Asio!

Speaker: Mentor
English: So you say after you try<nl>to spit on my heritage.
Translation: Orain horrekin zatoz,<nl>nire leinuaren izena zikintzen saiatu ostean.

Speaker: Professor
English: *Sigh*

Speaker: Professor
English: I pity you for having this<nl>fool as a mentor, Otus.
Translation: Pena ematen didazu, Otus,<nl>halako txoropitoa mentoretzat duzulako.

Speaker: Professor
English: Hey again, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: Just showing your teacher<nl>what the future looks like.
Translation: Zure mentoreari etorkizunak<nl>zer itxura izango duen erakusten nabil.

Speaker: Professor
English: Try not to break anything<nl>while you're here.
Translation: Saiatu hemen zauden bitartean<nl>ezer ez apurtzen.

Speaker: Professor
English: Careful where you fly, Otus.
Translation: Kontuz nondik hegan egiten duzun, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: There's a lot of important equipment in here.

Speaker: Professor
English: Not that Asio seems to understand that.
Translation: Nahiz eta Asiok ez dirudien hori ulertzen duenik.

Speaker: Professor
English: A great structure above the skies...

Speaker: Professor
English: I almost wish I could come with you, Otus.
Translation: Kasik nahiago nuke zurekin joan ahal banintz, Otus.

Speaker: Professor
English: It must be quite a sight.

Speaker: Professor
English: Otus? Why are you here?

Speaker: Professor
English: You should evacuate!

Speaker: Professor
English: The pirates could strike at any moment!
Translation: Piratek une batetik bestera eraso dezakete!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: The Professor is right.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: There's even been sights of landmasses rising.
Translation: Lur-masa gorakariak ere ikusi omen dituzte nonbait.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: ...Something isn't right with the world.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We need some help, Professor.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We're tracking someone who might<nl>hold the key to saving Vellie.
Translation: Vellie salbatzeko gakoa daukan<nl>norbaiten bila gabiltza.

Speaker: Professor
English: Really?<30> Who?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We don't know.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoever it was went above the<nl>Mesosphere before we could catch him.
Translation: Dena dela ere, Mesosferatik gorago<nl>ihes egin zuen guk harrapatu aurretik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus can't fly that high...
Translation: Otusek ezin du hain gora hegan egin...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Well, we could perhaps help you get up there.
Translation: Tira, agian guk lagun zaitzaketegu hara iristen.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: But I don't see why we should.
Translation: Baina ez dut ikusten zergatik egin beharko genukeen halakorik.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: The last time I helped you out,<nl>things didn't go so well.
Translation: Azkenekoz lagundu zintuztegun aldian<nl>gauzak ez ziren oso ongi joan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Please!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We have to do something!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoever's up there has all three Relics!
Translation: Han goian dagoen horrek hiru erlikiak ditu!

Speaker: Professor
English: Three... Relics..?

Speaker: Professor
English: ...You mean... The <20>Hex Relics<10>.<10>.<10>?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You've heard of them!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Then you know we're not making this up!
Translation: Orduan badakizu hau ez dela guk asmatutako zerbait!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: What are they talking about, Professor?

Speaker: Professor
English: Alright, Otus and Geddy.

Speaker: Professor
English: Let's do a test.

Speaker: Professor
English: Whoever it was, if he went above the Mesosphere,<nl>he must have had somewhere to go.
Translation: Dena delako hori, Mesosferatik gorantz joan bazen,<nl>norabait zuzendurik zihoan.

Speaker: Professor
English: We should be able to track any<nl>landmass up there with <b>my machine<b>.
Translation: Uste dut han goian dagoen edozein lur-masa<nl>antzemateko gai izango garela <b>nire makinarekin<b>.

Speaker: Professor
English: If there's nothing to find up there,<nl>there's no reason to believe you.
Translation: Han goian ezer ikusten ez bada,<nl>ez dago zuei sinesteko arrazoirik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alright, go ahead and check!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm pretty sure you'll find something...

Speaker: Professor
English: Well, would you look at that!

Speaker: Professor
English: They're right!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Incredible! A structure in Mesos?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: How can anything even be built so high up?
Translation: Nola liteke horren goian ezer eraiki ahal izatea?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Alright.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I can help you get up there.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: ...But it will be a dangerous flight.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: If you want to go, you should prepare.
Translation: Benetan joan nahi baduzue, prest egon beharko duzue.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Heheheh..!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Make sure you've done everything you need to do.
Translation: Ziurtatu egin beharreko guztia egin duzuela.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: You won't be coming back for a while.
Translation: Ez zarete bueltan izango denboraldi batez.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Ready to go, buddy?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man, Otus, Asio isn't here!
Translation: O, motel, Otus, Asio ez dago hemen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That means we can't just report this!
Translation: Horrek esan nahi du ezin dugula honen berri eman!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We don't have time to go look for him!
Translation: Ez dugu bere bila hasteko astirik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get that troublemaker before<nl>he slips away from us!
Translation: Bazter-nahaslea harrapatu behar dugu<nl>berak ihes egin aurretik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Asio will understand!

Speaker: Professor
English: So as you can see, Asio, this screen<nl>is at the heart of the machine.
Translation: Beraz, ikusten duzunez, Asio, pantaila<nl>makinaren bihotzean dago.

Speaker: Professor
English: It will show you a map of the<nl>area, generated in real time!
Translation: Inguru honen mapa bat erakutsiko dizu,<nl>denbora errealean sortua!

Speaker: Professor
English: It's my greatest accomplishment!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I don't understand.

Speaker: Mentor
English: We have maps.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The OWLS keep the maps up to date.

Speaker: Professor
English: Don't be daft, Asio.

Speaker: Professor
English: The islands are floating around<nl>and there are so few owls left.
Translation: Uharteak batetik bestera hegan dabiltza<nl>eta hontz gutxi gelditzen dira.

Speaker: Professor
English: This is the future!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Ugh...

Speaker: Professor
English: Behold!<nl>Groundbreaking technology at work!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I'm<30> not impressed.

Speaker: Professor
English: Blast!<nl>It worked perfectly fine before you showed up!
Translation: Madarikatua!<nl>Zu agertu aurretik behar bezala funtzionatzen zuen!

Speaker: Professor
English: Something must have...

Speaker: Professor
English: Blast!<nl>It worked perfectly fine before you showed up!
Translation: Madarikatua!<nl>Zu agertu aurretik behar bezala funtzionatzen zuen!

Speaker: Professor
English: Something must have broken.

Speaker: Professor
English: Let me think for a bit...

Speaker: Professor
English: Huh..?

Speaker: Professor
English: Your student is in my lab, Asio.
Translation: Zure ikaslea nire laborategian dago, Asio.

Speaker: Mentor
English: [1]Otus!<nl>What are you doing in here?!

Speaker: Professor
English: Give the boy some space, Asio.

Speaker: Professor
English: It's fine as long as he doesn't<nl>break anything<10>.<10>.<10>. again.
Translation: Ez dago arazorik, baldin eta ez badu<nl>ezer apurtzen<10>.<10>.<10>. beste behin.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Just don't idle here for too long.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Go out there and keep a lookout for pirates!
Translation: Hoa inguruan piratarik ez dabilela egiaztatzera!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus get up here immediately!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus! You were supposed to<nl>keep watch! Where were you?!
Translation: Otus! Zaintza lanetan egon<nl>beharko huke! Non ibili haiz?

Speaker: Mentor
English: Geddy, you should have known better than to-
Translation: Geddy, uste nian hik buru gehiago huela-

Speaker: Professor
English: Asio, we have no time for this bickering.

Speaker: Professor
English: Geddy! Get this machine working<nl>so we can get a visual of the pirates.
Translation: Geddy! Funtzionarazi makina txatxu hau,<nl>ea piratak zelatatzeko modurik daukadan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Uh<5>.<5>.<5>.<nl>I'll try my best, Professor!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Try it now!

Speaker: Professor
English: It works!<15> Those are the<nl>pirate ships on the screen.

Speaker: Mentor
English: It looks like<20> the pirates are leaving!

Speaker: Professor
English: They are!<45> No doubt about it.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Why would they leave?

Speaker: Professor
English: Oh no... This is bad..!
Translation: O ez... Hau ez da batere ona..!

Speaker: Professor
English: [1]Asio! Call a town meeting at once!

Speaker: Professor
English: There is no time to lose!

Speaker: Mentor
English: ...Alright.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus, Geddy, follow me!

Speaker: Professor
English: ...This timing...

Speaker: Professor
English: Have the pirates noticed it too..?

Speaker: Professor
English: That the islands are<30>.<30>.<30>.

Speaker: Professor
English: No,<20> surely not.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Oh, Otus!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm so glad you're back!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Geddy regretted leaving you very much.
Translation: Geddy ondo damutu zen joaten utzi izanaz.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I'm glad you two are friends again!
Translation: Pozten nau oraindik lagunak zaretela ikusteak!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Yes, we're hiding in here.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Some people were hit by rocks<nl>that started floating upwards.
Translation: Goranzka hegan zetozen harriek<nl>hainbat lagun kolpatu zituzten.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: It seemed safer to be indoors.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Until it stops.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Hmm...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Yes, we're hiding in here for the moment.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: The islands seem to be unstable,<nl>which of course means there's<nl>nowhere to run.
Translation: Uharteek ezegonkor dirudite,<nl>eta horrek esan nahi du ez dugula<nl>nora ihes egin.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I just hope we have enough food to<nl>hold out until it settles down.
Translation: Soilik espero dut nahikoa jaki izatea<nl>gauzak bere onera iritsi artean.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: Hmm...

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I don't remember exactly how to use a kitchen.
Translation: Ez dut gogoratzen nola funtzionatzen duen sukalde batek.

Speaker: PropellerHead
English: I'll have to take some notes<nl>as it comes back to me.
Translation: Oharrak hartu beharko ditut,<nl>ea oroitzapenak bueltatzen diren.

Speaker: Journal
English: Things I like:

Speaker: Journal
English: 1. Fruit from my garden.

Speaker: Journal
English: 2. My musical instruments.

Speaker: Journal
English: 3. Performing in front of a crowd.

Speaker: Journal
English: I've finished a wonderful new song in the past few days.
Translation: Aurrekoan abesti zoragarri bat sortu nuen.

Speaker: Journal
English: I think I might go out of town to<nl>perform it in front of a big audience!
Translation: Uste dut herritik irten nintekeela<nl>ikusentzule ugariren aurrean jotzeko!

Speaker: Journal
English: I think maybe Otus and Geddy could benefit<nl>from getting out of Vellie for a bit too.
Translation: Agian Otus eta Geddyri ere<nl>on egingo lieke Vellietik irteteak.

Speaker: Journal
English: Asio and the Professor are always angry with them.
Translation: Asio eta irakaslea beti daude haiekin muturtuta.

Speaker: Journal
English: Otus means well, but...

Speaker: Journal
English: He just gets into the worst sort of trouble!

Speaker: Journal
English: If only he could be a bit more responsible,<nl>and help out every once in a while...
Translation: Arduratsuagoa balitz, eta<nl>noizean behin laguntza eman...

Speaker: Journal
English: Oh, I can hardly believe it!

Speaker: Journal
English: We've been attacked by pirates!

Speaker: Journal
English: I was very scared... but thankfully they left everyone alone.
Translation: Zeharo ikaratuta nengoen... baina zorionez bakean utzi gaituzte.

Speaker: Journal
English: Asio says they're going to Advent next.

Speaker: Journal
English: I hope they will leave everyone alone there too...
Translation: Espero dut han ere inori ezer ez egitea...

Speaker: Journal
English: Bomboman and I went to Advent a few years ago.
Translation: Bomboman eta biok orain dela urte batzuk joan ginen Abendura.

Speaker: Journal
English: We held a concert there, and the people crowded up to see us.
Translation: Kontzertu bat eman genuen han, eta jende mordoa etorri zen gu ikustera.

Speaker: Journal
English: I was so happy that I could bring<nl>a bit of Vellie to the capital.
Translation: Asko poztu ninduen Vellieren zatitxo bat<nl>hiriburura eramateak.

Speaker: Journal
English: The people there were so lovely...

Speaker: Journal
English: Maybe next time Strix goes up there, I'll come along!
Translation: Agian Strix bueltan igotzen denean berekin joango naiz!

Speaker: Journal
English: ...Though of course I can't now,<nl>with pirates on the loose...
Translation: ...Noski, orain ezinezkoa da,<nl>piratak batetik bestera dabiltzala...

Speaker: Journal
English: ...I wasn't sure if I should<nl>write a diary entry today.
Translation: ...Ez nekien ziur gaur<nl>egunerokoan idatzi edo ez.

Speaker: Journal
English: But I figured I should.

Speaker: Journal
English: I've taken Otus in to recover in my house,<nl>where we can take care of him.
Translation: Otus etxean hartu dut indarberritu artean,<nl>ondo zaindu ahal izateko.

Speaker: Journal
English: I can only hope that he's still<nl>himself when he wakes up.
Translation: Espero dut esnatzean betiko<nl>bera izaten jarraituko duela.

Speaker: Journal
English: As for the rest of us...

Speaker: Journal
English: I think we might never be the same.
Translation: Agian ez gara inoiz izan ginena izatera itzuliko.

Speaker: Journal
English: Otus is still sleeping.

Speaker: Journal
English: I wonder how much we should<nl>tell him about what happened...
Translation: Ez dakit gertatu zenetik<nl>zenbat kontatu beharko geniokeen...

Speaker: Journal
English: I don't want to lie to him,<nl>but if I tell him everything...
Translation: Ez diot gezurrik esan nahi,<nl>baina dena kontatzen badiot...

Speaker: Journal
English: What if he blames himself for all this tragedy?
Translation: Eta zorigaitz hau bere erruz gertatu dela pentsatzen badu?

Speaker: Journal
English: He's just a child..!

Speaker: Journal
English: Otus and Geddy have left again.
Translation: Otus eta Geddyk berriro alde egin dute.

Speaker: Journal
English: I hope they won't get themselves into more trouble...
Translation: Espero dut ez direla istilu gehiagotan sartuko...

Speaker: Journal
English: But maybe they need to do<nl>something to help their recovery.
Translation: Baina baliteke lehengora bueltatzeko<nl>zerbait egin behar izatea.

Speaker: Journal
English: There's nothing like going<nl>outside to help your mind relax!
Translation: Ez dago kanpora ateratzea<nl>modukorik gogoa erlaxatzeko!

Speaker: Journal
English: Geddy dropped by without Otus today.
Translation: Geddy etorri da bisitan gaur, Otus gabe.

Speaker: Journal
English: He didn't seem like himself.

Speaker: Journal
English: I suppose none of us have been<nl>since what happened in Advent.
Translation: Baina nor da betikoa<nl>Abendun gertatu zenaren ostean?

Speaker: Journal
English: I've never seen him so angry...
Translation: Ez dut inoiz horren haserre ikusi...

Speaker: Journal
English: To be honest, I'm glad he didn't stay here.
Translation: Egia esan, pozten naiz ez delako hemen gelditu.

Speaker: Journal
English: I wonder if Geddy and Otus will remain friends..?
Translation: Geddyk eta Otusek lagunak izaten jarraituko ote dute...?

Speaker: Journal
English: I mean, they've never been able to have a conversation.
Translation: Beno, ezin izan dute inoiz elkarren artean hitz egin.

Speaker: Journal
English: How well can they really understand each other..?

Speaker: Journal
English: I'd better offer Otus some<nl>encouragement when he gets back.
Translation: Hobe dut Otus animatzen saiatzea<nl>bueltan etortzen denean.

Speaker: Journal
English: I can't let him know I've been<nl>thinking these things!
Translation: Ezin du inoiz jakin<nl>pentsamendu hauek izan ditudanik!

Speaker: Journal
English: I'm so relieved that Geddy<nl>and Otus are friends again!
Translation: Izugarri lasaitu nau Geddy<nl>eta Otus berriro lagunak direla jakiteak!

Speaker: Journal
English: I only wish the situation<nl>in Vellie were different.

Speaker: Journal
English: Everyone is talking about evacuating,<nl>and Asio is just brooding...
Translation: Mundu guztia ari da ebakuatzeari buruz hizketan,<nl>eta Asio bere pentsamenduetan murgildurik dabil...

Speaker: Journal
English: But I'm not evacuating!
Translation: Baina nik ez daukat ihes egiteko asmorik!

Speaker: Journal
English: Geddy says there's still hope!

Speaker: Journal
English: Even though times are tough,<nl>I'm happier than I've been in a while.
Translation: Une latzak bizitzen ari garen arren,<nl>aspaldian ez naiz horren pozik egon.

Speaker: Journal
English: Geddy just wasn't the same without Otus.
Translation: Geddy ez zen betikoa Otus gabe.

Speaker: Journal
English: Now he's his good old, dependable self again!
Translation: Orain bere onera itzuli da, beti bezain arduratsu.

Speaker: Journal
English: Maybe he'll want to move in with me now?
Translation: Agian orain nirekin bizitzera etorri nahiko du?

Speaker: Journal
English: We always used to talk about it...
Translation: Hainbestetan hitz egin dugu horri buruz...

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: Medicine and supplies! Quickly!

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: Look for survivors!

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: Alright, take the food over there!

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: We need more scaffolding for the tents!

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: Lumber here!

Speaker: CheckerBackFromAdvent
English: We need more water!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Welcome back, Otus.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Are you well?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Good.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: We are in hiding here.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Something bad is happening out there.
Translation: Zerbait txarra ari da gertatzen hor kanpoan.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: People are being hit<nl>by rocks that come loose.
Translation: Solte hegan dabiltzan harriek<nl>lagun batzuk kolpatu dituzte.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: It's safer here till it's passed.
Translation: Seguruago gaude hemen, dena pasa arte.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: I'm going to teach little<nl>Pipp to play drums with me.

Speaker: Bomboman
English: We're going to have lots of fun!

Speaker: Kid
English: Hi, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: We're playing in the <b>Bombo-house<b>!

Speaker: Kid
English: There's music here all the time!

Speaker: Kid
English: I can't get enough of it!

Speaker: Kid
English: I think I need to learn<nl>how to play drums too!
Translation: Danborrak jotzen ikasi<nl>behar dudala uste dut!

Speaker: Kid
English: Me and Bomboman would stay<nl>up all night and practice!
Translation: Nik eta Bombomanek gaupasa<nl>egingo dugu entseatzen!

Speaker: Kid
English: You can practice it with me, bro!

Speaker: Kid
English: Maybe we'll be as cool as Bomboman one day!
Translation: Akaso egunen batean Bomboman bezain onak izango gara!

Speaker: SleepyLady
English: Urk!

Speaker: SleepyLady
English: I don't know why I chose<nl>to stay in this house.
Translation: Nork esango zidan niri<nl>etxe honetan geratzeko.

Speaker: SleepyLady
English: Constant drumming...

Speaker: SleepyLady
English: Can't sleep...

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Oh man, we're doomed.
Translation: O, motel, hau da gure azkena!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: I can't feel my legs.

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: I don't know what to do!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Someone help!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Ow, my knee!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: It's going dark!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: I'm so scared!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: We need to get out!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Hnng!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Any ideas?

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Go man, go!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Yeah! Do it!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Great going!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Keep at it!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: You can do it!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Yes!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Just a little more!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: You can do it!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Keep trying!

Speaker: >> Timed Random Speech Gunner
English: Put your back into it!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Excellent, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Do you think you'll be able<nl>to help me down from here too?
Translation: Uste duzu niri ere<nl>laguntzeko gai zarela?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: YES! Amazing!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You saved our lives, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That's my best buddy for ya!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Ok, before we get out of here,<nl>I'm just gonna collect a tiny chip from that relic!
Translation: Ondo da, hemendik irten baino lehen,<nl>erlikia horren zati txikitxo bat bildu behar dut!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Who knows what the <b>Professor<b><nl>might be able to learn from it?
Translation: Nork daki honekin zer ondorio<nl>atera ahalko dituen <b>irakasleak<b>?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, look! It's the <b>troublemaker<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get him!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hmm, this seems like a bad idea!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What is this..?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's some kind of device with<nl>a <b>button<b> on it!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Strange... if it's made by the owls<nl>then it should be hundreds of years old...
Translation: Ze arraroa... hontzek egina bada,<nl>orduan, ehundaka urte izango ditu...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But it looks completely intact.
Translation: Baina berria balitz bezain itxura ona du.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I wonder what might happen<nl>if we pressed the button<20>.<20>.<20>?
Translation: Zer gertatuko ote da<nl>botoia sakatzen badugu<20>.<20>.<20>.<20>?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think you should have it!
Translation: Uste dut zuk hartu beharko zenukeela!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Go ahead Otus, push the button.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...stay over here.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Gah!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]Wow!<30> Did I just get teleported?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: This is incredible technology!<nl>The owls made stuff like this?!
Translation: Teknologia hau demasa da!<nl>Hontzek egin zuten halako gauza bat?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Do it again!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Weeeee!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hah! Just wait till we can<nl>show this to the <b>Professor<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Although...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We should get out of here while<nl>the cave is still holding.
Translation: Hemendik irten behar genuke<nl>beste luizi bat egon aurretik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh wow... What is <b>that<b>?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It looks like an ancient <b>owl relic<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I've never seen one so pristine.
Translation: Inoiz ez dut ikusi horren ondo kontserbaturikorik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I can almost feel the energy it emits.
Translation: Ia-ia jariatzen duen energia senti nezake.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But<5>.<5>.<5>. Why is it here?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...I'm really curious about this artifact.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think we ought to bring a fragment<nl>of it to the <b>Professor<b>.
Translation: Uste dut zatitxo bat<nl>eraman beharko geniokeela <b>irakasleari<b>.

Speaker: Twig2
English: Ha! Got ya!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: GAH!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That freaky <b>spider person<b> got us!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We need to get out of these webs!
Translation: Amaraun hauetatik ihes egin behar dugu!

Speaker: GeddyHole
English: PHEW!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yay<5>, hurrah<10>, whoopie!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I found you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm alive!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And so are you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We're [1]AMAZING!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But calm down <20>Otus,<nl>this is no time to celebrate.
Translation: Baina lasai gaitezen <20>Otus,<nl>hau ez da ospatzeko unea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We should probably get out of here<nl>before there's another collapse, huh?
Translation: Hemendik alde egin behar genuke<nl>berriro luizi bat egon baino lehen, e?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoop!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! I found you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get out of here Otus.<nl>This place is becoming a bit too dangerous.
Translation: Goazen hemendik, Otus.<nl>Leku hau arriskutsu bihurtzen ari da.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Huh?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! We better keep moving, buddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Ahhh!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Watch out!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OTUS!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, wake up!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Please tell me you're OK, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man... I didn't know<nl>the cave was this dangerous!
Translation: O, motel... ez nuen uste<nl>leizea horren arriskutsua zenik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hang in there, buddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm coming for you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OTUS!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, wake up!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Please tell me you're OK, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man... I didn't know<nl>the cave was this dangerous!
Translation: O, motel... ez nuen uste<nl>leizea horren arriskutsua zenik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hang in there, buddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm coming for you!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man, <30>I can get used to this<nl>teleporting business, Otus!
Translation: O, motel, <30>erraz ohitu ninteke<nl>telegarraioaren zera honetara, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll never have to walk again!
Translation: Ez nuke gehiago oinez ibili beharrik izango!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Now, <30>let's return to-

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh no! Another tremor!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It seemed to be coming from the outside!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Quickly, Otus! <30>Let's check what's going on!
Translation: Bizkor, Otus! <30>Ikustagun zer ari den gertatzen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, buddy, wait up.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Say, what did you find in here..?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh no, this can't be good.
Translation: O, ez, hau ezin da ona izan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That is strange<10>.<10>.<10>.<20> There is<nl>some kind of tremor.
Translation: Ze bitxia<10>.<10>.<10>.<20> Dardara<nl>moduko bat sentitu dut.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I wonder if the village<nl>could be fighting back?

Speaker: Pirate
English: It doesn't matter.

Speaker: Pirate
English: We already have what we came for.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Am I to understand that we<nl>have the <b>relic<b> in our possession?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Yup.<20> It was right where that<nl>little owl led us.<20> No problems.
Translation: Bai.<20> Hontz txiki hark eraman gaituen<nl>tokian zegoan.<20> Erraza izan duk.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Excellent.<20> Then it is time to leave.
Translation: Bikain.<20> Orduan alde egiteko garaia da.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Not yet, it's not!<nl>It's time for pillaging!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Do not be ridiculous.<20> We're done here.
Translation: Ez izan patetikoa.<20> Gure hemengo lanak bukatu dira.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Captain Molstrom's order was<nl>to move on to attack Advent.
Translation: Molstrom kapitainaren agindua zen<nl>aurrera jarraitu eta Abendu erasotzea.

Speaker: Pirate
English: <b>Advent<b>?<20> We're finally going to<nl>attack the <b>capital<b>?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That's right. It seems the Captain is<nl>confident that our forces are strong enough.
Translation: Hala da. Badirudi kapitainak uste osoa<nl>duela gure eraso-indarrean.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And if we get the relic hidden in Advent<nl>as well, we will be stronger still.
Translation: Eta Abendun gordetako erlikia ere<nl>geureganatzen badugu, are indartsuagoak izango gara.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Of course, the journey will be dangerous...<20><nl>We'll have to fly near the <b>Owl temple<b>.
Translation: Baina noski, bidaia arriskuz betea izango da...<20><nl><b>Hontzaren Tenplua<b>ren albotik igaro beharko dugu.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Quit yer whining!<30><nl>Let's go!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Alright,<20> let us be off.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: Alright...

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: No going back after this!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: So we have found them at last...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The <b>Relics<b>!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: So <20>Dirk DID get the third one<nl>out of the Floating Continent..!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: How are we gonna get them out!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let us try to break the Relics<nl>out of these cages while we can!
Translation: Saia gaitezen Erlikiak kaiola hauetatik<nl>ateratzen, ahal dugun artean!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If we can make it out of the ship with <b>just one relic<b>.<20>.<20>.
Translation: Ontzitik <b>erlikia bakarrarekin<b> bada ere, irtetea lortzen badugu.<20>.<20>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: O-<30>OK, <30>but let's hurry! <30>More<nl>pirates could show up any second now!
Translation: A-<30>Ados, ongi da, <30>baina bizkor! <30>Pirata<nl>gehiago ager daitezke une batetik bestera!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed, we'll need to be quick!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let's crack these cages open, Master Otus!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: These cages sure don't seem to break easily.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hm...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Alphonse? Do you know anything about these things?
Translation: Alphonse? Badakizu ezer gauza hauei buruz?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: How can we break them?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It is as I feared.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The cages are too heavily reinforced.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We will need to get <b>the key<b> from its custodian.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And the only one who would have the<nl>keys to the Relics<30> would be<20>.<20>.<20>.
Translation: Eta Erlikiak eskuratzeko giltza<nl>izan dezakeen bakarra<30> bera da<20>.<20>.<20>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: [1]<b>Captain Molstrom himself<b>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Crud...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: So that's it..?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I mean, we can't defeat Molstrom.
Translation: Esan nahi dut, ezin dezakegu Molstrom garaitu.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: You guys saw him in Advent.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm a [1]GREAT fighter, but even I'm not<nl>going up against Molstrom after that.
Translation: Borrokalari [1]BIKAINA naiz, baina neronek ere, geroztik,<nl>ez daukat Molstromen aurka egiteko adorerik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Take heart, my friends.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Yes, this is ill news, but...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: In Advent, Molstrom had <b>a Relic<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Currently, the Relics are all here.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: So he should be considerably <b>weaker<b> compared<nl>to when we met him in Advent.
Translation: Beraz, askoz ere <b>ahulagoa<b> izan behar luke,<nl>Abendun topo egin genuen aldiarekin konparatuz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The odds are still not in our favour,<40> but...
Translation: Hala ere, galtzeko guztiak ditugu,<40> baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If there was ever a time when we<nl>could defeat him,<30> it would be now.
Translation: Inoiz bera garaitzeko aukerarik badugu,<nl>une hori<30> orain da.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm in!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We've gone up against terrible odds before!
Translation: Lehenago ere, aukera guztien kontra, aurrera egin dugu!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: In fact, I prefer it this way!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: An hour from now, I'll be able to tell everyone<nl>that Twig, the world's greatest spider...
Translation: Hemendik ordubetera, mundu guztiari<nl>esan ahalko diot Twigek,<nl>munduko armiarma bikainenak...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Defeated Captain Molstrom, the scourge of the skies!
Translation: Molstrom kapitaina, zeruetako borreroa, garaitu zuela!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I believe Captain Molstrom's cabin lies at the end of this corridor.
Translation: Uste dut Molstrom kapitainaren kabina korridore honen amaieran dagoela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Whatever happens, this will likely<nl>be the last time we fight together.
Translation: Edozer gertatzen dela ere, seguruenik hau izango da<nl>batera borroka egingo dugun azken aldia.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Win or lose, our struggle ends here.
Translation: Irabaz ala gal, hau da gure eginahalen amaiera.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: You should both prepare yourselves for that.
Translation: Horretarako gertu egon behar duzue biok.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let us go.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: TO VICTORY!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translation: Aizu, <30>Otus, <30>agian une batez<nl>atseden hartu beharko<nl>genuke jarraitu aurretik, zer diozu?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hmm, I think we should get moving to Advent.
Translation: Mmm, uste dut Abendurantz abiatu beharko genukeela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Better not give Asio a reason to throw another tantrum.
Translation: Hobe Asiori haserretzeko arrazoirik ez ematea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It would be nice to rest a bit<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Ederra litzateke atseden pixka bat hartzea<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But we need to keep up with Dirk!
Translation: Baina Dirken erritmoari eutsi behar diogu!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If he gets the last Relic, we'll be in trouble.
Translation: Azken erlikia eskuratzen badu, arazoak izango ditugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed, Geddy.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let us rest up at another time.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Should we rest a little before we move on, Master Otus?
Translation: Maisu Otus, aurrera egin aurretik atseden hartuko dugu?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translation: Aizu, <30>Otus, <30>agian une batez<nl>atseden hartu beharko<nl>genuke jarraitu aurretik, zer diozu?

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Hey hey, bud!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Hey hey, bud!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: Hey hey, bud!

Speaker: Anne
English: Hey there, Otus!

Speaker: Anne
English: I'm glad to see you made it out of Advent!
Translation: Pozten nau ikusteak Abendutik bizirik irten zinela!

Speaker: Anne
English: We barely made it...

Speaker: Anne
English: And our squad leader didn't make it out.
Translation: Eta gure eskuadroi burua ez zen bizirik atera.

Speaker: Anne
English: If it hadn't been for my injury,<nl>we would have been in there<40> when...
Translation: Hanka hautsi izan ez banu,<nl>bertan egongo ginen<40> gertatu zenean...

Speaker: Anne
English: I know I said I'd invite you to my home after the battle.
Translation: Badakit borrokaldiaren ondoren etxera gonbidatuko zintuztedala esan nizuela.

Speaker: Anne
English: I guess this is my home at the moment.
Translation: Suposatzen dut orain hau dela nire etxea.

Speaker: Anne
English: I was invited to stay in Vellie, but...
Translation: Vellien gelditzeko aukera eskaini zidaten, baina...

Speaker: Anne
English: I think I'd rather try to build something up here.
Translation: Uste dut nahiago dudala hemen goian zerbait eraikitzen saiatu.

Speaker: Anne
English: I guess it's time to try to<nl>turn a new leaf and plan ahead.
Translation: Orrialdea pasatzeko garaia da,<nl>bizitza berri bati ekitekoa.

Speaker: Anne
English: Can't grieve forever.
Translation: Ezin dut bizi osoa doluan eman.

Speaker: Anne
English: Bonanza is away gathering supplies for us.
Translation: Bonanza biontzako hornigai bila joan da.

Speaker: Anne
English: I have to keep myself fed and<nl>try to figure out what to do next.
Translation: Neure burua elikatu behar dut,<nl>eta hurrena zer egingo dudan erabaki.

Speaker: Anne
English: One step at a time...

Speaker: Anne
English: Your friend left?

Speaker: Anne
English: Ah, I remember him.

Speaker: Anne
