Speaker: Alphonse
English: You have remarkable resilience,<nl>and put up an honourable fight.
Translation: Aurkari bikainak izan zarete,<nl>eta ohorez egin duzue borroka.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Please accept my apologies.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We were desperate to get through<nl>these ruins, you understand.
Translation: Hondakin hauetatik irteteko azken aukeratzat<nl>hartu dugu etsi-etsian, uler ezazue.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But that does not matter now.
Translation: Baina gutxi axola du horrek orain.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I hope we can part<nl>without any ill will.
Translation: Espero dut ezinikusirik gabe<nl>aurrera egin ahalko dugula.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Good luck finding your way out of this place.
Translation: Zorte on leku honetatik irteera bilatzerakoan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I say! How does it look in there?
Translation: Arraioa! Zer ikusten da hor barrutik?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Whadda ya think it looks like?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Bah!

Speaker: Pirate
English: The final impact snapped what<nl>was left of her in half.
Translation: Azken talkak erdibitu egin dik<nl>ontzian osorik gelditzen zen apurra.

Speaker: Pirate
English: She's bleeding gears out her side<nl>for crying out loud!
Translation: Bidean zehar engranajeak galtzen ari duk,<nl>madarikatua!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What nonsense possessed the captain<nl>to have us fly through this death trap?
Translation: Non ote zeukan burua kapitainak, gu tranpa<nl>hilgarri hau hegan zeharkatzera bidaltzeko?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Can it! We've got more important things<nl>to worry about, like how to get out of here!
Translation: Bost axola! Kezkatzeko gauza garrantzitsuagoak<nl>ditiagu orain, adibidez hemendik nola irten!

Speaker: Pirate
English: Where's that Gawk pest gone to?<nl>Looks like she's carrying us out of here.
Translation: Nora joan duk orain Gawk gogaikarri hori?<nl>Hemendik berak atera beharko gaituela zirudik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hm, she won't be able to carry both of us.
Translation: Mm, ez dut uste gu biok ateratzeko gai izango denik.

Speaker: Pirate
English: So what the heck do you want us<nl>to do? Flip a coin and...
Translation: Orduan, zer arraio egin behar diagu?<nl>Txanpon bat bota eta...

Speaker: Pirate
English: Hey!!!

Speaker: Pirate
English: We've got <b>company<b>...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A little Owl! Why hello th---!

Speaker: Pirate
English: The kid is wearing an authentic <b>Owl Cloak<b>!<nl>We could use that thing to bust this joint!
Translation: Mutikoak benetako <b>hontz-kapa<b> bat zeramak!<nl>Hemendik alde egiteko erabil zezakeagu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Very well, it seems this is our last option.
Translation: Ongi da, gure azken aukera dela dirudi.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Sincere apologies, young sir, we will<nl>have to take that cloak off your hands now.
Translation: Barkadazu benetan, jaun txikia, baina<nl>hontz-kapa hori zure eskuetatik hartu beharko dugu orain.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Great work up there!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: My thanks!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Another predicament!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This seems a bit much<nl>for either of us to handle.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps it would be best<nl>if we could work together?
Translation: Agian onena denok batera<nl>lan egitea izango litzateke?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The pirates will not want me back,<nl>and I am free to do as I please.
Translation: Piratek ez naute bueltan ikusi nahiko,<nl>eta nahi dudana egiteko aske naiz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I, <b>Alphonse<b>, would be honoured to<nl>join your crew if you would accept me.
Translation: Ni, <b>Alphonse<b>, ohorez beteko nintzateke<nl>zuen taldetxoan onartuko baninduzue.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Well, you DO seem more friendly than the other pirates.
Translation: Tira, beste piratak baino jatorragoa dirudizu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And I have a feeling that other<nl>guy would have attacked us earlier<nl>if it weren't for you.
Translation: Eta iruditzen zait,<nl>zugatik ez balitz, beste tipoak<nl>arinago erasoko zigula.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What do you think, Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alright. I guess we'll take our<nl>chances with you... Alphonse.
Translation: Ondo da, uste dut zutaz<nl>fidatuko garela... Alphonse.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Just... don't get too surprised<nl>when you get teleported around.
Translation: Gauzatxo bat... ez zaitezela harritu<nl>batetik bestera telegarraiatzen bazaitugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey guys, look!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...That's the entrance to the <b>Control room<b>!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Control room?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yeah.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Our plan was to stop you-

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I mean...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Our plan was to stop the wind machinery so<nl>the temple would block your fleet's path.
Translation: Gure plana haize-makineria geldiaraztea zen,<nl>tenpluak zuen flotaren bidea blokea zezan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's the only way we can stop<nl>the pirates from reaching Advent.
Translation: Hori da bide bakarra piratak<nl>Abendura iritsi baino lehen geldiarazteko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are... <30>Are you with us on this Alphonse?
Translation: Zu... <30>Zu gure alde zaude honetan, ezta, Alphonse?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Leaving the pirates is one thing...
Translation: Gauza bat da pirata izateari uztea...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Getting on their bad side is another.
Translation: Eta beste bat haien aurka egitea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The pirates are threatening to attack <b>Advent<b>!
Translation: Piratek <b>Abendu<b> erasoko dutela mehatxu egin dute!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If you won't help us,<nl>why even bother to abandon the pirates!?
Translation: Ez bagaituzu lagundu behar,<nl>zergatik utzi dituzu piratak!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You left because of your pride?<nl>Are you proud of doing nothing?
Translation: Zergatik, zure harrotasunagatik?<nl>Harro zaude ezer ez egiteaz?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I was so sure you<nl>claimed to be noble, <b>Alphonse<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have decided!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I will aid you!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It is true that the pirates have gone too far lately.<nl>As you say, I cannot simply stand by and watch.
Translation: Piratak urrutiegi joan dira azkenaldi honetan.<nl>Zuk esan bezala, ezin naiz<nl>ezer egin gabe begira gelditu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If <b>Captain Molstrom<b><nl>truly aims to attack Advent...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...We must stop it in any way we can!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I, Alphonse, would be proud to join your ranks!
Translation: Ni, Alphonse, harro batuko naiz zuen borrokara!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I knew we could count on you, Alphonse!<nl><30>Right, Otus!?
Translation: Banekien zutaz fida gintezkeela, Alphonse!<nl><30>Ez da hala, Otus!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Now,<30> let's go!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We gotta get to the <b>Control room<b>!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm, I seem to be stuck here.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Not the elegant sortie I was hoping for.
Translation: Ez da buruan neukan irteera dotorea, alajaina.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps you can find a way forth, little one?
Translation: Agian zuk bila dezakezu aurrerabidea, txikia?

Speaker: hero
English: The lessons of history must be preserved.
Translation: Historiako irakasgaiak ondo babestu behar dira.

Speaker: hero
English: Even when that history is a terrible one.

Speaker: hero
English: With this token, you hold the key.

Speaker: hero
English: Find me at the Sanctuary.

Speaker: hero
English: And you will see what once was.
Translation: Eta behinola izan zena erakutsiko dizut.

Speaker: hero
English: And what became of our fragile dreams.
Translation: Eta gure amets hauskorrei zer gertatu zitzaien.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Guys, I don't think we should leave just yet.
Translation: Mutilok, ez dut uste oraindik hemendik joan behar genukeenik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Leaving the Owl Temple before we've<nl>reached <b>Advent<b> seems like a bad idea.
Translation: Hontzaren Tenplutik <b>Abendu<b>ra iritsi aurretik irteteak ideia txarra dirudi.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...And I don't want to anger Asio more than we need to.
Translation: ...Eta ez dut Asio behar baino gehiago haserretu nahi.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Aye! I will stay behind and look for a way out.
Translation: Ados! Ni hemen geldituko naiz irteera baten bila.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I won't stray too far from this<nl>vicinity, in case you should return!
Translation: Ez naiz inguru honetatik urrunduko,<nl>bueltan bazatozte ere!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll come with you if you need me Otus, but<nl>finding <b>Advent<b> should be our first priority!
Translation: Zurekin joango naiz hala nahi baduzu, Otus, baina<nl><b>Abendu<b> bilatzea izan beharko litzateke gure lehentasuna!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Um, Otus...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What was that???

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh my!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Guys!!! S-Stand back!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Ahhhhhh!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus, <45>Master Geddy.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alphonse, <30>are we dead?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think you can open your eyes.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: AH!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What happened to it?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It just froze in place...<30><nl>I don't think the water did it any good.
Translation: Bertan izoztu da...<30><nl>Ez dut uste urak batere onik egin dionik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is this another relic left here by the <b>owls<b>?
Translation: Hau ere <b>hontzek<b> utzitako beste erlikia bat al da?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Um, Master Geddy,

Speaker: Alphonse
English: W-What are you doing?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OK! <30>YEAH! <30>Bad idea!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's <b>move<b> guys, before it does.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey! Over there!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's the <b>Control room<b>! But...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: All this machinery...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It looks like it's been broken for decades...
Translation: Orain dela hamarkada asko hondatu zela dirudi...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But then<10>.<10>.<10>. <30>Shouldn't the temple be closed off?
Translation: Baina orduan<10>.<10>.<10>. <30>Ez al litzateke tenplua itxita egon beharko?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The Professor said that this machine was blowing the islands apart...
Translation: Irakasleak esan zuen makina honek<nl>mantentzen zituela uharteak bata besteagandik bereizita...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Could he have been wrong..?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We have to hurry up, guys!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If we can't use this machine to<nl>slow the pirates down<10>.<10>.<10>.
Translation: Ezin badugu makina hau erabili<nl>piratak geldiarazteko<10>.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...They'll have a clear path to <15><b>Advent<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We might already be too late!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's go!

Speaker: Toby
English: Oh!<20> Hello, Otus.

Speaker: Toby
English: What brings you up here?

Speaker: Toby
English: Well, now that the islands are coming apart<nl>and the rocks are floating upwards...
Translation: Tira, orain uharteak elkarrengandik bereizten<nl>ari direla, eta harriak goraka hegan...

Speaker: Toby
English: I figured it was time to come back here.
Translation: Pentsatu diat berriro hona bueltatzeko unea dela.

Speaker: Toby
English: To remember.

Speaker: Toby
English: I grew up here in Advent, Otus.

Speaker: Toby
English: This is where I learned how to swim.
Translation: Hemen ikasi nian nola igeri egin.

Speaker: Toby
English: How to build a house, how to fish.
Translation: Nola eraiki etxe bat, nola arrantzan egin.

Speaker: Toby
English: That sort of thing.

Speaker: Toby
English: I could never stop working back then.
Translation: Garai haietan lan eta lan egiten nian, besterik ez.

Speaker: Toby
English: Always had somethin' to do.
Translation: Beti nian egitekoren bat esku artean.

Speaker: Toby
English: It's where I met my wife.

Speaker: Toby
English: After that, I didn't<nl>need to work so hard.
Translation: Horren ondoren, ez nian<nl>hain gogor lan egiteko beharrik.

Speaker: Toby
English: I had all I wanted.

Speaker: Toby
English: Can you imagine that, Otus?

Speaker: Toby
English: Such perfect peace.

Speaker: Toby
English: I've missed her for so long now.

Speaker: Toby
English: I wish she could have come to<nl>Vellie and seen you grow up.
Translation: Ai, Velliera etortzerik izan balu<nl>hi hazten ikusteko.

Speaker: Toby
English: But I buried her up here... In her home.
Translation: Baina hemen goian lur eman nioan... Bere etxean.

Speaker: Toby
English: And now that home is in ruins.
Translation: Eta orain etxe hori hondar pila bat baino ez duk.

Speaker: Toby
English: And the Professor says that the<nl>rest of the world is ending too.
Translation: Eta irakasleak ziok munduaren<nl>gainontzekoa ere azkenetan dagoela.

Speaker: Toby
English: I'm glad I met you, Otus.
Translation: Pozten nauk hi ezagutu izanaz, Otus.

Speaker: Toby
English: With you and the other villagers in Vellie,<nl>I've had a life worth living.
Translation: Hiri eta Vellieko beste herritarrei esker,<nl>bizitza ederra izan diat.

Speaker: Toby
English: Even though the world ended for me years ago.
Translation: Nahiz eta mundua niretzat orain urte asko amaitu zuan.

Speaker: Toby
English: Thanks for listening to me, Otus.

Speaker: Toby
English: I couldn't bring myself to say<nl>goodbye to anyone when I left.
Translation: Ez nian inor agurtzeko indarrik<nl>alde egin nuenean.

Speaker: Toby
English: Just took the first ferry I could find!
Translation: Aurkitu nian lehenengo ferrya hartu nian!

Speaker: Toby
English: But we're like family,<20> all of us in Vellie.
Translation: Baina nire familia zarete,<20> Vellieko guztiok.

Speaker: Toby
English: And... it was scary to go up here alone.
Translation: Eta... beldurgarria izan duk hona bakarrik igotzea.

Speaker: Toby
English: Now that you're here, I feel a lot stronger.
Translation: Orain hi ere hemen hagoela, askoz indartsuago sentitzen nauk.

Speaker: Toby
English: Ahh, feel that breeze, Otus!
Translation: Aaa, sentizak haize gozo hau, Otus!

Speaker: Toby
English: It makes me feel like a young man again!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What's going on here?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Uh, where is everyone?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Alas, it has come to this.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alphonse?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Listen, you two.<10> I need to hide for now.<20><nl>You cannot be seen with me here.
Translation: Entzun, biok.<10> Oraingoz ezkutatu beharra daukat.<20><nl>Ezin zaituztete nirekin ikusi.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: When the time comes, summon me<nl>with your teleporter, Otus.
Translation: Une egokia iristean, dei nazazu<nl>telegarraiatzailea erabilita, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I must be off.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...What's he thinking<5>.<5>.<5>?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's go, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We've gotta check if Asio and the Professor made it in time!
Translation: Asio eta irakaslea garaiz iritsi diren egiaztatu behar dugu!

Speaker: Mentor
English: <b>Otus!<b>

Speaker: Mentor
English: Don't just stand there! Get inside!
Translation: Zer egiten duzue hor, geldi! Sartu barrura!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Hurry, you fool!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Ha<20> ha<20> ha!

Speaker: FerrySoldier0
English: Alright, soldiers!

Speaker: FerrySoldier0
English: It's going to be tough out there,<nl>but we have to succeed!
Translation: Hor kanpoan gorriak ikusiko ditugu,<nl>baina garaipena lortu behar dugu!

Speaker: FerrySoldier0
English: Are you all ready?

Speaker: FerrySoldier0
English: Let's move out and save this city!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Move it!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: HEY!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Lay off Otus!

Speaker: Professor
English: Be quiet, Geddy!

Speaker: Professor
English: You're both to blame for this!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What?! <30>What for?

Speaker: Mentor
English: You idiots!

Speaker: Mentor
English: You were supposed to shut down the Owl Temple!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Did you think we sent you<nl>out to have fun?!

Speaker: Mentor
English: ...Oh, how I wish I could have<nl>sent someone competent instead...
Translation: ...O, zergatik ez nian<nl>guztiz inutila ez den norbait bidali!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: H<20>-hey now...<30> There<nl>was nothing to shut down!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The control room was broken...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The Owl Temple has been shut down for years!

Speaker: Professor
English: The wind machinery was <30>never<30> active!?

Speaker: Mentor
English: Don't be ridiculous.<nl><50>We're all familiar with you and<nl>Otus's slackery!
Translation: Ez esan txorakeriarik.<nl><50>Ez ginen atzo goizean jaio<nl>eta ondo ezagutzen zaituztegu!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Your actions are inexcusable, Otus.<30><nl>You bring shame to owls everywhere.
Translation: Hire ekintzek ez diate barkamenik, Otus.<30><nl>Munduko hontz guztiok lotsarazten gaituk.

Speaker: Mentor
English: And most of all,<30> you<nl>bring shame upon me.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: This is quite enough, Asio.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Rather than blow up on this child,<nl>you should get to work defending Advent!
Translation: Mutiko gizarajo hau martirizatu ordez,<nl>Abendu babesteko lanari ekin beharko zenioke!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Strix, will you stop this silliness?

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Absolutely, Kernelle.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Asio, we don't have time for this.<30><nl>As a fellow owl, you should know better!
Translation: Asio, ez diagu honetarako astirik.<30> Hi moduko<nl>hontz batek ondo jakin beharko likek hori!

Speaker: AsioRival
English: The entirety of Captain Molstrom's fleet<nl>is raining down fire upon Advent.
Translation: Molstrom kapitainaren flota guztia<nl>Abendu erasotzen ari duk.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: My students and I plan to carry<nl>supplies to the turret gunners<nl>and do repairs.
Translation: Nire ikasleek eta nik hornigaiak garraiatzeko<nl>asmoa diagu dorretxoetako tiratzaileentzako, eta<nl>konpontze lanak ere egingo ditiagu.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: It will be dangerous, but<nl>it's the least we can do.
Translation: Arriskutsua izango duk, baina<nl>egin dezakegun gutxienekoa duk.

Speaker: Professor
English: Is there no way to strike<nl>back at the pirates?
Translation: Ez al dago piratei<nl>kontraerasoa egiteko aukerarik?

Speaker: AsioRival
English: I'm afraid not.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Our only recourse is our turrets. The<nl>pirate <b>Dreadnoughts<b> are too heavily fortified<nl>to assault with our own ships.
Translation: Dugun baliabide bakarra geure dorretxoak dituk.<nl>Piraten <b>korazatuak<b> sendoegiak dituk geure<nl>ontziekin aurre egiteko.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: We can only hope that our<nl>turret fire will ward them off.
Translation: Geure esperantza bakarra duk<nl>tiroek piratak uxatuko dituztela.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Bonacci! Fib! Let's go help the turret gunners!
Translation: Bonacci! Fib! Goazen dorretxoetako tiratzaileak laguntzera!

Speaker: AsioRival
English: You and your student should<nl>do the same, Asio!
Translation: Hik eta hire ikasleak gauza bera<nl>egin beharko zenukete, Asio!

Speaker: AsioRival
English: If you can.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Solus<10>.<10>.<10>.<30> You keep guard here.

Speaker: Solus
English: S<30>-Shouldn't we evacuate?

Speaker: AsioRival
English: No.<30> We have to hold Advent.
Translation: Ez.<30> Abenduren kontrola berreskuratu behar diagu.

Speaker: AsioRival
English: Stay here.

Speaker: Solus
English: ...Y-Yes!

Speaker: Professor
English: I'm off to help too.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You have caused enough harm.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You will stay in here.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I will lock the door behind me<nl>as I go to help the others.
Translation: Atea giltzaz itxiko diat<nl>besteak laguntzera irtetean.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You are not fit to help the<nl>others protect the city.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Kernelle, Solus... please see to it that these<nl>two do not do anything stupid while I'm away.
Translation: Kernelle, Solus... mesedez, zaindu bi hauek,<nl>ez dezatela ergelkeriarik egin ni bueltatu artean.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Pfft!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: That stuck up old fool.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We must stop the attack<nl>on the city at once!
Translation: Hiriaren kontrako erasoa<nl>gelditu behar dugu berehala!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: How are we supposed to do that?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We've been locked in here.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And there's nothing that we<nl>can do against the pirate fleet.
Translation: Eta ezin dezakegu ezer egin<nl>piraten flotaren aurka.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You must know that.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Nothing we can do?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Geddy, I do not share<nl>your pessimistic outlook!
Translation: Maisu Geddy, ez nator<nl>zure ikuspegi ezkorrarekin bat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I know <30>precisely how to stop them.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Hey! <45>You're a pirate, aren't you?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Do you perhaps have some<nl>information that could help us?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Of course! <30>We need to stop the <15><b>D<3>r<3>e<3>a<3>d<3>n<3>o<3>u<3>g<3>h<3>t<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Stopping the <b>Dreadnought<b> could stop the entire fleet.
Translation: <b>Korazatua<b> geldiarazteak flota guztia geldiaraztea ekar lezake.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's a massive ship, <15>but it's got one weakness!
Translation: Ontzi erraldoia da, <15>baina ahulgune bat dauka!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We can <b>sneak in through the bomb chutes<b>,<30><nl>and set off an <b>explosive charge<b>.
Translation: <b>Bonben isurbideetatik ezkutuan sar gaitezke<b>,<30><nl>eta ontzian <b>leherkari<b> bat ezarri.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: K[1]aboom!!! <45>And Advent would be safe.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: That sounds very dangerous!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Otus, Geddy and myself are noble men!
Translation: Otus, Geddy eta hirurok gizon ausartak gara!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We do not care for trifles such as danger!
Translation: Ez gaituzte arriskua moduko txikikeriek arduratzen!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Madam... <30>Kernelle?<60> Might I ask you<nl>for<30> the keys out of this building?
Translation: Zera... <30>Kernelle?<60> Emango al dizkiguzu<nl><30>eraikin honetatik irteteko giltzak?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I don't know...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Do I have any reason to trust you?
Translation: Zer arrazoi daukat nik zuetaz fidatzeko?

Speaker: Solus
English: I.<10>.<10>.<30> I trust them!

Speaker: Solus
English: Otus and Geddy are great guys!<30> They wouldn't lie!
Translation: Otus eta Geddy mutil onak dira!<30> Ez lukete gezurrik esango!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Give these two brave souls a<nl>chance to show their worth.
Translation: Eman bi arima kementsuoi<nl>haien balioa frogatzeko aukera bat.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Here's a key.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: If anyone asks us, we didn't see you go.
Translation: Inork galdetzen badigu, ez zaituztegu alde egiten ikusi.

Speaker: Solus
English: Good luck out there!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let's go, little one!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Don't look so down, laddie.<nl>If you made a mistake you'll<nl>make it right in time.
Translation: Ez zaitez horren burumakur egon, adiskide.<nl>Akatsen bat egin baduzu, izango duzu konpontzeko aukera.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Take Asio and the Professor, for instance.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: They've made plenty of mistakes.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Only reason they're able to act all<nl>high and mighty now is because they've worked<nl>hard to set those mistakes right.
Translation: Orain burua goian dutela badabiltza,<nl>akats horiek konpontzeko gogor<nl>lan egin dutelako baino ez da.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Listen, lady...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We didn't do anything wrong!
Translation: Guk ez dugu ezer txarrik egin!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We defeated a giant mechanical frog guardian<nl>to get to the control room!
Translation: Zaintza lanetan zebilen igel mekaniko erraldoi bat<nl>garaitu genuen kontrol-gelara iristeko!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But when we got there, it was already broken!
Translation: Baina heldu ginenerako, aspaldian hondatua zegoen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Like we said, the machinery wasn't on in the first place!
Translation: Esan bezala, makineria guzti hori ez da azken aldian martxan egon!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Really?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yes!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: That's very interesting!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: It's been thought that the<nl>Owl Temple was responsible for the<nl>islands drifting apart from each other.
Translation: Beti uste izan da Hontzaren Tenplua<nl>zela uharteak bereizita mantentzen<nl>zituena.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: If the temple isn't causing it,<nl><30>then I wonder what is<20>.<20>.<20>?
Translation: Ez bada tenplua horren erantzulea,<nl><30>zer izango ote da<20>.<20>.<20>.<20>?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I'll have to look into this matter.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Where are my manners?

Speaker: Kernelle
English: My name is Kernelle. I research biology<nl>and teach the children at this school.
Translation: Nire izena Kernelle da. Eskola honetan<nl>biologia ikertu eta haurrei irakasten diet.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: And I make rockets and bombs for fun.
Translation: Eta aisialdian suziriak eta lehergailuak sortzen ditut.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Umm...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Pleased to meet you, Kernelle.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm Geddy, and this is Otus.<nl>We're best buds.
Translation: Ni Geddy naiz, eta hau Otus.<nl>Lagunik onenak gara.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I tend to speak for him, since he's a mute.
Translation: Bere izenean hitz egin ohi dut, bera mutua delako.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Well, pleased to meet you both.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I sure hope they don't hit my fuel storage...
Translation: Espero dut ez dutela nire erregai-biltegia tirokatuko...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: That would be quite a kaboom!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Oh, don't look so down.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Just try to remain calm<nl>and keep your hopes up.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: We'll get through this.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Good luck out there.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Blow those pirates sky high!

Speaker: Solus
English: H-Hey...

Speaker: Solus
English: I'm sure you don't want<nl>to talk right now, but...
Translation: Ziur orain ez duzula<nl>hitz egiteko gogorik, baina...

Speaker: Solus
English: I want you to know that<30> I believe you.
Translation: Jakin dezazun nahi dut.<30> Nik sinesten dizut.

Speaker: Solus
English: You don't seem like the type to lie, Otus.
Translation: Ez dirudizu gezurrak esaten dituzten horietakoa, Otus.

Speaker: Solus
English: I guess we've both been dumped in here.
Translation: Suposatzen dut biok utzi gaituztela hemen baztertuta.

Speaker: Solus
English: I h-hope this all blows over.
Translation: E-Espero dut laster bukatuko dela guzti hau.

Speaker: Solus
English: This p-pirate attack seems to be quite huge!

Speaker: Solus
English: I mean...

Speaker: Solus
English: How could it t-turn out like this?

Speaker: Solus
English: I wonder how Strix, Bonacci and Fib are doing...
Translation: Zer moduz ari ote dira Strix, Bonacci eta Fib...

Speaker: Solus
English: A-at least the t-two of us are safe here...

Speaker: Solus
English: I-I can t-tell you want to get out, O-Otus.
Translation: N-Nabari dezaket h-h-hemendik irten nahi duzula, O-Otus.

Speaker: Solus
English: If there was ever a time<nl>to call someone for help, it's now.
Translation: Inoiz une onik bada laguntza eske<nl>norbaiti deitzeko, orain da une hori.

Speaker: Solus
English: G-Good luck out there.

Speaker: Solus
English: And, um... be careful!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Ah! Master Otus!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: How perfect that you have summoned me!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Quickly, we cannot waste time!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I must speak with you!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: All of you, in fact!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Man, that was close, guys!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: This invasion is MASSIVE!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This battle does not<nl>bode well for your capital at all.
Translation: Ez dirudi zuon hiriburua borrokaldi<nl>honetatik osorik irtengo denik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We will have to try to make our way through<nl>the siege lines and make a difference.
Translation: Setio lerroetan zehar gure bidea zabaldu<nl>beharko dugu gauzak aldatzerik nahi badugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: W-Well, we can't just charge through!
Translation: A-Ados, ezin gara eroak moduan kontraerasora joan!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We must try <b>not to be seen<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If these pirates see you,<nl>they will hunt you relentlessly.
Translation: Pirata hauek ikusten bazaituztete,<nl>ez dute atsedenik hartuko zuek harrapatu arte.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Most pirates are near indestructible.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: So please be careful!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll help out as much as I can, Otus,<nl>but I don't think my pistol will help much here.
Translation: Ahal dudan guztian lagunduko dut, Otus,<nl>baina ez dut uste nire pistolak askorako balioko duenik.

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: Go get the others.

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: I'll<10>.<10>.<10>.<30> be right here.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: Heya.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: You need to bring Anne here.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: I need her to blow up the wall.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: Thanks a lot for the help.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: I'm going to take Anne back to safety.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: Then it'll be time to look for our squad leader.
Translation: Gero hasiko gaituk eskuadroi buruaren bila.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: I wonder where he went..?

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: Thanks a lot.

Speaker: FirstPrisoner
English: Let's hope Advent is still standing.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Good luck out there.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: I didn't say thank you.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: I really appreciate that<nl>you helped me out.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: You should come visit my home<nl>in Advent when this battle's over.
Translation: Zatozte nire Abenduko etxean ni<nl>bisitatzera, borrokaldi hau amaitzean.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Good luck out there!

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: You're tough, you can make it!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Huh!?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Oh, <15>excuse me, <30><nl>I was just taking a little nap!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: <b>Anne<b>!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: And an owl?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Well then! <30>Looks like<nl>our backup finally arrived!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Thank you for helping, younglings!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are you alright, lady?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Aye! <30>Now that I'm out of that cage,<nl>I can finally stretch my old bones.
Translation: Bai! <30>Orain kaiola horretatik kanpo nagoala,<nl>azkenean hankak luzatu zitzakeat.

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Gimme a second here!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: AH!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Yup!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: There might just be a<nl>little use in these old joints yet!
Translation: Oraindik badun borrokarako<nl>indarra beso hauetan, xaharra!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Might you be able to assist<nl>us through the barricades?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Assist you? <30>Ha<15>ha<15>, why<30> that's<nl>the reason we're here, son!
Translation: Lagundu? <30>Kar <15>kar<15>, <30>ez al gaude ba<nl>hemen horretarako, gazte?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Follow my lead, young ones!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: These pirates sure got this place<nl>locked down tight, huh?
Translation: Pirata hauek inguru guztia<nl>ondo gotortuta zeukaten, alajaina!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Move aside, children.

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Bonanza will take care of this.

Speaker: Bonanza
English: HIIIIYA!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: WOW!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: No time for gawking guys! <30>Go on ahead,<nl>I'll catch up with you at the <b>barricades<b>.
Translation: Utzi hitz ederrak geroko! <30>Segi aurrera,<nl><b>barrikadetan<b> elkartuko naiz zuengana.

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Take care of my <b>Anne<b>, will ya!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Th-<30>Thank you ma'am! <30>We will!

English: I can't walk very well,<nl>my leg's broken.
Translation: Ezin dut ondo ibili,<nl>hanka hautsi dut.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: But thanks for helping me.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We need your help to bust open some barricades further down.
Translation: Zure laguntza beharko dugu aurreragoko barrikada batzuk leherrarazteko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, maybe you can <b>carry<b><nl><b>her<b> to safety?

English: Master Geddy, that's a great idea!

English: Carry me?

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: What if he drops me?

English: Hahaha! Otus would never do such a thing!
