Speaker: Alphonse
English: Isn't that right, Master Geddy?
Translation: Ez al da hala, Maisu Geddy?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Of course!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Uh...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yes!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Um...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...I'm not sure this is a good idea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hahaha! Never!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: HAHAHAHAHA! O-Of COURSE not!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: AAAAAAAAAAAHHHH!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Come now, let us get you out of here!

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Umm... Alright.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: If you want to get into the hangar,<nl>we should free <b>my partner<b> as well.
Translation: Hangarrera sartu nahi baduzue,<nl><b>nire kidea<b> ere askatu beharko dugu.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: She's a bit further in.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: I'm gonna put my faith in you<nl>and let you carry me around.

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Please don't drop me.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What<30> is<30> [1]THAT!?!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That, Master Geddy, is<15>.<15>.<15>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]AHHHHHHHHHHHH!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]We're all gonna die!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Not yet, but..!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's reloading!!!<nl>Find cover, <15>QUICKLY!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Wh-<30>Who's in there?

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Is<5>.<5>.<5>. Is it safe?

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Oh man, am I glad to see friendly faces!
Translation: Ama... pozten nau aurpegi atseginak ikusteak!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: There're pirates everywhere!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Nowhere is safe!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Wha-?

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: PIRATE!!!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: WE'RE ALL GONNA DIE!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey! Listen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He's one of us!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He's helping us find a<nl>way to stop the pirates!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Keep your wits about you, friend,<nl>I am indeed here to assist you.

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Really?

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Well,<15> you do seem more gallant than<nl>these other ruthless invaders.
Translation: Tira,<15> egia esan, beste inbasore<nl>zitalak baino atseginagoa dirudizu.

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Alright, I'll trust you!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: OK, listen...

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Our demolition squad was captured<nl>further up in the pirate base.
Translation: Gure leherketari eskuadroia atzeman dute<nl>piraten basean goraxeago.

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: We can't proceed beyond the<nl>pirates' <b>barricades<b> unless we save them.
Translation: Ezingo ditugu piraten <b>barrikadak<b><nl>zeharkatu haiek askatu ezean.

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: You guys might be able to get up there real quick!
Translation: Zuek agian bizkor batean igo zaitezkete hara!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: The squad consists of <b>Anne<b> and <b>Bonanza<b>!<nl>Free them!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: I, uh...

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: I'll just<40>... prepare to fight<5>.<5>.<30><nl>...Over by those... bushes.
Translation: Nik<40>... borrokarako prestaketak egingo ditut<5>.<5>.<30><nl>...Zuhaixka horren atzean... gordeta.

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Good luck out there.

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: Psst!

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: We need to get rid of this <b>barricade<b> to get out!
Translation: Hemendik irteteko <b>barrikada<b> hau leherrarazi beharra daukagu!

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: If you free my subordinates,<nl>we can blow it up!
Translation: Nire menpeko soldaduak askatzen<nl>badituzue, suntsitu dezakegu!

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: They're right up ahead, so...

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: I'll just wait here<nl>while you set 'em free!
Translation: Hemen itxarongo dut<nl>haiek askatzen dituzuen bitartean!

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: That's right, <30>I'll be right<nl>here waiting for you!

Speaker: TrappedGuy1
English: So go free my subordinates.

Speaker: Anne
English: Hey!!!

Speaker: Anne
English: That's <b>Bonanza<b>!

Speaker: Anne
English: Let's get her out of there!

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Help!

Speaker: SecondPrisoner
English: Over here!

Speaker: Anne
English: Hoi.

Speaker: Anne
English: You ready, Bonanza?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Born ready, young one.

Speaker: Anne
English: Alright! Here we go!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: OK guys! <30>Say farewell to this here <b>barricade<b>!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Three...

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Two...

Speaker: Bonanza
English: One...

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Done.

Speaker: Anne
English: Phew, <30>you've done good, Bonanza!

Speaker: Anne
English: Alright, guys...

Speaker: Anne
English: Guys? Are... <15>are you alright?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Haha. <30>Yeah. <30>We're cool!

Speaker: Anne
English: Hehe. <30>That's good!

Speaker: Anne
English: We're gonna try and get out of here.

Speaker: Anne
English: I can't be of much more<nl>use with my leg broken.
Translation: Ez dizuet askorik lagunduko<nl>hautsitako hanka honekin.

Speaker: Anne
English: Anyway. Thanks for helping us.
Translation: Dena dela. Eskerrik asko gu laguntzeagatik.

Speaker: Anne
English: At the end of this, I hope to see you guys again!
Translation: Dena amaitzean berriro elkar ikusiko dugula espero dut!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Aye, be careful out there younglings.

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Watch out for them sinister tin-cans now!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Psst!

Speaker: TrappedGuy
English: Hey... Psst!

Speaker: Bonanza
English: These pirates sure got this place locked down tight huh?
Translation: Pirata hauek inguru guztia hertsiki gotortu dute, e?

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Well...

Speaker: Bonanza
English: Not on my watch!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: WOOOOOOOOAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The escape route is shut!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What now!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Aha! Another exit!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But I won't be able to reach it!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Otus!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: OTUS!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Otus! Please get up!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus! We need to escape!
Translation: Maisu Otus! Ihes egin behar dugu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Come now, Master Otus!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We'll need to gather our courage and get out of here!
Translation: Ausart jokatu behar dugu orain, eta hemendik ihes egin!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Guys! Look!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's the Dreadnought's engine!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We... <15>We made it!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We actually made it!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let's rig this thing up and---

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm on it!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alright, you guys!<30><nl>This thing is rigged to blow!
Translation: Ondo, mutilok!<30><nl>Sabotatu dut hau eta lehertzear da!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Excellent work, Geddy!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Now, we should probably get out of he-

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]We did it!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]We stopped the pirates!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed, now let's g-

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]We saved Advent!<nl>And all the people!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: [1]We're the best team ever!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: True, true, but let's get mov-

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...We're heroes, you guys.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Uh-oh!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Wha-

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh my!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh no! This is bad!!!
Translation: Oi ez! Hau ez da batere ona!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This is really bad!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Otus? <30>Geddy?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We have to get out of here, [1]QUICKLY!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hup!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Don't fret, team! <nl><30>Leave this one to me!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Otus, <15>one of these doors should<nl>lead to the Dreadnought's engine.
Translation: Otus, <15>ate hauetariko batek<nl>Korazatuaren motorrerako bidea dauka atzean.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: When you find it, we'll help you destroy it.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hah...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: HAHA<10>HA<10>HA<10>HA!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We made it!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's just a question of time before<nl>the Dreadnought sinks!
Translation: Orain, korazatua hondoratzea<nl>denbora kontua baino ez da!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Heh.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: He<15>he<15>he.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: You guys sure are made of something else!
Translation: Zuek biok beste egur bateko ezpala zarete!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Even in a real rough spot,<nl>we seem to make a pretty good team!
Translation: Unerik zailenetan ere,<nl>talde ona egiten dugula dirudi!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: After this, I will no longer find<nl>a place among pirates.
Translation: Honen ondoren, ezingo naiz<nl>inoiz piraten artera bueltatu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Instead, I will find comfort among friends.<nl><60>True friends.
Translation: Trukean, lagunak izango ditut inguruan.<nl><60>Benetako lagunak.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But let's not linger here.<nl>Let's take to the skies.
Translation: Baina ez dezagun denbora gehiago galdu.<nl>Goazen zeruan gora.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus, would you mind---

Speaker: Rasta
English: Quick, let's...

Speaker: Rasta
English: Hahaha..!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Why, this makes sense!

Speaker: Rasta
English: How else would these buffoons<nl>get through our defences?
Translation: Nola lortuko ziaten ba ergel hauek<nl>gure defentsak gainditzerik, bestela.

Speaker: Rasta
English: You've been helping them all along.

Speaker: Rasta
English: And here you all are.

Speaker: Rasta
English: I'll finally be able to get<nl>revenge for your betrayal!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Step back, <30>he's all mine.
Translation: Atzera denok, <30>hau nirea duk oso osorik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I hoped that you would see sense.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: All this destruction. <15>This chaos.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Is this really what we were created for?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I suppose we shall have to fight here.
Translation: Suposatzen dut ez dugula borrokatu beste biderik.

Speaker: Rasta
English: The Captain!?

Speaker: Rasta
English: He's here!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: <b>M-<30>M-<60>Molstrom<b>!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus, we must escape at once!
Translation: Maisu Otus, berehala ihes egin behar dugu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Grab Master Geddy and fly!
Translation: Heldu Maisu Geddy eta hasi hegan!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'll go on ahead!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Come on Otus, let's...

Speaker: Rasta
English: Captain Molstrom, sir!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: What are you doing on deck?<nl><30>Get back to your posts.
Translation: Zer egiten duzue ontziaren bizkar gainean?<nl><30>Bueltatu zuen postuetara.

Speaker: Rasta
English: At once, Sir!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! Get up!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh no..!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You have to fly away!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I-I'll try to stall him!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: YAAH!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: FOOLS!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Come to see your capital BURN?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Well, take a good look.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OTUS, NOOOO!!!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: The time has come at last.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: You will get to watch.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Behold the destruction of Advent!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, I'm.<10>.<10>.<10> not sure what I want to do now.
Translation: Otus, ez.<10>.<10>.<10> dakit zer egin nahi dudan orain.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: None of the stuff we do<30> seems to work.
Translation: Ez dirudi egiten dugun ezerk<30> funtzionatzen duenik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe everyone's right when they say that we're just in the way.
Translation: Agian arrazoia dut beti traban gaudela diotenek.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I guess Alphonse knows best. <30>Maybe<nl>we should just follow him from now on?
Translation: Alphonsek zetzudun tipoa dirudi. <30>Agian<nl>hemendik aurrera berari jarraitzea da onena.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He seems to know what's going on<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Badirudi badakiela zer ari den gertatzen<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe it's best if you and Alphonse go.<nl><60>Like, <30>without me.
Translation: Agian onena litzateke Alphonse eta zu<nl>joatea. <60>Zuok bakarrik, <30>ni gabe.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe we'll have a better shot<nl>if we just stay here in Vellie.
Translation: Agian aukera gehiago izango ditugu<nl>hemen, Vellien, gelditzen bagara.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That way, we can't mess anything up.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe we can get our lives back on track again.
Translation: Agian gure betiko bizitzetara bueltatu ahalko gara.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Maybe I could finally settle down with<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Agian bizi berri bat has dezakegu nik eta<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Phew...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's good to take a break every<nl>once in a while, don't you think?
Translation: Ona da noizean behin<nl>atsedenaldi bat hartzea, ez duzu uste?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think we're on the right path, Otus.
Translation: Bide onetik goazela uste dut, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We should probably use that <b>teleporter<b> to get back<nl>into the floating continent when we're ready.
Translation: Seguruenik, prest gaudenean <b>telegarraiatzailea<b> erabili<nl>beharko genuke Kontinente Hegalarira itzultzeko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Although... I wouldn't mind relaxing a bit first.
Translation: Baina... ondo letorkiguke atsedenaldi bat lehenengo.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Are you feeling alright, Master Otus?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I can see that your wounds have recovered, but...
Translation: Ikusten dut zauriak sendatu zaizkizula, baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Not every hurt can be patched up just like that.
Translation: Zauri guztiak ez dira adabaki batekin ixten.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...I am sorry, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Feel free to stay here with me if you want a break.
Translation: Atseden hartu nahi baduzu, gelditu hemen lasai une batez.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Do you feel better?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A warm fireplace makes most things slightly better.
Translation: Sutondoaren bero goxoak min guztiak arintzen ditu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And I do not know if my company means anything to you, but...
Translation: Eta ez dakit nire konpainiak askorik balio duen zuretzat, baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I am very glad to be in your company.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I will be here as long as you need me.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I am glad to see that you have cheered up somewhat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It will get better, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let us hope that our friend Geddy recovers<nl>from this ordeal as well.
Translation: Espero dezagun gure lagun Geddy ere kolpe<nl>latz honetatik suspertuko dela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps you should check on him?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have been in hiding since we got here, but<nl>I know he has been in the graveyard a great deal.
Translation: Hona etorri ginenetik ezkutuan egon naiz, baina<nl>badakit hilerrian denbora asko eman duela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Floating Continent is high in the sky.
Translation: Kontinente Hegalaria zeruan oso goian dago.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If you head up after leaving Vellie,<nl>you will reach it eventually.
Translation: Vellietik irten eta gorantz jarraitzen baduzu,<nl>noizbait iritsiko zara bertara.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I shall wait here until<nl>you get out of the city.
Translation: Nik hemen itxoingo dut zuek<nl>herritik irteten zareten arte.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmm, I do hope Master Geddy will be alright.
Translation: Mmm, espero dut Maisu Geddy ondo egongo dela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Am I to understand that Advent was his home?
Translation: Ongi ulertu badut, bera Abendun jaio zen, ezta?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I don't think a pirate attack will<nl>happen here in Vellie for a while.
Translation: Ez dut uste tarte batean piratek<nl>Vellie erasoko dutenik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Molstrom's first priority will be to get<nl>his hands on the third and <b>final<b> relic.
Translation: Molstromen lehentasun nagusia hirugarren<nl>eta <b>azken<b> erlikia eskuratzea izango da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We'll leave the village when you're ready Otus.
Translation: Prest zaudenean irtengo gara herritik, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The final relic should be in the Floating Continent.
Translation: Azken erlikiak Kontinente Hegalarian behar luke egon.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It would seem Vellie is recovering, albeit slowly.
Translation: Poliki bada ere, badirudi Vellie lehengora bueltatzen dabilela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It should be fine to wait here<nl>for a while and recuperate.
Translation: Ez dago arazorik une batez<nl>hemen itxaron eta indarberritzeko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'm troubled by what we saw<nl>in the Floating Continent, Otus.
Translation: Kontinente Hegalarian ikusi genuenak<nl>ez dit lorik egiten uzten, Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Dirk seems to have abandoned his pride entirely.
Translation: Badirudi Dirkek bere ohorea guztiz abandonatu duela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The way he treated that spidery<nl>rascal is not like the Dirk I knew.
Translation: Nik ezagutzen nuen Dirkek ez luke<nl>armiarma-gizon hori tratatu zuen bezala tratatuko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But of course the most important thing<nl>is that we get the Relic before him.
Translation: Baina, noski, garrantzitsuena da<nl>erlikia berak baino lehenago aurkitzea.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We don't want to idle here too long.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If we are to infiltrate the pirate<nl>base, we must find a way in.
Translation: Piraten basera sartu nahi badugu<nl>horretarako bideren bat beharko dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Twig's family mentioned a <nl><b>hidden path<b> in Tropos, I believe?
Translation: Twigen senideek esan zuten Troposen<nl><b>ezkutuko bide<b> dagoela, ezta?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps we should start searching there.
Translation: Akaso handik hasi beharko genuke bilaketa.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I wonder what they might be<nl>planning to use the Relics for..?
Translation: Erlikiak zertarako erabiltzeko<nl>asmoa ote du ezezagunak..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Is it only for power..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Or do the Relics serve some other purpose?
Translation: Edo erlikiek beste egitekoren bat ote dute?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'm sorry, Master Otus.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There is so much to think about.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I am very old, and there are<nl>many memories to piece together.
Translation: Zahartua nago, eta<nl>oroitzapen ugari daude elkar lotzeko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I can't help but feel like<nl>there's something crucial I've forgotten.
Translation: Ezin dut burutik kendu atzetik<nl>ahaztu dudan funtsezko zerbait dagoen sentsazioa.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There are so many memories to piece together...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I can't help but feel like<nl>there's something crucial I've forgotten.
Translation: Ezin dut burutik kendu atzetik<nl>ahaztu dudan funtsezko zerbait dagoen sentsazioa.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: No-one knows what our original purpose was.
Translation: Inork ez daki zer helbururekin sortu gintuzten jatorrian.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Likely, we were merely <30>servants for the owls.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Using our strength, the owls could reach for higher knowledge.
Translation: Gure indarra erabiliz, hontzek goragoko jakintza eskuratu ahal izan zuten.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: They designed various models, each made for a specific function.
Translation: Hainbat modelo diseinatu zituzten, bakoitza zeregin zehatz baterako.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: We were expected to optimize.
Translation: Optimizatzeko gai izango ginela espero zen.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: We would constantly improve our ability to carry out our function.
Translation: Etengabe hobetu genuen geure zeregina burutzeko gaitasuna, antza.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: But as you know, <30>the ancient owls, and what remained of their cities,<30> all but vanished.
Translation: Baina, ondo dakizunez, <30>antzinako hontzak, eta haien hirietatik gelditzen ziren hondarrak,<30> erabat desagertu ziren.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Without their guidance, we continued our tasks. <30>Blindly. <30>For centuries...
Translation: Haien gidaritzarik gabe, gure zereginetan jarraitu genuen. <30>Itsu-itsuan. <30>Mendez mende...

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Molstrom, greatest among the war units,<30> rampaged.
Translation: Molstromek, gerra-unitateetan boteretsuenak,<30> bere amorrua askatu zuen.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Built for war, he always needs something to destroy.
Translation: Borrokarako sortu zutenez, beti dabil suntsitzeko zerbaiten bila.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: None could oppose him.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Those of us who didn't agree to follow him <20>were exterminated.
Translation: Bera ez jarraitzea erabaki zutenak <20>garbitu egin zituen.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Molstrom took us to the sky, and gave us a new name:
Translation: Molstromek zeruetara eraman ginduen, eta izen berri bat eman zigun:

Speaker: CamTarget
English: With him as our Captain, we roamed the sky, growing ever more powerful.
Translation: Bere agindupean, zeruko punta batetik bestera ibili ginen, gero eta boteretsuago eginez.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Until at last the Captain heard of the Relics.
Translation: Kapitainak Erlikien berri izan zuen arte.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: The Relics are artifacts of terrible power. <30>Remnants of the ancient owls at their peak.
Translation: Erlikiak botere izugarridun artefaktuak dira. <30>Antzinako hontzen arorik oparoenaren ondarea.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: To Molstrom, their power is irresistible.
Translation: Molstromentzat, haien boterea erakargarriegia da. Ezin dio tentazioari eutsi.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: Captain Molstrom has found two Relics.
Translation: Molstrom kapitainak bi erlikia aurkitu ditu.

Speaker: CamTarget
English: One that was hidden in Vellie...

Speaker: CamTarget
English: And the other in Advent.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: The Floating Continent.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: Greatest of the owl homes.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translation: Hemen ekoitzitako makinak<nl>munduak inoiz ikusi dituen bikainenak ziren.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translation: Historian lehenengoz, hontzen teknologiak<nl>bizitzaren gaitasunak gainditu zituen.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: So says the book of Noctae.

Speaker: DarkFigure
English: If<10>.<10>.<10>. I have chosen the right path<10>.<10>.<10>.
Translation: Ea<10>.<10>.<10>. bide ona aukeratu ote dudan<10>.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Was <30>that an acquaintance of yours?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Nope.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He sure knows his owl history though...
Translation: Baina ondo ezagutzen du hontzen historia, alajaina...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...And it seems that he's following us.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If he's got anything to do with the<nl>attack on Advent, <30>I'll make him pay!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Next time, <30>let's grab him!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: H<5>m<5>m<5>m<5>, well, <30>we can certainly try.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But our most important task is to get<nl>to that <b>last relic<b> before Molstrom does!
Translation: Baina gure zereginik garrantzizkoena<nl><b>azken erlikia<b> aurkitzea da, Molstromek eskuratu baino lehen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OK, guys. <30>I-I'm not a huge fan of dark caves and...
Translation: Hara, mutilok. <30>N-Ni ez naiz kobazulo ilunetan sartu zale eta...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...I've heard <b><15>m[1]eat-<15>e[1]ating <15>gnats<b> thrive in these parts.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But, it's the only way forward!
Translation: Baina, aurrera egiteko bide bakarra da!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'll stand ready with my <b>musket<b>, Master Geddy!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's not much, but it may <b>provide us some light<b>.
Translation: Ez da askorik, baina <b>argi pixka bat emango digu<b>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Thanks, Alphonse, that'll have to do!

Speaker: Rasta
English: The captain will be pleased when we bring him this relic.
Translation: Kapitaina asko poztuko duk erlikia hau eramaten diogunean.

Speaker: Rasta
English: Hurry, nab it and let's skedaddle.
Translation: Arin, hartu ezak eta goazen korrika.

Speaker: Twig
English: Alright!

Speaker: Twig
English: Whoa, what's going on!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Argh, you must have rustled it somehow!
Translation: Oraingoan ere egingo huen hankasartzeren bat!

Speaker: Rasta
English: I'm gonna get out of here<nl>before you screw up everything.
Translation: Ni banoak hemendik hik<nl>dena izorratu baino lehen.

Speaker: Twig
English: Hey, wait up!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: AGAIN!? <30>You cowards!<nl><30>You <30>absolute <30>[1]COWARDS!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You'll pay for what you've done!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Raaargh!

Speaker: Twig
English: What crawled up green guy's butt!?<nl><30>He seems real mad for some reason!
Translation: Zerk egin dio hozka ipurdian tipo berdeari!?<nl><30>Amorru bizian dago zerbaitegatik!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Who cares!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Just alert me the second they get through the door!
Translation: Hik esaidak ate hori gurutzatzen badute!

Speaker: Rasta
English: I don't have time for any more distractions!

Speaker: Twig
English: Will do!

Speaker: Rasta
English: Make sure these fools don't get through here!
Translation: Ziurtatu ergel hauek ez dutela atea gurutzatzen!

Speaker: Twig
English: No problem

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "There has been some infighting, and some of<nl>the main architects have left the project."
Translation: "Barne-liskar batzuk izan dira, eta arkitekto<nl>nagusietako batzuek proiektua utzi dute."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "They have been banished from the<nl>continent, and work continues."
Translation: "Kontinentetik kanporatuak izan dira,<nl>eta lanek aurrera diraute."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The light cradle is operational, and<nl>we have all the power that we need."
Translation: "Argi-sehaska martxan dago, eta behar<nl>genuen energia guztia lortu dugu."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "Construction of the hex machine itself<nl>has been delayed due to the immense<nl>complexity of the structure."
Translation: "Konjuru-makinaren eraikuntza<nl>atzeratu egin da, egituraren konplexutasun<nl>izugarria dela-eta."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "I hope I will see construction begin in my lifetime."
Translation: "Eraikuntza ni hil aurretik hasiko den itxaropena daukat."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh my... I recognize this language.
Translation: Ama maitea... ezagutzen dut hizkuntza hau.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's written by an ancient owl.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let me read it for you...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "IT'S A DISASTER IT'S A DISASTER<nl>IT'S A DISASTER IT'S A DISASTER..."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It goes on like that for a while.
Translation: Eta horrela jarraitzen du tarte batez.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The Hex Machine is beginning to take shape."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "I'm not sure anyone fully understands the design<nl>anymore, but initial tests have been successful."
Translation: "Ez dakit ziur inork ulertzen duen guztiz diseinua<nl>dagoeneko, baina hasierako probak arrakastaz burutu dira."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The light cradle is over capacity, and we<nl>are drawing power from the continent itself."
Translation: "Argi-sehaska gainkargaturik dago, eta<nl>energia kontinentetik bertatik ari gara erauzten."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "We will fire up the Hex Machine within<nl>a few years, when the Relics are charged."
Translation: "Konjuru-makina urte gutxi batzuen buruan<nl>piztuko dugu, Erlikiak kargatzen direnean."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "I wish my father could have been here to see this."
Translation: "Nire aita hau ikusteko bizirik egotea nahiko nuke."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "Clearing out this continent has taken a<nl>while, but we can finally begin our work."
Translation: "Kontinente hau garbitzea asko kosta zaigu,<nl>baina, azkenean, ekin diezaiokegu lanari."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The work from the abandoned temple has paid<nl>off, and we have been able to make the<nl>local wildlife part of the theorem solver."
Translation: "Tenplu abandonatuko lanek eman dute<nl>beren fruitua, eta bertako basabitzitza<nl>teoriaren soluzioaren parte izatea lortu dugu."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "We'll augment them and make them<nl>excavate with the automatons."
Translation: "Ugaldu egingo ditugu, eta lurra<nl>zulatzeko erabiliko automatekin batera."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "I estimate that within a few decades<nl>of excavation, we can begin construction."
Translation: "Nire kalkuluen arabera, hamarkada gutxi<nl>batzuez zulatu ondoren, hasi ahalko dugu eraikuntza."

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You! Don't move, <30>o-<5>or I'll shoot!
Translation: Ei, zu! Ez mugitu, <30>e-<5>edo tiro egingo dut!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: H-hey!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Aw man! <30>He got away!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Why does this keep happening!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmm. <30>That spider person...<30> He<nl>does not seem particularly malicious.
Translation: Mmmm. <30>Armiarma-gizon horrek...<30><nl>Ez dirudi bereziki maltzurra denik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If I were to guess, I'd say he<nl>does not know what trouble he is in.
Translation: Esango nuke ez dakiela<nl>zer nahastetan sartu den ere.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Dirk, however... <30>My former comrade.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: He trapped us in here with that, <30><b>thing<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The next time we meet him,<nl>I fear we might have to<10>.<10>.<10>.
Translation: Hurrengo ikusten dugun aldian,<nl>beldur naiz ez ote dugun<10>.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...<15>Ah, no matter. <30>Let's find a way out of here!
Translation: ...<15>A, berdin dio. <30>Bila dezagun hemendik irteteko bidea!

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Alphonse!?

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Thought you could weasel yourself<nl>back in with the pirates, huh?
Translation: Ezkutuan berriro pirata artean sartu<nl>ahalko hintzela uste huan, ala?

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: You've even brought friends!

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: An owl, no less.

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Funny how quickly you can change sides!
Translation: Ikusgarria duk, zeinen bizkor aldatzen haizen aldez!

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Let's see how well he can fly,<nl><60>after I've cut his wings off.
Translation: Ikustagun nolako ondo egiten duen hegan,<nl><60>nik hegoak ebaki ondoren.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You're not ruffling a single feather on Otus, or...
Translation: Otusi luma bakar bat ukitzen badiozu...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Or you'll be sorry<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Twig
English: Hahaha! Look at this guy.

Speaker: Twig
English: It's Sir Greensalot!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: YOU!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's your fault!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: All of Advent!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: All of this!!!

Speaker: Twig
English: Heh, maybe you should have<nl>stayed at your post in Vellie.
Translation: Je, agian zure Vellieko postuan<nl>gelditu behar zenuen.

Speaker: Twig
English: Right, <b>Dirk<b>?

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Shut up, <b>Twig<b>. You're as<nl>much of a loser as they are.
Translation: Itxizak ahoa,  <b>Twig<b>. Hi ere<nl>haiek bezain galtzailea haiz.

Speaker: Twig
English: Huh?

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Heh, don't worry, Goggles,<nl><b>I'm<b> not going to hurt you.
Translation: Je, ez kezkatu, Satorra,<nl><b>Nik<b> ez diat ezer egingo.

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Not when I have someone to do that for me...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Huh!?

Speaker: Twig
English: Wait!

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Whoops!

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: Looks like you woke it up.

Speaker: Twig
English: Dirk! What are you doing!?

Speaker: RastaPirate
English: It's been fun <b>Twig<b>, but<nl>we don't need you anymore.
Translation: Dibertigarria izan duk, <b>Twig<b>, baina<nl>jada ez diat hire laguntzarik behar.

Speaker: Twig
English: What?! No!

Speaker: BossBody
English: BZZZT!

Speaker: BossBody
English: Boot sequence initiated...

Speaker: BossBody
English: Directive: Protect the Hex Machine.

Speaker: BossBody
English: Destroy all interloping agents.

Speaker: RastaLavaRelic
English: Huh...

Speaker: RastaLavaRelic
English: You again?

Speaker: RastaLavaRelic
English: I don't know how you got past the defence system...
Translation: Ez zekiat nola lortu duan defentsa-sistema hori pasatzea...

Speaker: RastaLavaRelic
English: But there's no way you're getting this relic before me!
Translation: Baina ez pentsa erlikia hau nik baino lehen lortuko duanik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OK, guys, it seems there's more to this<nl>place than that <b>blob <15>monster<b> <30>thing.
Translation: Adi, mutilok, badirudi leku honetan badela<nl><15><b>munstro <30>amorfo<b> <10>horretaz aparteko arriskurik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...There's no telling what we'll encounter ahead!
Translation: ...Ez dago jakiterik aurrerago zer aurkituko dugun!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Not to worry, Master Geddy.<nl><30>We've had some great progress!
Translation: Ez arduratu, Maisu Geddy.<nl><30>Aurrerapen dexente egin dugu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Isn't that right, Master Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...<30>I think he's in a teleporter coma.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey, buddy. <30>It's going to be OK, man.
Translation: Ei, lagun. <30>Dena ondo irtengo da, motel.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm always gonna be there for you!<nl><30>No matter what!
Translation: Beti izango nauzu zure alboan!<nl><30>Gertatzen dena gertatzen dela!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Now, let's go!!! <30>This place<nl>is nothing for the likes of us!
Translation: Eta orain, goazen!!! <30>Leku hau<nl>ez dago gu modukoontzat egina!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmm. I think we need to find a way to reactivate this teleporter.
Translation: Mmmm. Uste dut telegarraiatzaile hau berraktibatzeko eraren bat aurkitu behar dugula.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think there are some way to do this from Tropos.
Translation: Uste dut Troposetik hori egiteko aukera dagoela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Once we activate it from Tropos, we<nl>should use the teleporter to get back here.
Translation: Troposetik aktibatzea lortzen badugu, hara<nl>itzultzeko telegarraiatzailea erabili beharko genuke.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That will surely trigger some kind of<nl>mechanism to help us open the security door.
Translation: Ziur horrek mekanismoren bat aktibatuko duela,<nl>eta segurtasun-atea irekitzen lagunduko digu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: How curious....

Speaker: Alphonse
English: These displays are showing some schematics, along with a log.
Translation: Pantaila hauetan eskema batzuk ageri dira, eta egunkari bat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It says...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The Hex is complete.<40> The world is destroyed.<40> Looping..."
Translation: "Konjurua burutu da.<40> Mundua suntsitu da.<40> Begizta..."

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The [1]WORLD is [1]DESTROYED?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: WHAT DOES THAT MEAN???

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "The Hex is complete.<40> The world is destroyed.<40> Looping..."
Translation: "Konjurua burutu da.<40> Mundua suntsitu da.<40> Begizta..."

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Well, the world is definitely still out there.
Translation: Beno, argi dago mundua oraindik hemen dagoela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I wonder what the owls were doing in here.
Translation: Zertan ari ote ziren hontzak hemen barruan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It sounds... like the work of madness.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't want to stay in this<nl>place any longer than we have to!
Translation: Ez dut leku honetan beharrezkoa dena<nl>baino denbora gehiago egon nahi!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's just get this Relic before<nl>Dirk does and get out of here!
Translation: Eskura dezagu Erlikia hau Dirkek baino lehenago<nl>eta alde egin dezagun hemendik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! Are you alright?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We need to find a way out of here.
Translation: Hemendik irteteko bide bat aurkitu behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think we're in over our heads!
Translation: Nahaste ederrean sartu garela uste dut!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's look for an exit, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Is the ground shaking?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get out of here before it's too late!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Urgh, I wish Twig would just quit the spider act<nl>and stay at home<20> like a normal stick bug.
Translation: Hara, ea noiz uzten dion Twigek armiarma plantak egiteari<20> eta<nl>itzultzen den etxera intsektu makila normalak bezala.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: How did you end up with Twig, anyway?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Twig's always been a troublemaker,<nl>driving everyone nuts with worry.
Translation: Twig beti izan da bazter-nahaslea,<nl>guztiok erotzeraino kezkatzen gaitu.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Don't tell Twig I said that,<30> the truth hurts the sensitive.
Translation: Ez esan Twigi hau esan dudanik,<30> egiak min ematen dio.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Oh, you can't speak at all?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: I guess that takes care of the problem!
Translation: Tira, ba orduan ez dago arazorik!

Context Note (not to translate): SadGuy is Twig without his costume
Speaker: SadGuy
English: ...What are you whispering about over there?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: We might look upper class to you,<nl>but times in Mesos are tough!
Translation: Baliteke zuri goi klasekoak garela iruditzea,<nl>baina Mesosen garai zailak bizi ditugu!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: There used to be rolling green hills here!
Translation: Hemen lehen muino berdeak genituen inguru guztian!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Now it's a frozen wasteland.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: All the more reason for Twig to stay at<nl>home, and stop with the silly adventures!
Translation: Arrazoi sobera Twig etxean gelditzeko,<nl>hor zeharko abentura txoroak alde batera utzita!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: We could certainly use every<nl>helping hand we can get around here!
Translation: Lor genezakeen laguntza guztia<nl>beharko dugu egoera aldatzeko!

Context Note (not to translate): SadGuy is Twig without his costume
Speaker: SadGuy
English: Tsch.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You want to take the shortcut to Strato?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Back for more shenanigans eh?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Well, make sure not to get us<nl>into trouble with the pirates OK?
Translation: Tira, baina ez gaitzazu gu<nl>piratekin arazotan sartu, ados?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: And... <30>take care of Twig will you?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Bro, Pa! The pirates<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: They've made their base here in Mesos!
Translation: Haien basea hemen eraiki dute, Mesosen!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Yes, we know that, Twig.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: It's worrisome, but we just have to accept it.
Translation: Eta kezkagarria da, baina ez dugu onartu besterik.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: ...B-but you have to evacuate!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: No, Twig.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: This is our home.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: We won't evacuate just because<nl>there are some pirates nearby.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Please!<30> You don't understand!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: No!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: We cannot let fear dictate our actions!
Translation: Gure ekintzak ezin ditu beldurrak erabaki!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: It seems I have to make you understand.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Let me show you up close how<nl>an adult stares death in the eye!
Translation: Utzidazu erakusten nola begiratzen<nl>dion heldu batek Heriori!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Just, <30>gimme a second here.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Pirates, huh? <30>I'll give you pirate!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: There you are, Twig!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Now, if you see a pirate, you have to-
Translation: Beraz, pirata bat ikusten baduzu, egin beharrekoa-

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: P-<15>P-<30>pirate!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Huh, what's that? <30>Speak up son.
Translation: Zer, zer da hori? <30>Hitz egin, seme.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: BIG PIRATE!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: SEEK COVER!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Now, now!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We just want to talk!
Translation: Hitz egin baino ez dugu nahi!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Are<5>.<5>.<5>. <30>are you the pirate leader?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: ...Yes!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Yes?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Yes!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hrum-um. <30>And I have come bearing<nl>news of our operation here in Mesos!
Translation: Mjum-um. <30>Eta hemen, Mesosen<nl>aurrera daramagun operazioaren berri ematera nator!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We are.<5>.<5>.<5> Um, we are planning to...<30> <5>E<5>r<5>r<5>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We are planning to build our<nl>sprawling citadel, <30>right here!
Translation: Hiribildu zabal bat eraikitzeko asmoa<nl>daukagu, <30>hementxe bertan!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Mesos will be the epicenter of our new rule!<nl><30>Rich in wealth and all manner of luxury!
Translation: Mesos izango da gure aginpidearen erdigunea!<nl><30>Aberastasun eta luxuz betea!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And we need Twig for, uh...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: For, um....

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Cooking..?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: ...Cooking?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: ...Twig.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: There is no need to play games.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: If you want to leave with these friends<nl>of yours, you are free to do so.
Translation: Lagun hauekin alde egin nahi baduzu,<nl>aske zara hemendik joateko.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: We may not like it, but we'll support you.
Translation: Ez dugu gustora hartuko,<nl>baina zure erabakia babestuko dugu.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: But don't forget that this is your home.
Translation: Baina ez ahaztu hau zure etxea dela.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: And we'll be here when you return.
Translation: Eta hemen izango gaituzu itzuli nahi baduzu.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Is there anything we can help you with, Twig?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We need to get into the pirate base.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Alright.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: There is a passage hidden behind a waterfall<nl>in Tropos that might take you there.
Translation: Harako pasabide ezkutu bat dago<nl>Troposeko ur-jauzi baten atzean.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You might not remember, but we sometimes used it as kids.
Translation: Agian ez duzu oroituko, baina txikitxotan batzuetan erabiltzen genuen.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: I can take you to Strato, if you like.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Thanks bro<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Sorry for trying to trick you guys.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Don't worry.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: It would take more than a prank of yours to fool your old Pa!
Translation: Ez pentsa horren erraz engaina nazakezunik!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Now be on your way.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: You have something important to do, don't you?
Translation: Egiteko garrantzitsu bat daukazu, ala ez?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Do you want to go to Tropos straight away?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: OK, little one. Twig will help you home now, OK?
Translation: Ongi da, txikia. Twigek etxera lagunduko zaitu, ados?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: He'll follow you when you leave.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Hi there, young one.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Still haven't found your way homeward huh?
Translation: Oraindik ez duzu etxerako bidea aurkitu, ezta?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: You want Twig to help you on your way?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: I hope Twig hasn't caused<nl>too much trouble for you.
Translation: Espero dut Twigek arazo<nl>gehiegi sortu ez izana.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Twig's always been a... <30>special <30>case.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: But I'm glad some good friends turned up!
Translation: Baina pozgarria da ikustea lagun onak dituela inguruan!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Maybe you can recommend that Twig<nl>stay in Mesos and leave you alone?
Translation: Akaso Twigi Mesosen gelditzeko<nl>gomenda diezaiokezu, zuekin joan beharrean?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: I can hear you...

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Oh, and try to tell Twig not to<nl>dress up in that silly costume.
Translation: O, eta saiatu Twig mozorro txepel<nl>hori erantz dezan konbentzitzen.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Not to sound old-fashioned, but it<nl>D<5>O<5>E<5>S<30> shame our entire family.
Translation: Ez dut antigoalekoa naizela pentsa dezazun nahi,<nl>baina familia osoa LOTSARAZTEN du.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: I can still hear you...

Speaker: OldGuy
English: ...Between you and me, Otus...

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Joking aside, I understand why Twig would want to leave.
Translation: Txantxak alde batera utzita, uler dezaket<nl>Twigek hemendik irten nahi izatea.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Every day here is colder than the last, and there<nl>isn't much company here except Roland and me.
Translation: Egunak gero eta hotzagoak dira hemen, eta<nl>ez dauka Roland eta bion konpainia besterik.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: I just want to know that Twig stays out of trouble,
Translation: Nik nahi dudan bakarra Twig arazotan ez sartzea da,

Speaker: OldGuy
English: ...And comes back home one day.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Why. Is it visiting time again?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Make sure not to freeze out there!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: It's getting colder by the day up here!
Translation: Goi honetan egunak gero eta hotzagoak dira!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: My son here will take you to Strato when you're ready.
Translation: Nire semeak Stratora eramango zaituzte prest zaudetenean.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hey! Wait up!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: That was a close call, huh guys?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: But we did it!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We're a great team!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Team?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You helped the pirates attack Vellie!
Translation: Zuk lagundu zenien piratei Vellie erasotzen!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You were still on their side<nl>during the attack on Advent!
Translation: Eta oraindik haien alde zeunden<nl>Abendu eraso zutenean!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You tried to get us killed<nl>in the Floating Continent!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And you think you're on our [1]TEAM?!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm <60>sorry...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I- <30>I didn't realize what<nl>the pirates were up to...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I just wanted someone to hang out with.
Translation: Lagun egingo zidan norbait bakarrik behar nuen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We don't want your [1]company!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We don't want anything to do with you!
Translation: Ez dugu zurekin inongo harremanik izan nahi!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Isn't that right, guys?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Guys?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Alas...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I am hardly one to berate<nl>anyone for following pirates.
Translation: Ez naiz nor beste bati<nl>piratak laguntzea leporatzeko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I co-operated with them in the<nl>attack on Vellie together with Dirk.
Translation: Piraten kolaboratzaile izan nintzen<nl>Vellieko erasoan, Dirkekin batera.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And I am a pirate myself.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are <30>you <60>[1]serious?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That's not the same at all.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Suit yourselves.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But I don't have to put up with this.
Translation: Baina ez daukat zertan hau jasan beharrik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm... <60>I'm going back <30>to Vellie.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Is he <30>gone?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Aw man, <30>I didn't mean to cause any trouble.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I think <30>I'll go home now.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmmm, well.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Do not worry, Master Otus, <30>Geddy will come around.
Translation: Ez kezkatu, Maisu Otus, <30>Geddy bere senera itzuliko da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Meanwhile, let's try and find a way out of here.
Translation: Bitartean, bila dezagun hemendik irteteko bidea.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hey! <60>You need some help over there?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Listen, <30>if you help me get back home,<nl><30>I'll help you get out of here.
Translation: Entzun, <30>zuek etxera itzultzen laguntzen banauzue,<nl><30>nik hemendik irteten lagunduko dizuet.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'll let you pick me up, but, <30>be careful<nl>not to tear my get-up, will ya?
Translation: Hel nazazu, nahi baduzu, <30>baina kontuz<nl>nire jantzia urratu gabe, ados?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: So the pirates have set up their base here..!
Translation: Beraz, piratek hemen ezarri dute kanpamendua...!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Pirate <30>base?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: But, <30>it's like, <30>right next door to my family's house!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Indeed. <30>This doesn't bode well.
Translation: Benetan ere. <30>Honek ez du itxura onik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps Dirk acquired the final relic<nl>before the dungeon flooded?
Translation: Akaso Dirkek azken erlikia eskuratu du<nl>ziega labaz bete aurretik?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It looks like there's no way in...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...And even if there was,<30><nl>we'd be discovered immediately.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We have to warn your family, Twig.
Translation: Zure familia jakinaren gainean jarri behar dugu, Twig.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If the pirate base is here,<30><nl>the occupation will only get worse.
Translation: Piraten basea hemen badago,<30><nl>okupazioa okerragotu baino ez da egingo.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I can't believe I was suckered into working for these guys<20>.<20>.<20>.
Translation: Ezin dut sinetsi tipo hauentzako lan egiteko engainatu nindutenik<20>.<20>.<20>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: No wonder my dad was suspicious of me.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: .<5>.<5>.<60>Let's go warn 'em.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Shhhh...<30><nl>It's my family, <30>they're in trouble.

Speaker: NosyPirate
English: Our inspection is over for today.

Speaker: NosyPirate
English: Don't try anything stupid if you value your lives.
Translation: Ez egin tontakeriarik zuen biziak mantendu nahi badituzue.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: We won't cause any trouble.

Speaker: NosyPirate
English: Good. As long as you don't cause<nl>trouble, the <b>occupation<b> will be<nl>over before you know it.
Translation: Ondo. Arazorik sortzen ez badiguzue, <b>okupazioa<b><nl>zuek uste baino lehenago amaituko da.

Speaker: NosyPirate
English: I'll be back tomorrow.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: That scum destroyed half our furniture.
Translation: Zabor-pilo horrek altzarien erdia suntsitu digute.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Tcheh!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: At least they didn't find the wine cellar.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Let's just get back inside<nl>before they come back.
Translation: Goazen berriro barrura,<nl>haiek itzuli baino lehen.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: It's too cold out here for my old bones.
Translation: Hotz gehiegi egiten du kanpoan nire hezur zaharrentzat.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Aw man, <30>I didn't think the pirates<nl>would cause trouble for MY family.
Translation: Arraioa, <30>ez nuen uste piratek<nl>NIRE familiari arazorik sortuko ziotenik.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'd better go check on 'em!
Translation: Nola dauden ikustera joan behar dut!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmmm.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Why are there pirates around here?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We should investigate this area, but...
Translation: Zonalde hau ikertu behar dugu, baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...I do not like this, Otus.<30> If we proceed,<nl>we need to be very, <30>very <30>careful.
Translation: ...itxura txarra hartzen diot honi, Otus.<30> Aurrera egitekotan,<nl>oso, <30>oso <30>kontuz ibili behar dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I shall stay out of sight for now.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Do you think you could, <30>like,<nl><30>help me a bit over here?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I can't get past this ice here.
Translation: Ezin dut izotz zutabe honetatik aurrera egin.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Alright! I think I can make my way home from here!
Translation: Bikain! Uste dut hemendik etxera bueltatzeko gai izango naizela!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Thanks for the ride, fellas!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Well. <30>That was fun<10>.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I wonder if my family was happy to see me at all.
Translation: Nire familia ni bueltan ikusteaz<nl>poztu ote den galdetzen diot nire buruari...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Surely they must have been somewhat worried?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: <b>Especially<b> <30>when there seems to be pirates about.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I doubt it. <30>Every time I come home,<nl>they go on about what a freak I am.
Translation: Ez dakit ba. <30>Etxera bueltan natorrenero,<nl>matraka bera <b>arraroa<b> naizelako.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Would you, like, <30>mind if I hang<nl>out with you guys for a while?
Translation: Axola zaizue, zera, <30>zuokin<nl>gelditzen banaiz, une batez?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Well, until you find a way outta here?
Translation: Tira, behintzat hemendik nola atera pentsatzen duzuen bitartean?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: As it stands, Geddy has yet to return, <30>and<nl>we could certainly use your unique abilities!
Translation: Une honetan, Geddy oraindik ez da bueltatu, <30>eta<nl>zure gaitasunak lagungarri izango zaizkigu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What do you say, Otus?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Really? You'll let me join?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Thank you!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'll help you in any way I can!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: OK. <30>I guess I'll have<nl>to help you get back home now.
Translation: Ongi da. <30>Orain etxera bueltatzen<nl>lagundu beharko dizuet.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'll assist you if you need me.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: This guy was my neighbour when I was little.
Translation: Tipo hau auzoa nuen, txikia nintzenean.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: He used to live here with his older brother.
Translation: Hemen bizi zen bere anaia nagusiarekin.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: They were always playing music into the night.<5>.<5>.<20><nl>Back when it was warmer up here.
Translation: Gauero musika jotzen aritzen ziren.<5>.<5>.<20><nl>Goialde hauek beroagoak zirenean.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: ...He must have gotten lost in the snow.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: No-one ever told me about it<10>.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Inork ez zidan inoiz bere berri eman<10>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Perhaps this chest is his?
Translation: Agian kutxa hau berea izango da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It contains a lot of sheet music,<20><nl>and some old drawings and trinkets.
Translation: Partituraz betea dago,<20><nl>eta marrazki zahar batzuk eta hainbat purtzileria ere badaude.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And there's a note.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: "Dear little brother...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have put your things in this<nl>chest, so they can stay with you.
Translation: Hire gauzak kutxa honetan<nl> sartu ditiat, betiko hirekin egon daitezen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The songs we wrote together,<20> and many other moments we shared.
Translation: Batera idatzitako abestiak,<20> eta partekatutako beste momentu ugari.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I will not be coming to see you as often anymore.
Translation: Hemendik aurrera ez haut lehen bezainbeste bisitatuko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have to go somewhere warmer.
Translation: Inguru beroago batera joan behar diat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The colder it gets, the more I sit in this<nl>cave, thinking of how I should have found you.
Translation: Zenbat eta gehiago hoztu, orduan eta denbora gehiago ematen diat<nl>koba honetan, buruari bueltak ematen, nola ez hindudan aurkitu pentsatuz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: In the cold,<30> you are all I can think of.
Translation: Hotzak inguraturik,<30> higan baino ezin diat pentsatu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But I promise I will not forget you.
Translation: Baina zin dagiat ez haudala inoiz ahaztuko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I will bring both my drums<30> and your drums with me when I go.
Translation: Noanean, nirekin eramango ditiat nire danborrak<30> eta baita hireak ere.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I was never good at playing, but<nl>I still love the songs you made.
Translation: Ez nauk inoiz danborjole ona izan, baina<nl>oraindik maite ditiat hik sortutako abestiak.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Maybe if I can make someone smile with it,<nl>it'll feel like you're listening to me play again.
Translation: Agian, abestiokin norbait alaitzea lortzen badiat,<nl>hi ere entzuten hagoala sentituko diat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I hope one day I will only remember you<nl>when it's warm and things are good.
Translation: Espero diat egunen batean zutaz oroituko naizela<nl>soilik epelean, eta gauzak ondo daudenean.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And I hope you don't miss me as much as I miss you."
Translation: Eta espero diat hik ez nauala nik hi bezainbeste faltan botako."

Speaker: Mechanic
English: .<5>.<5>.<5>Let's put the note back in.<5>.<5>.<20> and close the chest.
Translation: .<5>.<5>.<5>Sar dezagun oharra berriro barrura.<5>.<5>.<20> eta itxi dezagun kutxa.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey.<5>.<5>.<20> You don't know me,<20> but...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He found a nice place...
Translation: Leku eder bat aurkitu du zuretzat...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: .<5>.<5>.<5>And everyone really likes your music.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll let you rest again now.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But he didn't forget you.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Come on, guys.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's give him some peace.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Man, do you know how to get rid of this ice?
Translation: Aizu, badakizu izotz hau nola kendu?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: Can I help you with anything?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: As you can see, they were right.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: I'm a stick bug just like them.
Translation: Intsektu makila bat naiz, haiek bezala.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: So boring...

Speaker: SadGuy
English: At least I can be a spider<nl>when I'm not in here.
Translation: Gutxienez, hemen ez nagoenean,<nl>armiarma bat izan naiteke.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: I'm glad I can hang out with you guys.
Translation: Pozten nau zuekin egon ahal izateak.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: That way I don't have to be at home.
Translation: Horrela ez dut etxean gelditu beharrik.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: Lemme know when we're leaving<nl>so I can put on my suit again.
Translation: Abisaidazu joateko ordua denean,<nl>berriro nire jantzia janzteko.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hi, pa. <30>Hi, bro.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm home.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Ah, <30>Twig? <30>Is that you over there?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: ...So it is!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: And you brought home a friend!
Translation: Eta lagun bat ekarri duzu etxera!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Oh? Still hanging out<nl>with pirate friends then?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: T-<30>Twig hasn't brought a pirate<nl>into the house now?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: This is Otus.<30> He's an owl.<30> From Vellie.
Translation: Hau Otus da.<30> Hontz bat da.<30> Velliekoa.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I wanted to check to see if you were alright-
Translation: Zer moduz doakizuen jakin nahi nuen-

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You're still <b>pretending<b> to be a <b>spider<b>,<20> are you?
Translation: Oraindik ere <b>armiarma plantak<b> egiten zabiltza, ezta?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You see, <30>Otus from Vellie, <30><nl>Twig here has always been a weirdo.
Translation: Badakizu, <30>Otus, Vellieko laguna, <30><nl>Twig beti izan da berezi xamarra.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: <b>Dressing up as a spider<b> because<nl>it's 'c<5>o<5>o<5>l<5>er' <30>than being a <b>stick bug<b>.
Translation: <b>Armiarmaz mozorrotzen da<b> uste duelako<nl><b>intsektu makila<b> izatea baino hobe dela.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: It <30>IS <30>cooler!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Enough, Twig!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Get out of that costume, and let's talk.
Translation: Erantzi mozorro hori, eta hitz egin dezagun.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Pa... Please, <60>not in front of my friend.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Just do it, Twig.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: *<b>Sigh.<b>*

Speaker: SadGuy
English: There. <30>Happy now?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Great!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: We just want to ask a few questions<nl>without you looking like an idiot.
Translation: Galdera batzuk ditugu egiteko, eta ez dut nahi<nl>zuk txorimalo itxurarekin erantzuterik.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: So!

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Are you home to stay this time?

Speaker: OldGuy
English: OR are you still in league<nl>with those insistent pirates?
Translation: EDO oraindik pirata txatxu horien<nl>adiskide izaten jarraitzen duzu?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: The pirates ditched me.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: They were just using me.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: And this guest here?<nl>Is he a delinquent like you?
Translation: Eta hemengo gonbidatu hau?<nl>Zu moduko gaizkile bat da?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: ...Otus is a good guy,<20> bro.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: He just wants to find his way back home.
Translation: Etxerako bidea aurkitu nahi du, ez besterik.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Hmmm. <30>Well then. Make yourself at home, Otus.
Translation: Mmmm. <30>Ongi da. Zure etxean zaude, Otus.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: I apologize for the rude welcome.<nl>You can never be too careful these days.
Translation: Barkatu harrera zakar honengatik.<nl>Gaur egun ez dago inortaz fidatzerik.

Speaker: OldGuy
English: Welcome to the <b>Stick<b> family's home.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Tcheh!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Back, huh?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Lemme know if you need to<nl>get down there again.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: I'll meet you outside.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: Just... a second OK?

Speaker: SadGuy
English: Hey, wait up! <30>I'll come with you.

Speaker: SadGuy
English: Just... <30>lemme put my threads back on.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Alright, follow me.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Alright! Tell me if you need any help.
Translation: Oso ongi! Esan laguntzarik behar baduzue.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Here we are!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You'll find your way to Tropos from here!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Remember!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: You will find the hidden entrance to the<nl>pirate base <b>behind a waterfall in Tropos<b>!
Translation: Piraten baserako sarrera ezkutua<nl><b>Troposeko ur-jauzi baten atzean<b> dago!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: By the way, <30><b>Twig<b>...

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Did you, by chance, <30>notice any<nl>tremors on your way up here?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Oh yeah, <30>that was us!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Otus's friends woke up a <b>giant snake monster<b>!
Translation: Otusen lagunek <b>suge erraldoi<b> bat iratzarri dute!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I had to come save 'em!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: What?!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Did anyone get hurt?!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Are you OK?!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Don't worry, bro!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We're pretty tough.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Tcheh!

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Just try not to get into trouble, OK!?

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Bah, it doesn't matter.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Just be careful out there will ya.<nl>Come home from time to time.
Translation: Baina kontuz ibili, mesedez.<nl>Eta etorri etxera bisitan noizean behin.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Take care in this passage as well.<nl>It's been long since I last used it.
Translation: Kontuz pasabide honetan ere.<nl>Ez da denbora askoan erabili.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Might be monsters about.

Speaker: RudeGuy
English: Don't get into more trouble, or I'll tell pa!
Translation: Eta ez bazterrik nahastu, edo aitari esango diot!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Alright..!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Let's have some fun!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Hey there, mister Owl!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: You ready to fly?

Speaker: Penguin1
English: That was some nice flying, sir!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: I like you, sir!

English: Giddy up!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: You are the master of <b>The Cannon<b>!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Use it whenever you want, guy!

English: Careful to not hit any walls, bud!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: Go go!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: You soar like the wind, bud!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Alright, buds! He's in!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: KA-

Speaker: Penguin3
English: -BOOM!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Now!

English: Get ready for a R<5>E<5>A<5>L<5> flight!

English: Guys! <30><b>Start countdown<b>!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: [1]THREE!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: [1]TWO!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: [1]ONE!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Huh? <45>Isn't it supposed <5>t<5>o<5>-

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Um, <30>mister owl, <30>are you OK?

Speaker: Penguin3
English: He's up!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Then... He's ready for another go!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Buds, look!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: It's that owl guy!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Hurray!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: Hurray!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: You guys think he's ready for... <15><b>The <15>Cannon<b>!?

Speaker: Penguin3
English: Owls are born ready, bud!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: OK guy! <30>Get up here when<nl>you're ready, mister Owl!
Translation: Bikain! <30>Igo zaitez hona<nl>prest zaudenean, hontz jauna!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: OK buds! <30>He's ready!!!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Formation!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Opening hatch<10>!<10>!<10>!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Up, up-

Speaker: Penguin3
English: - and away!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: OK, mister Owl!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Step right in!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Don't even worry, bud!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: [1]Hurray!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: [1]Hurray!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: [1]Hurray!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: You did good, guy!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: OK, buds! I think this owl<nl>has proved himself!
Translation: Tira, mutilok! Uste dut hontz honek<nl>erakutsi digula zertarako gai den!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: [1]Wooh!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: [1]Wooh!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Let's give him our <b>Buccanary Coins<b>! <30>She won't care, right!?
Translation: Gure <b>Buccanary txanponak<b> merezi ditu! <30>Nagusiari ez zaio axolako, ezta!?

Speaker: Penguin3
English: I mean...

Speaker: Penguin2
English: ALRIGHT! [1]Wring your pockets, guys!!!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Coins galore!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: Please, <30>don't tell Buccanary!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: [1]Wooh!

Speaker: Penguin2
English: [1]Wooh!

Speaker: Penguin3
English: [1]Wooh!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Hey!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Wait up, guy!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: You... <30>you saved me earlier.<nl>From them flying beasties.
Translation: Zu... <30>zu zara lehen salbatu nauena.<nl>Munstro hegalarien aurrean defendatu nauena.

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Stupid coins have no value, <30>not really!
Translation: Txanpon txatxu horiek ez dute baliorik, <30>benetan!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: I want to give you something <15>s<3>p<3>e<3>c<3>i<3>a<3>l!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Please accept it, sir!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: It's my most favorite thing ever! <30><nl>But I want you to have it!
Translation: Ez dago hau baino gogokoago dudan ezer! <30><nl>Baina zuri eman nahi dizut!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: If you put it to your ear, you can<nl>hear whispers! <30>At least I do, <15>ha<15>ha!
Translation: Belarrira gerturatzen baduzu, zurrumurruak entzungo<nl>dituzu! <30>Edo nik behintzat entzuten ditut, <15>ja<15>ja!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: Maybe it's the dead talking<5>.<5>.<5>.
Translation: Agian Herio da hizketan ari dena<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: Penguin1
English: WOAH, <15>THAT'D BE REALLY FREAKY!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: But I hope you like it, sir!
Translation: Baina espero dut gustatuko zaizula, jauna!

Speaker: Penguin1
English: I'll go over there now!

Speaker: P1
English: Gah, <30>enough of this!

Speaker: P1
English: Let's see you move out of this one!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmmm, the ship appears to be in complete lockdown.
Translation: Mmmm, badirudi ontzia erabateko itxialdian dagoela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Our mechanic companion might have<nl>made short work of these doors.
Translation: Ziur gure lagun mekanikariak ez lukeela<nl>ateak irekitzeko arazorik izango.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But since he is missing,<nl>we shall have to find another way.
Translation: Baina hemen ez dagoenez,<nl>beste bideren bat aurkitu beharko dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Come now my friend, do not worry yourself.<nl>I am sure Geddy is alright.
Translation: Tira, laguna, ez zaitez kezkatu.<nl>Ziur Geddy ondo dagoela.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: That! <15>Or he's gotten himself eaten!
Translation: Bai! <15>Edo piztiaren batek irentsi du, beharbada.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Certainly not!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have the utmost faith in our green comrade!
Translation: Fede osoa daukat gure kamarada berdean!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: He is probably back in Vellie already, safe and sound!
Translation: Ziur Velliera itzuli dela honezkero, etxeko babespera.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Meanwhile, leave this one to me,<nl>as I might be able to open this door.
Translation: Bitartean, utzi zeregin hau niri,<nl>uste dut ate hau irekitzerik izango dudala.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We shall have to find the opening mechanism.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It should be around here somewhere!
Translation: Hemen zehar egon behar du nonbait!

Speaker: P1
English: Intruders?

Speaker: P1
English: Prepare for annihilation!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hi there... friend!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We're here to see my buddy, <b>Dirk!<b>

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: So step aside!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Um,

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Whoa! That was harsh!
Translation: Hara! Hori ez da atsegina izan!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Otus! Let's teach this tin can a lesson!
Translation: Otus! Sardina-lata honek eskarmentua merezi du!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Aha, here we are!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If I find the lever in there, I can keep the door open for you,
Translation: Hemengo palanka aurkitzen badut, atea irekita manten dezaket zuentzat,

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But I will need to stay here to keep it open.
Translation: baina hemen egon beharra dut itxi ez dadin.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Voila!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Go ahead, Otus, I'll meet you on the other side.
Translation: Segi aurrera, Otus, bestaldean elkartuko gara.

Speaker: P1
English: Huh, where'd you go to?

Speaker: P1
English: Fine, <30>I'll just smoke you out!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Ummmm... what is happening?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Oh no...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I... <30>I think the ship is leaving ground.
Translation: Uste... <30>Uste dut ontzia aireratzen ari dela.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: There is no telling where we're going to end up!
Translation: Nork daki nora joateko asmoa daukaten!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: What if they're heading for <b>Vellie<b>!!!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We need to find Alphonse! Fast!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Huh!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh, Master Otus!!!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Are you alright!?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Here, let me assist you.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Alphonse!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Where are we?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It seems we have locked ourselves into the ship's armory.
Translation: Uste dut ontziko armategian giltzapetu dugula geure burua.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: They have enough firepower here to<nl>wipe out any remaining settlements with ease.
Translation: Hemengo arma guztiekin, zutik gelditzen<nl>diren asentamendu guztiak suntsi ditzakete.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And even without this arsenal, Molstrom would still be<nl>unstoppable using nothing but the relics.
Translation: Eta artsenal hau gabe ere, Molstrom geldiezina<nl>da erlikien indarrari esker.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The only real chance we have is to acquire<nl>those relics, and use them against him.
Translation: Daukagun aukera errealista bakarra erlikia<nl>horiek eskuratu, eta bere aurka erabiltzea da.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Then we better move fast, I think<nl>this ship is headed toward <b>Vellie<b>.
Translation: Hala bada, bizkor ibili behar dugu,<nl>uste dut ontzia <b>Vellie<b>rantz doala.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This ship is unknown to me, but...
Translation: Ez dut ontzi hau ezagutzen, baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I am certain we could use some of<nl>this firepower to get out of here.
Translation: Ziur naiz hemengo leherkari batzuk<nl>erabiliz lor genezakeela irtetea.

Speaker: Rasta
English: The relics have been secured.

Speaker: Rasta
English: We're prepped for take-off.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Good.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Plot a course toward the remaining settlements.
Translation: Diseinatu gelditzen diren asentamenduetatik igarotzeko ibilbide bat.

Speaker: Rasta
English: And the <b>Owlboy<b>?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: He comes and goes as he pleases.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Regardless, he serves no purpose now.
Translation: Bost axola, ez diagu bere beharrik jada.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: I will return to my quarters.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Do not fail me.

Speaker: Rasta
English: As always, Captain!

Speaker: Rasta
English: The captain doesn't consider him a threat.
Translation: Kapitainak ez dik uste mehatxua denik.

Speaker: Rasta
English: Good!

Speaker: Rasta
English: I'll take care of your<nl>treachery soon enough.

Speaker: Rasta
English: Alphonse.

Speaker: Pirate
English: You're mine!

Speaker: Pirate
English: GAAAAAHHH!

Speaker: Pirate
English: Hehe, nice shot, Alphonse.

Speaker: Pirate
English: But I'm only getting started.
Translation: Baina hasi baino ez nauk egin.

Speaker: Pirate
English: AAAARRRGH!

Speaker: Pirate
English: Gah.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Alphonse...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Please stop this!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If only we could-

Speaker: Pirate
English: SHUT UP!!!

Speaker: Pirate
English: You won't get away with your betrayal!
Translation: Ez haiz traizioagatik ordaindu gabe libratuko!

Speaker: Pirate
English: I'll get you for what you've done.

Speaker: Pirate
English: I'LL GET YOU!

Speaker: Pirate
English: HURGGGGHH!

Speaker: Pirate
English: It...

Speaker: Pirate
English: It hurts.

Speaker: Pirate
English: It hurts really bad...

Speaker: Pirate
English: Alphonse...

Speaker: Pirate
English: You abandoned us.

Speaker: Pirate
English: You abandoned me.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Hehehe

Speaker: Pirate
English: I guess...

Speaker: Pirate
English: DIE! NOW!!!

Speaker: Pirate
English: You made it all the way up here.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Molstrom didn't even suspect<nl>you guys were coming.
Translation: Molstromek ez zuen ezta<nl>susmatzen ere etorriko zinetenik.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Of course, I knew better...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Please.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Please, just let us<nl>through to Molstrom.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There must be a way to stop this<nl>path of destruction that he has led us on.
Translation: Berak sartu gaitu suntsiketa baino ez dakarren gurpil zoro honetan,<nl>egon behar du geldiarazteko modurik.

Speaker: Pirate
English: I have a little time before the<nl>Captain figures out you are here...
Translation: Denbora gutxi diat Kapitainak<nl>zuek hemen zaudetela jakin aurretik...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: That...<nl><30>That means you will let us go?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Hardly.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We could solve this so easily if<nl>you just let me and my friends pass-
Translation: Konponbide erraza dauka honek,<nl>ez duzu nire lagunak eta ni pasatzen utzi besterik-

Speaker: Pirate
English: FRIENDS!?

Speaker: Pirate
English: Why would you ever feel the<nl>need to seek such frailties?!

Speaker: Pirate
English: Pathetic...

Speaker: Pirate
English: Powerless...

Speaker: Pirate
English: Only weaklings who can't fend for<nl>themselves, will seek friendship.
Translation: Beren burua defendatzeko gauza ez diren<nl>ahulek soilik bilatzen diate adiskidetasuna.

Speaker: Pirate
English: Just look at them!

Speaker: Pirate
English: We were on our way to become<nl>the strongest, yet [1]YOU <30>abandoned us.
Translation: Indartsuenak bilakatzeko bidean geundean,<nl>eta [1]HIK  <30>abandonatu egin gaituk.

Speaker: Pirate
English: You're going to pay, Alphonse!

Speaker: Pirate
English: You're all going to pay!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I-it's really him..!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: MOLSTROM!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: What's this?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Did the guards let you in?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Prepare yourself!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We've come to <10>defeat you!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: ...You're here to fight me?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: T-<20>That's right!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Very well.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Hopefully you can at least entertain me<nl>until the relics are finished charging.
Translation: Espero dut behintzat Erlikiak guztiz kargatu arte<nl>entretenitu ahalko nauzuela.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Then I will---

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Huh?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: What was that?

Speaker: AlarmVoice
English: REPEAT!

Speaker: AlarmVoice
English: THE OWLBOY HAS STOLEN THE RELICS!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: WHAAAAAAAAAAT?!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: THAT LITTLE PEST DOUBLE-CROSSED ME!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: YOU!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: HE SENT YOU HERE TO DISTRACT ME!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: I'M GOING TO DESTROY ALL THREE OF YOU!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: BLUGH!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Augh!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Geddy?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! Alphonse! Spider thing!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: No time to chat!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's get out of here, FAST!

Speaker: DisembodiedBubble
