English: Alarm!

Speaker: DisembodiedBubble
English: The relics have been stolen!

Speaker: DisembodiedBubble
English: Get him!

Speaker: Pirate5
English: Alert the Captain!

Speaker: Pirate5
English: Tell him <b>the Owlboy<b> has stolen the Relics!

Speaker: Solus
English: I'm glad I caught him.

Speaker: Solus
English: That was a long fall.

Speaker: Solus
English: ...Stay safe, Otus.

Speaker: Solus
English: Don't follow me.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Who goes there?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Me and Twig?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yeah, we're good now.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We talked it out while you were sleeping.
Translation: Zu lo zeunden bitartean hitz egin genuen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Twig's just a big idiot, ha<15>ha!
Translation: Twig txoropito bat baino ez da, ja<15>ja!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We have to find some way to<nl>get above the Mesos layer.
Translation: Mesoseko geruzatik gora igotzeko<nl>modua aurkitu behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Do we know anyone who might know the way?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I like this place! <30>It's like our secret hideout!
Translation: Gogoko dut leku hau! <30>Gure ezkutaleku sekretu modukoa da!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: You live here?<30> It's great!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: When all this is over, we<nl>should eat a big dinner here!
Translation: Guzti hau amaitzean, hemen<nl>oturuntza handi batekin ospatuko dugu!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Just thinking about it makes me hungry!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: So we need to get above the Mesos layer, huh?
Translation: Mesoseko geruzatik gora joan behar dugu, orduan?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We don't have any ways of<nl>getting further up in my village.
Translation: Gure herrian ez daukagu<nl>gorago iristeko biderik.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: My dad always said that to get further up,<nl>we'd have to use a flying machine from Advent.
Translation: Aitak beti esan ohi zuen gorago joateko,<nl>Abenduko makina hegalari bat beharko genukeela.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Of course, Advent is gone now...
Translation: Baina, noski, Abendu jada ez da existitzen...

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Alright! I'll meet you outside.

Speaker: Kernelle
English: I've been looking forward to this!
Translation: Une honen zain egon naiz aspalditik!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Hee hee hee!

Speaker: Kernelle
English: Alright, let me know when you're ready.

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Hehe, no problem Otus! <nl><15>I'll be right up!
Translation: Jeje, ez kezkatu, Otus! <nl><15>Berehala igoko naiz!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Who knew stairs would be<nl>a problem around here!
Translation: Nork esango zuen arazoa<nl>eskailerak izango zirela!

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: What <15>IS<30> this place?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Oh no!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Otus, <30>are you alright?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Oh man, you had me worried there.

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Are you OK, man? <30>Can you fly?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Huh!? Did you break something?!

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Hmm... No, I don't think he has.
Translation: Mmm... Ez, ez dirudi ezer hautsi duenik.

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: The air in this place is very thin.

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Too thin to fly in.

Speaker: TwigNPC
English: Oh man. We're stuck up here.

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Not exactly! <30>We should explore this place!
Translation: Ez erabat! <30>Inguru hau arakatu behar genuke!

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Catch your breath, Master Otus. <nl><30>Geddy, Twig,<10> let's scout ahead!
Translation: Berreskuratu indarrak, Maisu Otus. <nl><30>Geddy, Twig,<10> mia dezagun ingurua!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Alright!

Speaker: TwigNPC
English: Yes, sir!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Guess this is where that stranger is hiding!
Translation: Suposatzen dut hemen ezkutatzen dela tipo ezezagun hura!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: But how do we get in?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm... What's this..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translation: Liburu hau antzinakoa da... baina irakurtzeko gai naiz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Book of Noctae,<30> volume 1.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Owl Temple.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: First of the great temples.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Here the owls learned how to control the<nl>elements and challenge the natural order.
Translation: Hemen hontzek elementuak kontrolatzen ikasi zuten,<nl>eta ordena naturala desafiatzen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: By the end of the first aeon, they<nl>had mastered water, fire, and wind.
Translation: Lehen eonaren amaierarako, menderatuak<nl>zituzten ura, sua eta haizeari buruzko ezagutzak.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And their work here revealed to them<nl>the existence of the higher mysteries.
Translation: Eta hemen eginiko lanak misterio<nl>handiagoen existentzia ezagutarazi zien.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It was here that the existence<nl>of The Loop was hypothesized.
Translation: Eta hemen teorizatu zuten<nl>Begiztaren existentzia ere.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The existential anguish from the<nl>discovery of The Loop permeated Owl society.
Translation: Begiztaren deskubrimenduak sortutako itoaldi existentzialak<nl>hontzen gizarte osoari eragin zion.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Riots began, and the Owl Temple was abandoned.
Translation: Istiluak hasi ziren, eta Hontzaren Tenplua abandonatua izan zen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm... What's this..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translation: Liburu hau antzinakoa da... baina irakurtzeko gai naiz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Book of Noctae,<30> volume 2.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Floating Continent.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Greatest of the owl homes.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translation: Hemen ekoitzitako makinak<nl>munduak inoiz ikusi dituen bikainenak ziren.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translation: Lehenengo aldiz, hontzen teknologiak<nl>bizitzaren gaitasunak gainditu zituen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.
Translation: Bazirudien ez zegoela hontzek<nl>lortu ezin zezaketen helbururik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: They were determined to break the Loop,<nl>and worked tirelessly to advance<nl>their technology and knowledge.
Translation: Begizta apurtzea deliberatu zuten,<nl>eta atsedenik gabe lan egin zuten<nl>haien teknologia eta jakintzak hobetzeko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Finally the solution was presented: a <b>Hex<b><nl>that would upend the laws of the universe.
Translation: Azkenean, soluzio bat aurkeztu zuten:<nl>unibertsoaren legeak irauliko lituzkeen <b>Konjuru<b> bat.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But it was a disaster. The Hex failed,<nl>and the world would never be the same.
Translation: Baina hondamendia izan zen. Konjuruak huts egin zuen,<nl>eta mundua ez zen inoiz lehengora bueltatu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm... What's this..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This book is ancient... but I can read it.
Translation: Liburu hau antzinakoa da... baina irakurtzeko gai naiz.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Book of Noctae, volume 3.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Floating Tower.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A gigantic research facility in the sky<nl>built without the knowledge of the world at large.
Translation: Ikerkuntza zentro handi bat zeruan,<nl>munduan ia inork jakin gabe eraikia.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The last few Owls gathered here, far away<nl>from the famines and wars elsewhere.
Translation: Gelditzen ziren azken hontzak hemen elkartu ziren,<nl>beste lekuetako gosete eta gerretatik urruti.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Great Relics, that were used<nl>to create the Hex, were reforged.
Translation: Erlikia Handiak, Konjurua sortzeko<nl>erabili zirenak, berriro forjatu ziren.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: For the Owls were preparing <b>another Hex<b>.
Translation: Izan ere, hontzak <b>beste Konjuru bat<b> ari ziren prestatzen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Greater than the last, this <b>new Hex<b> would<nl>send the new world crashing downwards.
Translation: Aurrekoa baino boteretsuagoa zen <b>Konjuru berri<b> honek<nl>mundu berriaren behin betiko erorketa eragingo zuen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And<10>.<10>.<10>. And bring the world under the Owls' control once again.
Translation: Eta<10>.<10>.<10>. Eta mundua hontzen kontrolpean jarriko zuen berriro ere.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So that's the truth he wasn't telling us.
Translation: Beraz, hau da kontatu nahi ez zigun egia.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He's been making the ancient Owls out<nl>to be heroes and scholars and whatnot...
Translation: Etengabe zioen antzinako hontzak zirela<nl>heroiak, jakintsuak, eta nik-zer-dakit-nolakoak...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And in reality he's going to use the<nl>relics for power, just like Molstrom.
Translation: Baina bere benetako asmoa da<nl>erlikiak boterea lortzeko erabiltzea, Molstromek bezala.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I knew it!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We have no choice now.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We shall have to stop him ourselves.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Yeah.<10>.<10>.<20> We're the only ones up here.
Translation: Bai.<10>.<10>.<20> Hemen goian gauden bakarrak gara.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's go!<20> There's no time to waste!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Get up, buddy! <30>We're not at the end just yet!
Translation: Altxa, laguna! <30>Oraindik ez gara amaierara heldu!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There you go!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OK guys, let's keep moving<5>.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: hero
English: I <20>see you...

Speaker: hero
English: Did my machines and theories break the Loop at last?
Translation: Nire makinek eta teoriek azkenik Begizta hautsi dute?

Speaker: hero
English: Did I break the world?

Speaker: hero
English: With this token, you hold the key.

Speaker: hero
English: The Sanctuary beckons you.

Speaker: hero
English: Give me the answers I, <20>Noctae of the owls, have always sought.
Translation: Emazkidazu nik, <20>hontzen Noctae-ak, beti bilatu ditudan erantzunak.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man, where are we rising to?!
Translation: O, motel, nora ari gara igotzen?!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think I can see the top<nl>of the tower above us.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If we stay on this platform, we could<nl>still make it to where Solus is hiding.
Translation: Plataforma honetan gelditzen bagara,<nl>Solus ezkutatu den lekura irits gaitezkeela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What's happening!?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: AAAAAAHHH!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I <20>can't believe it.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I believe we are witnessing<nl><20>the end of the world, my friends.
Translation: Uste dut ikusten ari garena<nl><20>munduaren amaiera dela, lagunok.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We ourselves are floating, <20>the<nl>floating continents are rising into space...
Translation: Gu airean flotatzen ari gara, <20>eta<nl>kontinente hegalariak espaziorantz goratzen dabiltza...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: This <20>is the end.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's happening so suddenly...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: What has Solus done up there?!
Translation: Zer egin du Solusek hor goian?!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Yeah!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Whatever Solus is doing up<nl>there, we have to stop him.
Translation: Solus hor goian egiten ari dena<nl>edozer dela ere, gelditu beharra dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I see his tower above us.
Translation: Bere dorrea ikusten dut gure gainean.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's go.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: The Relics were designed to be the fuel for the Hex.
Translation: Erlikiak Konjurua elikatzeko erregai gisa diseinatu ziren.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Centuries after they were made,<30><nl>the owls were finally ready for their Hex.
Translation: Hauek sortu eta mendeetara,<30><nl>hontzak azkenik prest ziren Konjurua erabiltzeko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So what happened?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Did the Hex work?

Speaker: Owlboy
English: It was the biggest disaster in the history of the planet.
Translation: Planetaren historian egon den hondamendirik handiena izan zen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But..!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The Anti-Hex!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You mentioned something about an Anti-Hex!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: This library was built to find a way to bring<nl>the planet's expansion under control and reverse it.
Translation: Liburutegi hau planetaren sakabanatzea kontrolatu<nl>eta desegiteko modua aurkitzeko eraiki zen.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: When I found it, I learned that the owls created<nl>Relics which have been absorbing power for centuries.
Translation: Aurkitu nuenean, ikasi nuen hontzek Erlikiak sortu zituztela,<nl>eta mendeetan boterea biltzen aritu direla.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Now they are ready to be used for the <b>Anti-Hex<b>,<nl>which will bring the islands back down to the ocean.
Translation: Orain <b>Antikonjuruan<b> erabiltzeko gertu daude,<nl>eta honela uharteak berriro ozeanoraino jaitsiko dira.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: THAT is what I'm preparing.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: An Anti-Hex to save the world!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Man...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You should have told us, Solus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Why did you try to do this all on your own?
Translation: Zergatik saiatu zinen guztia zure kabuz egiten?

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I got the pirates to help me by promising them power!
Translation: Piratek laguntza ematea lortu nuen, trukean boterea hitzemanez.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Tricking the pirates led to the destruction of Advent, Solus.
Translation: ...Piratak engainatzeak ekarri zuen Abenduren suntsiketa, Solus.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I didn't know of anyone<20> who I could trust...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let us help you finish this Anti-Hex.
Translation: Utziguzu laguntzen eta Antikonjuru hau amaituko dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: C'mon, Solus. What do we have to do?
Translation: Esan, Solus. Zer egin behar dugu?

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Y-You just have to-

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Oh no!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Is that..?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh no!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh man, oh man..!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: The Captain is here!!!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Look outside!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: The world is...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: It's all coming apart..!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: You have run off with <20>m<10>y<10> relics, <30>Owlboy.
Translation: N<10>i<10>r<10>e<10> erlikiekin ihes egin nahi huan, <30>hontz-mutil?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: You DARE betray ME?!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I-I haven't b-betrayed you, Molstrom!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm t-trying to save you,<20><nl>and everyone else!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm trying to prevent the planet from being destroyed!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: NOOO!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OTUS!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are you alright?!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: So you're saving the world, is that it?
Translation: Beraz, mundua salbatzen ari haiz, ezta?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Why would I care if the planet is destroyed?
Translation: Zer axola zaidak niri planeta suntsitzea?!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Give the relics back to me now.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: P-please!<30> I can't!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Urgh...

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Otus! Take this!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What happened?!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Is Master Otus breathing?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Good. Get him out of here!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'll keep the Captain at bay.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hurry, Master Geddy,<20> Twig!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I can't hold him for long!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Uh... Uh..!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We have to get Otus up!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Urgh...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hurry up and get away, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll hold him back!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Twig, follow me!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hurry, Otus!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Otus!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: We can't run away!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Please! <15>I can't move!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: You have to complete the Anti-Hex!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Repair the totem! <10>Hopefully that will be enough...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! Get out of there!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus!!!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: OTUS!!!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: The... the Anti-Hex..!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: It's emerging from his body!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: But... is he..?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Hm.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: So this is what your treachery is about?
Translation: Beraz, hau duk hire traizioaren helburua?

Speaker: Molstrom
English: You think this is enough to stop me?!
Translation: Ni geldiarazteko nahikoa dela uste duk?!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Hah! <10>I'll crush this little hex of yours!
Translation: Ja! <10>Hire konjuru txatxu hau birrinduko diat!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Gahh..!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Someone help Otus!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I told you, don't disturb me.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm at a critical stage in the process.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I have to extract the relics' essence.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: It'll be done soon.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Y-you're free to leave, you know!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: You're just bothering me!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm through talking to you.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Now you listen to us!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Stop this power-crazy stuff!
Translation: Botere-egarri honi amaiera eman behar diozu!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Using the relics is going to get people hurt!
Translation: Erlikiak erabiltzeak oinazea besterik ez du ekarriko!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: No... You're wrong..!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm trying to help..!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: By using the Relics?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Don't you remember Advent?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Those things are weapons!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: No!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: That's not what the Relics were made for!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: That's just how Molstrom used them!
Translation: Molstrom izan zen horrela erabili zituena!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...Please explain, Solus.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I didn't want to tell you this,<40><nl>but I need you to understand.
Translation: Ez nizuen hau kontatu nahi,<40><nl>baina ulertu beharra duzue.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: ...I'm going to tell you of<nl>the great shame of the owls.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: <b>The Hex<b><10>.<10>.<10>.<10> And the <b>Anti-Hex<b>.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Bwagh..!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: What are you doing?!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Have you gone mad?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Snap out of it, Solus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The relics are too dangerous!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Have you forgotten what happened in Advent?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: No-one can use them!<20> Ever!
Translation: Ez ditu inork erabili behar!<20> Inoiz ez!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We have to destroy them!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: You have to see sense, Solus!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We will help you avoid the pirates'<nl>retribution, but please stop this!
Translation: Piraten mendekuari ihes egiten<nl>lagunduko dizugu, baina geldiarazi hau!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Using the Relics for power will only make things worse!
Translation: Erlikien boterea erabiltzeak gauzak okertu besterik ez du egingo!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: That's right!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: We'll stop you if we have to!
Translation: Eta, beharrezkoa bada, guk geldiaraziko zaitugu!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I don't have time for this.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I've been telling you guys to leave me alone.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I gave you lots of chances!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: But it's clear that you guys don't understand.
Translation: Baina argi dago ez duzuela ezer ulertzen.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: So I guess I just have to make you leave!
Translation: Beraz, hemendik joatera behartu beharko zaituztet!

Speaker: Owlboy
English: H-huh?

Speaker: Owlboy
English: How did you get up here?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Never mind that, Solus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Quickly, we have to-

Speaker: Owlboy
English: No.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I've t-told you already.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm not interested in what you h-have to say.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But-

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I'm using the relics.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: T-That's all.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: ...I'm n-nearly finished here.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Please don't get in my way.

Speaker: HelpfulStar
English: Memories of Vellie flood back to you...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't like this, Otus.
Translation: Hau ez zait batere gustatzen, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I thought Solus was our pal, but...
Translation: Uste nuen Solus gure laguna zela, baina...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He just isn't listening at all.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Not to us, anyway...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Yeah.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm not sure what to do...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If he doesn't listen...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We may have to stop him.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He won't listen to us three, Otus.
Translation: Ez digu hirurotako bati ere kasurik egingo, Otus.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm not sure what to do.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: The Relics were created long ago,<20><nl>when the owls lived at the planet's surface,<nl>and the floating islands did not exist.
Translation: Erlikiak orain dela asko sortu ziren,<20><nl>hontzak planetaren gainazalean bizi zirenean,<nl>eta uharte hegalariak ez zirenean existitzen.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Owl technology was beyond our imagination, and the<nl>owls studied the deeper secrets of the universe.
Translation: Hontzen teknologia gure irudimenetik haratago zihoan,<nl>eta hontzek unibertsoaren sakoneko sekretuak aztertu zituzten.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: The Relics were made after the owls made a fateful discovery.
Translation: Erlikiak, hontzek deskubrimendu izugarri bat egin ondoren sortu zituzten.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: A discovery that sent owl society into infighting and chaos.
Translation: Hontzen gizartean guda zibilak eta kaosa sorrarazi zituen deskubrimendua.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: <b>The Loop<b>.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: What is The Loop? I am not certain.<nl>But the owls were obsessed with it.
Translation: Zer da Begizta? Ez dakit ziur.<nl>Baina hontzak harekin obsesionaturik zeuden.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: They worked for centuries in a desperate struggle to find a way to <b>end The Loop<b>.
Translation: Mendez mende lan egin zuten <b>Begizta amaitzeko<b> eraren baten bila eginahal betean.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: Finally, they found a solution.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: A Hex that would alter the laws of<nl>nature to end The Loop forever.
Translation: Naturaren legeak moldatuko lituzkeen Konjuru bat,<nl>honela Begizta betiko amaitzeko.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: I don't even know if the Hex broke the Loop...
Translation: Ez dakit Konjuruak Begizta amaitu zuen ere...

Speaker: Owlboy
English: That should have been the least of their worries.
Translation: Horrek izan beharko luke haien kezketan txikiena.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: The Hex backfired<60>, shattering the planet's<nl>continents into floating islands in the sky.
Translation: Konjuruak huts egin zuen<60>, planetako kontinenteak lehertarazi<nl>eta zeruan sakabanaturiko uharte hegalari bihurtuz.

Speaker: Owlboy
English: And the planet was reduced to a giant empty ocean.
Translation: Eta planeta ozeano huts erraldoi bat bilakatu zen.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: OWLBOY!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: YOU TRAITOR!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: I'M COMING FOR YOU!

Speaker: Toby
English: Hi there, young'un!

Speaker: Toby
English: Want to join me in the hot spring?

Speaker: Toby
English: No? <40>You're a hard worker, Otus.

Speaker: Toby
English: Just like the other owls.

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: Otus! How has school been lately?

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: I hear Asio might take<nl>you under his wing soon!
Translation: Entzun dut akaso Asiok<nl>hegalpean hartuko zaituela laster!

Speaker: Mandolyn
English: You're so lucky, Otus!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Hi, little Otus!

Speaker: Bomboman
English: Want to drop by my place<nl>sometime with Fib and Bonacci?
Translation: Etorri nahi duk nire etxera egun<nl>hauetako batean Fib eta Bonaccirekin?

Speaker: Bomboman
English: We'll play drums till the sun sets!
Translation: Eguzkia ezkutatu arte joko ditiagu danborrak!

Speaker: Professor
English: Otus! Do say hi to Lettia and Scops from me.
Translation: Otus! Agurtu Lettia eta Scops nire partez.

Speaker: Professor
English: I hear you'll be studying under Asio soon.
Translation: Entzun dut laster Asio zure mentore izango dela.

Speaker: Professor
English: He handpicked you, I heard.<nl><20>And I'm glad he did.
Translation: Pertsonalki hautatu zaituela entzun dut.<nl><20>Eta izugarri pozten naiz.

Speaker: Professor
English: I think you two will be a great fit.

Speaker: Solus
English: Otus! I'm glad you're doing well!
Translation: Otus! Pozten nau zu horren ongi ikusteak!

Speaker: Solus
English: Y-You don't recognize me? It's me, Solus.
Translation: E-Ez nauzu ezagutzen? Ni naiz, Solus.

Speaker: Solus
English: Listen, umm...

Speaker: Solus
English: I don't know if you think of me as a friend,<30> but.<10>.<10>.
Translation: Ez dakit laguntzat naukazun edo ez,<30> baina.<10>.<10>.

Speaker: Solus
English: I always thought of you as <20>m<20>-my <10>o<10>n<10>l<10>y<20> friend.
Translation: Beti uste izan dut zu zinela <20>n<20>-nire <20>lagun <10>b<10>a<10>k<10>a<10>r<10>r<10>a.

Speaker: Solus
English: I hope the next time we meet, it'll<nl>be under different circumstances.
Translation: Espero dut hurrengo elkartzen garenean,<nl>egoera bestelakoa izango dela.

Speaker: Solus
English: There's <30>so<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> so much I want to tell you.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa whoa!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Careful where you drop me, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'll be down here by<nl>the cannon if you need me.
Translation: Behar banauzu, hemen egongo naiz,<nl>kanoiaren alboan.

Speaker: aegolius
English: .<10>.<10>.<50>This is Aegolius.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Noctae<5>.<5>.<5>.<40> is gone.

Speaker: aegolius
English: One of my automatons<20> went amok.
Translation: Nire automatetako batek<20> alde egin du.

Speaker: aegolius
English: I had it destroyed, but now...
Translation: Suntsi zezaten agindu nuen, baina orain...

Speaker: aegolius
English: I've lost my only friend<5>.<5>.<10>. and<nl>the genius behind the Hex Machine.
Translation: Neukan lagun bakarra galdu dut<5>.<5>.<10>. eta<nl>konjuru-makinaren sortzailea.

Speaker: aegolius
English: .<2>.<2>.<5>It's too complicated.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Noctae's schematics for the Hex Machine,<nl>and his theorems on the Loop...
Translation: Noctaeren konjuru-makinarako eskemak,<nl>eta bere Begiztari buruzko teoremak...

Speaker: aegolius
English: .<5>.<5>.<20>My own machine is only a pale imitation.
Translation: .<5>.<5>.<20>Nire makina bera ere imitazio kaxkar bat baino ez da.

Speaker: aegolius
English: This is the best I have been able to come up with.
Translation: Hau da eraiki ahal izan dudan onena.

Speaker: aegolius
English: ...I redid the calculations.

Speaker: aegolius
English: The chances of catastrophic failure of the Hex Machine<10> are enormous.
Translation: Konjuru-makinak huts egin eta hondamendia gertatzeko aukera<10> oso erreala da.

Speaker: aegolius
English: If it fails, the planet will never look the same again.
Translation: Huts egiten badu, planeta ez da lehengora inoiz itzuliko.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Countless lives lost... and more lives ruined.
Translation: Zenbatzerik ez da zenbat bizi galduko diren... eta zenbaten bizitza hondatuko den.

Speaker: aegolius
English: ...Fifty-fifty.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Those are the odds of success and failure.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Fifty-fifty!

Speaker: aegolius
English: And yet, if I don't complete this task - Noctae's life's work..!
Translation: Eta hala ere, ez badut egiteko hau burutzen - Noctae nire bizitzako lana da...!

Speaker: aegolius
English: ...Then my soul will die along with him.
Translation: ...Orduan, nire arima berekin batera hilko da.

Speaker: aegolius
English: .<5>.<5>.<20>I have decided to lie to the other owls.

Speaker: aegolius
English: I will not tell them of the danger.

Speaker: aegolius
English: The Hex Machine WILL be built.<20> The Loop WILL be broken.
Translation: Konjuru-makina ERAIKI egingo da.<20> Begizta HAUTSI egingo da.

Speaker: aegolius
English: You, my descendant...<20> You will be my backup plan.
Translation: Zu, nire ondorengoa...<20> Zu izango zara nire B plana.

Speaker: aegolius
English: I will guide one with my crest to this place to listen to these words.
Translation: Nire oinordeko bat hona gidatuko dut, hitzok entzun ditzan.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Do not be alarmed.<10> That is within my ability.
Translation: Ez arduratu.<10> Badut hori egiteko gaitasuna.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Take the clues I have left behind here and follow them.
Translation: Aurkitu hemen utzi ditudan aztarnak, eta jarrai itzazu.

Speaker: aegolius
English: I only ask...

Speaker: aegolius
English: ...I only ask that you tell no-one.

Speaker: aegolius
English: No-one must know that I,<10> weakest among<nl>the owls,<20> and the disgrace of our kind...
Translation: Ezin du inork jakin behar nik,<10> hontzen artean<nl>ahulenak,<20> gure arraza desohoratu dudan honek,...

Speaker: aegolius
English: ...Risked the doom of our world.

Speaker: aegolius
English: People must be able to trust each other,<20> even in a world with monsters like me.
Translation: Jendeak elkarrengan konfiantza izan behar du,<20> baita ni bezalako munstroak dituen mundu batean ere.

Speaker: aegolius
English: Good luck.

Speaker: aegolius
English: And Noctae.<5>.<5>.<30> I'm sorry.<5>.<5>.

Speaker: noctae
English: Surnia convinced me to leave a message behind.
Translation: Surniak konbentzitu ninduen mezu hau atzean uzteko.

Speaker: noctae
English: I don't think even Aegolius knows.
Translation: Ez dut uste Aegoliusek ere badakienik.

Speaker: noctae
English: But I'm unsure what to say.
Translation: Baina ez dakit ongi zer esan.

Speaker: noctae
English: Mathematics and Philosophy are my<nl>callings, and the calling of my House.
Translation: Matematikak eta filosofia dira<nl>nire bokazioa, eta nire Etxearena.

Speaker: noctae
English: I never was one for talking, unless<nl>someone could pull the words out of me.
Translation: Ez naiz inoiz izan hitz egitekoa, ez bada<nl>norbaitek nigandik hitzak ateratzen dituenean.

Speaker: noctae
English: Mathematics never lies.
Translation: Matematikek ez dute inoiz gezurrik esaten.

Speaker: noctae
English: It makes predictions.

Speaker: noctae
English: If you master mathematics sufficiently, you<nl>will find that you can make extraordinary predictions.
Translation: Matematiketan behar besteko trebetasuna lortzen baduzu,<nl>iragarpen izugarriak egin ditzakezu.

Speaker: noctae
English: The trajectory of a rock.<30> The orbits of the stars.

Speaker: noctae
English: I learned those as a boy.

Speaker: noctae
English: Now, as my maths is better, the predictions<nl>I make are somewhat different.
Translation: Orain, matematiketan trebatu naizelarik,<nl>egiten ditudan iragarpenak desberdinak dira.

Speaker: noctae
English: I predicted my own death<20> to one of Aegolius's machines.
Translation: Nire heriotza aurresan nuen<20> Aegoliusen makina baten eskuetan.

Speaker: noctae
English: Not once, but again and again in infinity.
Translation: Ez behin, baizik behin eta berriro, eta berriro infinituraino.

Speaker: noctae
English: No matter how I adjusted the parameters, I saw<nl>my own death there as an eternal wave function,<20> over and over.
Translation: Parametroak batera edo bestera doitu arren,<nl>beti ikusten nuen aurrean nire heriotza,<nl>uhin-funtzio betiereko baten gisara,<20> behin eta berriro.

Speaker: noctae
English: And applied correctly, I could see every death.<30> Every life.
Translation: Eta behar bezala aplikaturik, heriotz guztiak ikus nitzakeen.<30> Bizi guztiak.

Speaker: noctae
English: Even<10> a young owl named Otus, who dies<nl>in a great battle above a floating city.
Translation: Baita<10> Otus izeneko hontz txiki batena ere, zeina<nl>hiri hegalari baten gaineko borroka izugarrian hiltzen den.

Speaker: noctae
English: And yet, Otus, my maths tells me that<nl>you will be at this hologram.
Translation: Eta hala ere, Otus, nire kalkuluek dioste<nl>holograma honetan egongo zarela.

Speaker: noctae
English: A strange inconsistency.

Speaker: noctae
English: .<5>.<5>.<20>Perhaps our Hex Machine worked, after all.

Speaker: noctae
English: Tomorrow is the day that I die, Otus.
Translation: Bihar da nire heriotzeko eguna, Otus.

Speaker: noctae
English: It is my hope that by doing so, my prediction will come true.
Translation: Eta hiltzean, espero dut nire iragarpena egia bilakatuko dela.

Speaker: noctae
English: ...So that I will see you here today.

Speaker: noctae
English: And perhaps in the next Loop, I will not have to die after all.
Translation: Eta akaso, hurrengo Begiztan, ez dudala hil beharrik izango.

Speaker: noctae
English: Maybe then<30> I could spare Aegolius some grief.
Translation: Agian orduan<30> Aegoliusi mina pixkat arindu ahalko diot.

Speaker: surnia
English: Welcome, friend.

Speaker: surnia
English: I am Surnia<20> of the House of Preservation and Diplomacy.
Translation: Surnia naiz,<20> Kontserbazio eta Diplomazia Etxekoa.

Speaker: surnia
English: What you see before you<20> is my life's work.
Translation: Aurrean duzuna<20> nire bizi osoko lanaren fruitua da.

Speaker: surnia
English: The Eternal Sanctuary<40> - a place to record<nl>the thoughts of our leaders and artisans.
Translation: Betiereko Santutegia<40> - gure buruzagi eta artisauen<nl>pentsamenduak gordetzeko leku bat.

Speaker: surnia
English: The brightest owls to ever have lived, they say!
Translation: Inoiz bizi izan diren hontz bikainenenak, diotenez!

Speaker: surnia
English: I hope that the knowledge enshrined here may aid you.
Translation: Espero dut hemen bilduriko jakintza lagungarri izango zaizula.

Speaker: surnia
English: And that you will share the wisdom<nl>of the owls<30> with all who care to listen.
Translation: Eta hontzen jakinduria partekatuko duzula<nl><30>entzuteko prest dagoen edonorekin.

Speaker: combat
English: Times are changing, it would seem.

Speaker: combat
English: Aegolius and Noctae<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> They sure are an incredible pair.
Translation: Aegolius eta Noctae<5>.<5>.<5>.<20> Aparteko bikotea da.

Speaker: combat
English: The Temple Guardians they made, terrifying as<nl>they are, have kept the temples completely safe.
Translation: Sortu zituzten tenplu-zaindariek, hain ikaragarriak<nl>diren horiek, tenpluak guztiz babestu dituzte.

Speaker: combat
English: And now Aegolius tells me that Noctae<nl>has thought of a way to make thinking machines.
Translation: Eta orain Aegoliusek diost pentsatzen duten makinak<nl>sortzeko modua aurkitu duela Noctaek.

Speaker: combat
English: Aegolius says he will put them into production soon.
Translation: Aegoliusek dio laster hasiko dela ekoizpena.

Speaker: combat
English: My role as a combat instructor<10> may eventually no longer be needed.
Translation: Nire borrokarako trebatze irakaspenak<10> laster ez dira beharrezko izango.

Speaker: combat
English: No wonder those two are never seen apart.
Translation: Normala da biak beti batera ibiltzea.

Speaker: combat
English: Who else can truly relate to such brilliant minds?
Translation: Beste nork uler ditzake haien buru argiak?

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: I think Noctae is onto the discovery of a lifetime.
Translation: Uste dut Noctaek berebiziko deskubrimendua egin duela.

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: He's been locked up in his lab for<nl>ages, and speaks only in whispers about it.
Translation: Egunak daramatza laborategian giltzapeturik, eta esku artean<nl>darabilenari buruz xuxurlaka baino ez du hitz egiten.

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: Noctae is almost too brilliant.

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: Even Aegolius can barely keep up with his thinking.
Translation: Aegoliusek ere ozta-ozta ulertzen ditu bere ideiak.

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: The automatons they've created have been revolutionary!
Translation: Elkarrekin sortu dituzten automatek iraultza ekarri dute!

Speaker: bonacciAncestor
English: If Noctae believes his next discovery<nl>will be even greater... I can't even imagine what it will be!
Translation: Noctaek uste badu bere hurrengo deskubrimendua are bikainagoa<nl>izango dela... ezin dezaket imajinatu ere zer izango den!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Whoa! It's <b>Asio<b>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Oh no, wait.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He just looks like him.

Speaker: austere
English: ...So this was Noctae's great discovery.

Speaker: austere
English: The Loop?

Speaker: austere
English: I am disappointed that most of the owls take this seriously.
Translation: Zer dezepzioa hontz gehienek hau serio hartzea.

Speaker: austere
English: No matter what he says, such a thing cannot be proven.
Translation: Bost axola zer dioen, halako zerbait ez dago frogatzerik.

Speaker: austere
English: Of course Aegolius has taken Noctae's side, as he always does.
Translation: Jakina zen Aegoliusek Noctaeren alde egingo zuela, beti bezala.

Speaker: austere
English: Inseparable, those two. Even in failure.
Translation: Banaezinak dira bi horiek. Huts egitean ere bai.

Speaker: austere
English: It goes over my head, he says.
Translation: Ez naizela ulertzeko gai, ez zaidala buruan sartuko dio.

Speaker: austere
English: I suppose nothing can go over Aegolius's head,<nl>what with how big it got after he made the automatons.
Translation: Suposatzen dut ez dagoela Aegoliusen buruan sartuko ez denik,<nl>automata horiek sortu ostean hainbeste handitu zitzaion burutzar hori!

Speaker: austere
English: Leeching off of Noctae's brilliance has made him quite the reputation.
Translation: Lortu duen ospea, Noctaeren bikaintasunaren kontura.

Speaker: austere
English: If he didn't have Noctae beside him, he would be no-one at all.
Translation: Alboan Noctae ez baleuka, ez litzateke inor izango.

Speaker: austere
English: I will not be talked down to by a self-aggrandizing buffoon!
Translation: Ez dut halako harroputz batengandik mespretxurik onartuko!

Speaker: travelProjector
English: ... ... of the ... ... House of Travel ... ...

Speaker: travelProjector
English: ... ... for these ... ... inventions.

Speaker: travelProjector
English: Is it not the duty ... ... to roam the skies..?
Translation: Ez al da ... ... zeruak zeharkatzea ... ... egitekoa?

Speaker: travelProjector
English: Let us ... ... ... free and healthy, and ... ... cherished.
Translation: Utziguzu .. ... ... aske eta osasuntsu, eta .. ... maitatua izaten.

Speaker: travelProjector
English: ... ... descendants ... find their own purpose.

Speaker: farmingProjector
English: ... we have ... ... incredible ... Noctae!

Speaker: farmingProjector
English: This ... ... Loop, for ... ...

Speaker: farmingProjector
English: ... lead ... of Farming ... ... support him!

Speaker: farmingProjector
English: ... ... his debt.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Say, <30>Otus, <30>maybe we should get<nl>a little rest before we move on?
Translation: Aizu, <30>Otus, <30>eta aurrera jarraitu<nl>aurretik atseden pixkat hartzen badugu?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hmm, I think we should get moving to Advent.
Translation: Mmm, uste dut Abendurantz abiatu beharko genukeela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Better not give Asio a reason to throw another tantrum.
Translation: Hobe Asiori haserretzeko arrazoirik ez ematea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey,<10> Otus!<20><nl>Don't forget about me!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hey,<10> Otus!<20><nl>Don't forget about me!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus! Don't stray!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I need a word with you, Otus.<nl>Land here beside me.
Translation: Hirekin hitz egin behar diat, Otus.<nl>Lurreratu hemen, nire alboan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't think I'll be able to get any sleep tonight.
Translation: Ez dut uste gaur gauean lo egin ahalko dudanik.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We know how you feel, Master Geddy.
Translation: Badakigu nola sentitzen zaren, Maisu Geddy.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: How about we talk about something else?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You're right, Alphonse. <30>I need to put my mind at ease.
Translation: Arrazoi duzu, Alphonse. <30>Hobe pentsamendu horiek alboratzea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And there are some things I'm really curious about!
Translation: Eta badaude interesa pizten didaten beste gai batzuk!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Anything else you want to talk about?
Translation: Beste ezeri buruz hitz egin nahi?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Cloaked weirdo?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Who is this you're talking about, Master Geddy?
Translation: Nori buruz ari zara, Maisu Geddy?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There was a strange guy outside<nl>the owl temple when he got there.
Translation: Tipo bitxi bat zegoen Hontzaren Tenplu<nl>kanpoan gu iritsi ginenean.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He was reciting some book...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Do you remember what he said?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hm, let's see... he said...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The Owl Temple.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: First of the great temples.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Here the owls learned how to control the<nl>elements and challenge the natural order.
Translation: Hemen hontzek elementuak kontrolatzen ikasi zuten,<nl>eta ordena naturala desafiatzen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: By the end of the first aeon, they<nl>had mastered water, fire, and wind.
Translation: Lehen eonaren amaierarako, menderatuak<nl>zituzten ura, sua eta haizeari buruzko ezagutzak.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And their work here revealed to them the existence<nl>of the <b>higher mysteries<b>.
Translation: Eta hemen eginiko lanak<nl><b>misterio handiagoen<b> existentzia ezagutarazi zien.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So says the book of Noctae.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Impressive recollection, Master Geddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Does it mean anything to you, Alphonse?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I have heard of this Noctae, long ago.
Translation: Noctae hori lehenago ere entzuna dut, orain dela asko.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think perhaps I have read the book he speaks of.
Translation: Uste dut agian aipatzen duen liburu hori irakurria daukadala.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But it's strange... It ends very abruptly.
Translation: Baina bitxia da... amaiera bapatekoegia da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I seem to recall that there was<nl>more about these higher mysteries...
Translation: Gogora datorkit misterio handiago hauei<nl>buruz gehiago azaltzen zela liburuan...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I don't remember much about the Relics' origin.
Translation: Ez dut oroitzen zein zen Erlikia hauen jatorria.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I know that they are made by the ancient owls,<nl>and that they contain extraordinary power.
Translation: Badakit antzinako hontzek sortu zituztela,<nl>eta izugarrizko boterea daukatela barruan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: As you've seen...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I would guess that <b>Dirk<b> will be the one<nl>looking for the Relic in the Floating Continent.
Translation: Suposatzen dut <b>Dirk<b> bidali dutela<nl>Kontinente Hegalariko erlikiaren bila.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Most of the other pirates are not <b>independent<b><nl>enough for missions like these.
Translation: Gainontzeko piratak ez dira halako misio<nl>baterako behar besteko <b>independenteak<b>.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: They were not made to improvise.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And the Captain usually does not do<nl>work he considers beneath him.
Translation: Eta Kapitainak normalean ez ditu bere<nl>mailakoentzat ez diren lanak hartzen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Good!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If we see that guy again, I'll<nl>give him a piece of my mind!
Translation: Berriro tipo hori ikusten badugu<nl>gorriak ikusiko ditu!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: As you say.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I've never been there before.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Do you know anything about it, Alphonse?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I was there... long ago.
Translation: Bertan izan nintzen... orain dela asko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You mean months ago?<40> Years ago?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think it would have been eight.<20>.<20>. maybe nine centuries ago.
Translation: Esango nuke izango zela orain dela zortzi.<20>.<20>. agian bederatzi mende.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: CENTURIES?!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You're that old, Alphonse?!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Older.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But the farther back I think, the less I remember.
Translation: Baina zenbat eta atzerago arakatu oroitzapenetan,<nl>orduan eta gutxiago gogoratzen dut.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I remember hearing talk of a great<nl><b>machine<b> built in the Continent.
Translation: Gogoratzen dut inoiz entzun izana Kontinentean<nl><b>makina<b> bikain bat eraiki zutela.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A machine built by the owls<30><nl>further back than I can recall.
Translation: Hontzek eraikitako makina bat,<30><nl>gogora dezakedana baino antzinakoagoa.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: These days, the Floating Continent is half<nl>overgrown with plants and half submerged in lava.
Translation: Baina, gaur egun, Kontinente Hegalari erdi<nl>landarediak irentsi du, eta beste erdia labak.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A terrifying, inhospitable place full of beasts and pitfalls.
Translation: Leku  ikaragarri eta babesgabea, piztia eta arriskuz betea.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: A good place for adventurers such<nl>as ourselves to prove our mettle!
Translation: Gu moduko abenturazaleek haien adorea<nl>frogatzeko leku paregabea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Umm...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Yeah...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Tell you about myself?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: What do you want to know?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't know,<20> anything?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I've always wanted to be a dramatic actor.
Translation: Betidanik antzezle dramatiko izan nahi izan dut.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I wanted to awe the world's finest from a stage!
Translation: Munduko eliteak harritu nahi nituen eszenatoki gainetik!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Under Molstrom, I wasn't allowed to...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But when we have saved the world from the<nl>pirate threat, I hope to pursue that calling!
Translation: Baina mundua piraten mehatxutik libratzen dugunean,<nl>bokazio horri jarraitzeko asmoa daukat!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Huh, that's surprising.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You were created as a servant for the owls, weren't you?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Were you made<20> for acting?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Combat was never my specialty.
Translation: Borroka ez da inoiz nire espezialitatea izan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I much prefer acting.<5>.<5>.<5> and cooking!
Translation: Askoz nahiago dut antzeztea.<5>.<5>.<5>. eta kozinatzea!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: In fact, I was made to serve<nl>in whatever manner I thought best.
Translation: Izan ere, egokien iruditzen zitzaidan<nl>erara zerbitzatzeko sortu ninduten.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Not all pirates were as fortunate as I.
Translation: Pirata guztiek ez zuten nik bezain zorte ona izan.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'm just grateful that I found<nl>a more worthy master to serve.
Translation: Pozten nau nire zerbitzuak benetan<nl>merezi dituen maisu bat aurkitu izanak.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: One who works for good.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Good idea, <30>I'm bushed.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's continue our journey tomorrow<nl>shall we? <30>We should get some rest.
Translation: Bihar berrekingo dugu bidaia,<nl>ados? <30>Atseden hartu behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So is there anything in particular<nl>you want to talk about, Otus?
Translation: Gai jakinen bati buruz<nl>hitz egin nahi duzu, Otus?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Anything else you want to talk about?
Translation: Beste ezeri buruz hitz egin nahi?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's see, what was it that guy said this time?
Translation: Ikustagun, zer esan du tipo hark oraingoaz?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think it was...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The Floating Continent.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Greatest of the owl homes.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The machines produced here were the<nl>finest the world has ever seen.
Translation: Hemen ekoitzitako makinak<nl>munduak inoiz ikusi dituen bikainenak ziren.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: For the first time, owl technology<nl>surpassed the capabilities of life itself.
Translation: Historian lehenengoz, hontzen teknologiak<nl>bizitzaren gaitasunak gainditu zituen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There seemed to be no end to the<nl>heights the owls could reach.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: So says the book of Noctae, blah blah.
Translation: Hori dio Noctae Liburuak, tar tar tar.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I wonder why he's telling us this.
Translation: Zergatik ari ote zaigu hori esaten.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If there was no end to the height the owls could<nl>reach, then why are their temples all abandoned?
Translation: Eta hontzen lorpenek ez bazuten mugarik,<nl>zergatik daude haien tenplu guztiak abandonaturik?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And even if he is telling the truth,<nl>why is he bragging so much about the owls?
Translation: Eta egia baldin badio ere, zergatik ari da<nl>hontzei buruz harrotasunez hitz egiten?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And to us?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's almost like he's trying to cover something up.
Translation: Zerbait ezkutatu nahian ari dela dirudi.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You know? Like he wants us to think<nl>that the owls were all super great.
Translation: Ezta? Hontzak izugarriak zirela<nl>pentsa dezagun nahi balu bezala.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Makes me almost think that they weren't.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I mean, why would any enlightened people<nl>make giant frog and snake monsters?
Translation: Esan, zergatik sortuko lituzkete izaki ilustratuek<nl>igel erraldoi bat eta suge formako munstroak?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I don't know who this guy is,<nl>but I say we grab him next time!
Translation: Ez dakit nor arraio den tipo hori,<nl>baina hurrengoan harrapatu beharra daukagu!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I saw a guy sometimes that the<nl>pirates would call <b>the Owlboy<b>.
Translation: Noizean behin tipo bat elkartzen zen piratekin,<nl>haiek <b>hontz-mutil<b> deitzen zutena.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: A small guy in a robe who was giving Molstrom advice.
Translation: Tipo txiki bat, togarekin, Molstrom aholkatzen zuena.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I think the pirate guard said that<nl>he's the one who stole the Relics.
Translation: Uste dut pirata zaindariak esan zuela<nl>bera izan zela Erlikiak ostu zituena.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Owl boy, huh?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I wonder if that's just a nickname or a literal description?
Translation: Ezizena soil bat ala deskribapen zuzena ote da?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Whoever it is, he has much to answer for.
Translation: Edonola ere, galdera asko ditu erantzuteko.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Well, we need to find a way up above Mesos...
Translation: Tira, Mesos baino gorago igotzeko moduren bat aurkitu behar dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll just have to look<nl>for someone who knows how, I think.
Translation: Hori nola egin dakien norbaiten<nl>laguntza bilatu beharko dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: At least we'll have some time.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Even the pirate ships will struggle to get past Mesos.
Translation: Piraten ontziek ere ez dute erraz lortuko Mesosetik gora igotzea.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I've never known the pirates to fail<nl>to get somewhere they wanted to go, but...
Translation: Egia da ez dagoela piratek helburutzat jarri<nl>eta lortu ez duten ezer, baina...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It will likely take them some<nl>time to prepare their ships.
Translation: Denbora dexente beharko dute<nl>haien ontziak prestatzeko.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Then that means we have time to explore!
Translation: Eta guk arakatzeko denbora dugu, ondorioz!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Well, it's still important to-

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I've ALWAYS wanted to explore, Otus!
Translation: BETIDANIK esploratu nahi izan dut mundua, Otus!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: There's lots of caves and cool<nl>places in Tropos and Strato!
Translation: Leize eta leku interesgarri mordoa<nl>dago Tropos eta Straton!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: C'mon, we might even discover something useful!
Translation: Goazen, baliteke gauza baliagarriren bat deskubritzea!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Guys, let's GO<5>O<5>O<5>O<5> EXPLO<10>O<10>O<10>O<10>-

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Yes, yes!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: There will indeed be time to explore.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: In the morning.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But he's right. If we explore, we might find<nl>some clues as to what's going on.
Translation: Baina arrazoi du. Pixkat arakatuz, agian,<nl>gertatzen dena ulertzeko arrastoak aurki genitzake.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It feels like there's still a few<nl>important things we don't know about.
Translation: Iruditzen zait oraindik badela ez dakigun<nl>zerbait garrantzi handikoa.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It looked completely abandoned...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's tragic to see our<nl>home in such a state.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It seems that islands have been coming<nl>loose and rising towards the sky.
Translation: Antza lur zatiak askatzen eta<nl>zerurantz igotzen hasi dira.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It used to be that that was a rare event.
Translation: Lehen hori oso gutxitan gertatzen zen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: With that and the threat of a pirate attack...
Translation: Horrekin, eta piratek eraso egiteko mehatxuarekin...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: ...It's no wonder that people are escaping...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Man, <20>I hope we can help them somehow...
Translation: Motel, <20>espero dut zerbait egiterik izango dugula...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I am TWIG!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: The GREATEST SPIDER IN THE WORLD!!!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I was born into a...
Translation: Aitortu behar dut jaio nintzen familia...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: ...pretty<30> boring family...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: But through gruelling training and<nl>effort, I have become...
Translation: Baina gogorki trebatuz eta esfortzu izugarriari esker,<nl>azkenean bilakatu naiz...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: THE BEST!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: BONA FIDE!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: SPIDER!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: And what does being the best spider entail?
Translation: Eta zer esan nahi du armiarmarik onena izateak?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Come on, guys.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Everything about me is spidery.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: And I can shoot webs and stuff!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Do you know anyone else who can do that?
Translation: Ezagutzen duzue hori egin dezakeen beste inor?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: How did you make the costumes?

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I sewed'em!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Pretty good, right?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You might be less of a doofus than I thought.
Translation: Agian ez zara dirudizun bezain artaburua.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'm glad I can hang out with you guys!
Translation: Asko pozten nau zuekin batera egoteak!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Tomorrow will be a blast, too!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Yeah, we need to get some sleep!

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Let's explore tomorrow!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Hmm... It feels a bit lonely...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: To be here without Geddy.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Maybe we should hit the sack early, guys.
Translation: Akaso goiz oheratzea da onena, mutilok.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I just feel guilty.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: It's not your fault, Twig.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: But the mood being what it is,<nl>sleeping might be best.
Translation: Baina aldarte honekin,<nl>onena lotara joatea da.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We'll have a proper conversation at another time.
Translation: Hitz egingo dugu lasai beste batean.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Anything else you want me to tell you about?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Aw man, Otus, <30>we finally got to leave Vellie!
Translation: O, motel, Otus, <30>azkenean irten gara Vellietik!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And you'll get to see <b>Advent<b> soon!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Though, <15>this isn't how I imagined we'd get there.
Translation: Hala ere, <15>ez nuen uste honela joango ginenik hara.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: If you want to, <30>I'll tell you a little about it.
Translation: Nahi baduzu, <30>hari buruz hitz egingo dizut.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I don't know much about them, to be honest.
Translation: Ez dakit askorik haiei buruz, egia esan.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Mostly what I've heard in rumours.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We had a few skirmishes against them<nl>when I was in the army in Advent.
Translation: Liskar batzuk izan genituen haiekin<nl>Abenduko armadan izan nintzen garaian.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I never saw numbers like we just saw in Vellie, though.
Translation: Inoiz ez ditut Vellien beste pirata ikusi, ordea.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: But the pirates I saw always retreated<nl>as soon as we fired warning shots.
Translation: Baina ikusi nituen piratek beti atzera egiten zuten<nl>abisu tiroak jaurti bezain laster.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm sure we'll be fine.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I guess you've never been there before, huh?
Translation: Suposatzen dut ez zarela inoiz bertan egon, e?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's one of the oldest owl ruins that we know about.
Translation: Ezagutzen dugun hontzen hondakinik zaharrenetakoa da.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Still, it's a surreal place.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And it's huge!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There must have been owls<nl>everywhere back in those days!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: We'll have to get deep inside the<nl>temple to get to the <b>control room<b>.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It'll be tough, but we can do it.
Translation: Zaila izango da, baina egin dezakegu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Aw man. <30>I really can't wait till<nl>you get to see <b>Advent<b>, Otus!
Translation: O, motel. <30>zuk <b>Abendu<b> ezagutzeko<nl>gogo bizia dut, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: The shops! <30>The sights! <30>The people! <nl><30>There's so much to do in Advent!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: And, <30>I think Asio is overreacting, <30>I mean...
Translation: Eta, <30>uste dut Asio esajeratzen ari dela, <30>esan nahi dut...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: All the pirates in the world couldn't get past<nl>Advent's defences, <30>even if they wanted to.
Translation: Munduko pirata guztiek batera ezingo<nl>lituzkete Abenduko defentsak garaitu,<nl><30>horretara jarrita ere.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Ha<15>ha, <40>this whole situation<nl>is overblown if you ask me.
Translation: Ja<15>ja, <40>egoera guzti hau larregi puztu dute, nire ustez.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: At least I'm happy we get to<nl>leave the village for a while.
Translation: Baina pozten naiz herria atzean<nl>utz dezakegulako tarte batez.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You know. <30>It kinda feels like<nl>we're on <30>an a<3>d<3>v<3>e<4>n<4>t<4>u<4>r<4>e<4>!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Good idea, <30>I'm bushed.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Let's continue our journey tomorrow<nl>shall we? <30>We should get some rest.
Translation: Gure bidaia bihar jarraituko dugu,<nl>ados? <30>Atseden hartu behar dugu.

Speaker: Buccanary
English: You already have that on yer head!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Silly!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Hmmm. <15>Nope. <30>Doesn't look any better than last time.
Translation: Mmmm. <15>Ez ba. <30>Ez dirudi azken alditik hobetu denik.

Speaker: Buccanary
English: You already have that on yer head!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Silly!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Adventure in style!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Huh, you're already fuzzy wuzzy!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Be warm! Be safe!

Speaker: Fish
English: It's for soup sir!

Speaker: Fish
English: A green hat! Splendid color indeed!
Translation: Txano berde bat! Kolore bikaina, bai horixe!

Speaker: Fish
English: It's for more soup! <30>Staves off starvation!

Speaker: Fish
English: An Accoutrement for a true gentlemen!

Speaker: Fish
English: The thickest of soup!

Speaker: Fish
English: For a keener aim, sir!

Speaker: Fish
English: The finest of furs! Luxury!

Speaker: Fish
English: For the a gent in need of firepower!

Speaker: Fish
English: Ah yes, <30>an interesting object to be sure!

Speaker: Fish
English: Although... I can't quite reach it for you, sir.
Translation: Baina... ez naiz iristen hemendik, zuri emateko, jauna.

Speaker: Fish
English: A cloak of granditude! <30>The mark of a true Owl!
Translation: Handitasunez beteriko kapa! <30>Egiazko hontz baten marka!

Speaker: Fish
English: Let me hang that up for you, sir.

Speaker: Buccanary
English: A <b>Cool Soup Canteen<b> filled with my very own brew!
Translation: <b>Zopa freskagarridun kantinplora<b>, nik prestaturiko edariz betea!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Or, <30>it was, <30>until you drank it all!
Translation: Edo, <30>hala zen, <30>zuk dena edan duzun arte!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Hurray!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Why, that's a dorky green hat!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It's utterly useless!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: H<3>m<3>m<3>m<3>, <30>I'll let you have it<nl>if ye find a few more Buccanary Coins!
Translation: M<3>m<3>m<3>m<3>, <30>zuretzat izango da<nl>Buccanary txanpon gehiago aurkitzen badituzu!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It's a <b>Nice Soup Canteen<b>!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It be mine own recipe ye know!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: But you already drank it, silly.

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Ah yes, a finer hat indeed.
Translation: Oi, bai, kapela hau bai dela dotorea.

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Not like that shabby green hat at all!
Translation: Eta ez beste txano berde zatar hori!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: I'll let you have that one if<nl>ye uncover <b>1000<b> Buccanary Coins!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It's a <b>Great Soup Canteen<b>!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Wow!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: I trust you enjoyed it!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Hmmm, it's a scope!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It's for a weapon of some kind!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It be a fuzzy hoodie!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It'll keep yer little bird noggin warm!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It contains fire!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: Loads of fire!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: I'm not giving that away! No sir!
Translation: Hau ez dizut ba emango! Ez horixe!

Speaker: Buccanary
English: It's a secret!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus, I don't know if this is such a good idea!
Translation: Otus, ez dakit ideia ona ote den!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's dark in here, and even more damp<nl>and claustrophobic than the Owl Temple!
Translation: Ilunpean dago hau, eta Hontzaren Tenplua<nl>baino hezeagoa eta klaustrofobikoagoa da!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Geddy, where is your sense of adventure!?<nl>There is nothing to fear as long as<nl>we're together! Let's press onwards!
Translation: Geddy, non da zure abenturazaletasuna?<nl>Ez dago beldurrik elkarrekin bagaude!<nl>Goazen aurrera!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hmm, you might be right,<nl>but let's proceed with caution, alright?
Translation: Mmm, agian arrazoi duzu,<nl>baina goazen tentuz, ados?

Speaker: Twig
English: I think he's gone.

Speaker: Twig
English: We should probably go check it out.

Speaker: Twig
English: Grab on, man!

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Well, that takes care of that problem.

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: I guess <15>we're actually doing this, huh?

Speaker: TwigNPC
English: It's not like we have a choice.

Speaker: AlphonseNPC
English: Come on, gang! <15>Let us advance!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Hey, buddy, <15>you ready for this?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Hey, I've got your back, man.

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Who needs flying anyway!
Translation: Gainera, ez dugu hegan egin beharrik!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Let's go together!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: HEY! <30>Wait up!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Solus! <15>We just want to help you!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: The pirates are coming after you!

Speaker: Solus1
English: I know!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Then let us help!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Let's get rid of the relics, and..!

Speaker: Solus1
English: N-No!

Speaker: Solus1
English: I'm going to U<5>S<5>E<5> the relics!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Huh?

Speaker: Solus1
English: I don't have time to explain this to you!
Translation: Ez dut azalpenak ematen hasteko denborarik!

Speaker: Solus1
English: Just g-get out of here!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Hurry, guys! We need to talk some sense into Solus!
Translation: Bizkor, lagunok! Solus zentzarazten saiatu behar dugu!

Speaker: Solus
English: Huh!

Speaker: Solus
English: Otus, <30>Geddy..? <30>What are you guys doing here?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Solus?! <30>What are [1]YOU doing here?

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: Are you the one who stole<nl>the relics from the pirates?!
Translation: Zu al zara piratei erlikiak<nl>lapurtu dizkiena?!

Speaker: Solus
English: ...I'm sorry.

Speaker: Solus
English: I<20>-I trust you, Otus, <20>but I can't<nl>involve anyone else in this.
Translation: F-<20>fio naiz zutaz, Otus, <20>baina ezin dut<nl>beste inor honetan nahastu.

Speaker: Solus
English: ...I'm sorry, b-but I don't have time to explain.
Translation: ...Sentitzen dut, b-baina ez dut azaltzeko astirik.

Speaker: Solus
English: Please leave.

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: He-hey! Wait up!

Speaker: GeddyNPC
English: We have to catch up to him!

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Ah, I remember you.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: You were the one I defeated<nl>before I destroyed Advent.
Translation: Heu haiz Abendu suntsitu aurretik<nl>garaitu nian tipoa.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: I'm glad you put up<nl>a better fight this time.
Translation: Pozgarria duk ikustea oraingoan<nl>borrokarako hobeto trebatu haizela.

Speaker: Molstrom
English: Now... it's time for round two!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: YES! Amazing!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You saved our lives, Otus!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: That's my best buddy for ya!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Now, I think it's time we<nl>see what's inside this relic!
Translation: Eta orain, erlikia horren barruan<nl>zer dagoen ikusteko garaia da!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: You ready, Otus?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Oh...

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I think I might have been here before.
Translation: Uste dut lehenago ere izan naizela hemen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Could we.<20>.<20>. look around a bit, Master Otus?
Translation: Araka genezake.<20>.<20>. inguru hau une batez, Maisu Otus?

Speaker: Alphonse
English: If you don't mind.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Thanks!

Speaker: Narration
English: And the islands are still rising.

Speaker: Narration
English: You must have seen it outside.

Speaker: Narration
English: The world is ending. Time is running out.
Translation: Munduaren amaiera da. Denbora agortzen ari da.

Speaker: Narration
English: In a matter of days, we'll all have<nl>risen to cold, unbreathable space.
Translation: Egun gutxiren buruan, espazio<nl>hotz eta arnasezinera igoko gara.

Speaker: PenguinRoll
English: Alright! <30>Let's go!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Rejoice, friend!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We have come to free you!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Let's get her out of that cage.

Speaker: hero
English: Welcome to Tropos!<nl>Buccanary's Shop - Straight Up!
Translation: Ongi etorri Troposera!<nl>Buccanaryren denda - zuzen gora!

Speaker: hero
English: Gawk Cave this way.<nl>Closed off until further notice.

Speaker: hero
English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Tropos

Speaker: hero
English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Tropos

Speaker: hero
English: The door is locked.

Speaker: hero
English: This way: Path to Floating Continent

Speaker: hero
English: Higher: Vellie Plaza<nl>Lower: Otus's Residence

Speaker: hero
English: Up: Floating Continent<nl>Down: Vellie

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Hey, um...

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Thanks for helping me out.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I couldn't have faced my family<nl>without you, I don't think.
Translation: Ezingo nioke familiari aurre egin<nl>zuek gabe, ez dut uste.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: Let me know when you're ready to go.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I'll just stay here.

Speaker: Spiderguy
English: I don't like my family much.
Translation: Ez naiz familiarekin oso ondo moldatzen.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'm glad we made it back.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I'll hide before the villagers see me.
Translation: Ezkutatu egingo naiz, herritarrek ikusi baino lehen.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Where is everyone?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Otus! I'm glad you're awake.
Translation: Otus! Pozten nau zu esna ikusteak.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Are you OK?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...I'm sorry, I couldn't help you in Advent...
Translation: ...Sentitzen dut, Abendun ezin izan zintudan lagundu...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Molstrom is just too powerful.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I can't believe it's come to this...
Translation: Ezin dut sinetsi hau gertatu denik...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I haven't been able to protect anyone.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I have some more bad news.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: ...Asio seems to be taking it hard.
Translation: ...Badirudi Asiok oso gaizki hartu duela gertatutakoa.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He hasn't left the lookout point for a while.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I think you should<nl>probably talk to him.
Translation: Uste dut berekin<nl>hitz egin beharko zenukeela.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: He seems to need a friendly ear.
Translation: Entzungo duen lagun bat behar duela dirudi.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Didn't go well, huh?

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Man... Asio's just in a bad mood.
Translation: Motel... Asio umore txarrez dago, ez besterik.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I'm sure when he calms<nl>down he'll apologize.
Translation: Ziur nago lasaitzen denean<nl>barkamena eskatuko dizula.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Psst..!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Master Otus, Master Geddy!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Alphonse!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Sssssh!

Speaker: Alphonse
English: I must not be seen here,<nl>but we must talk.
Translation: Ezin naute hemen ikusi,<nl>baina hitz egin behar dugu.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: Come to Master Otus's house.

Speaker: Alphonse
English: We can talk there in private.
Translation: Han pribatuan hitz egin ahalko dugu.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Guess we should go hear<nl>what he has to say, Otus.
Translation: Uste dut esateko daukana entzutera<nl>joan beharko genukeela, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I want to speak to you about something.
Translation: Hirekin hitz egin beharra diat gauza bati buruz.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Which means...

Speaker: Mentor
English: [1]Get down here immediately!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: Hm, that's strange...

Speaker: Mechanic
English: It's all dark out here, but it's still morning.
Translation: Kanpoan erabat ilundu du, baina oraindik goiza da.

Speaker: Mechanic
English: I got a bad feeling about this.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I want to speak to you about something.
Translation: Hirekin hitz egin beharra diat gauza bati buruz.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Which means...

Speaker: Mentor
English: [1]Get up here immediately!

Speaker: Mechanic
English: There he is! Let's get him!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I don't know how I ended up here.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I should know better than to<nl>listen to the Professor's rants.
Translation: Jakin beharko nikek irakaslearen marmarrei<nl>ez zaiela kasurik egin behar.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The old coot drives me insane.
Translation: Agure zimur honek erotu egingo naik.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You shouldn't be here either.
Translation: Heu ere ez hintzake hemen egon beharko.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Get back to patrol duty!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Otus!

Speaker: Mentor
English: I told you to get back to patrolling!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Get moving!

Speaker: Mentor
English: Welcome, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I'm very glad to see you again.
Translation: Asko pozten nauk hi berriro ikusteaz.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You're probably wondering where you are.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You're not dreaming.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You're seeing visions of the past... and the future.
Translation: Irudipenak ikusten ari haiz. Iraganekoak... eta etorkizunekoak.

Speaker: Mentor
English: And from today.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You may not remember any of it, but it is real.
Translation: Agian ez haiz ezertaz oroituko, baina benetakoak dituk.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You grew up with good people, Otus.
Translation: Jende ona inguruan huela hazi hintzen, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Full of affection for you, and hopes for your future.
Translation: Asko maite hindutenez inguratuta, higan itxaropena jarritako jendeaz.

Speaker: Mentor
English: And regret for things said and done.
Translation: Esandakoaz eta egindakoaz damu garenok inguratuta.

Speaker: Mentor
English: These visions are our gift to you.
Translation: Irudipen hauek dituk gure oparia hiretzat.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The truth, I think, is often the greatest gift.
Translation: Egia, esango nikek, askotan oparirik onena izaten dela.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Especially since people are so prone to forgetting<nl>the things they should cherish most.
Translation: Batez ere jendeak joera duelako<nl>gehien maitatu behar duena ahazteko.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You must have many questions.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Come,<30> sit down.

Speaker: hero
English: <25>.<25>.<25>.<90>Is everyone<20> going to be okay?

Speaker: hero
English: Geddy, <20>Alphonse, <20>Twig, <40>and all the rest..?

Speaker: Mentor
English: Yes, Otus.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You succeeded out there.

Speaker: Mentor
English: The fact that you're here means that the Anti-Hex worked.
Translation: Hi hemen egoteak esan nahi dik Antikonjuruak funtzionatu duela.

Speaker: hero
English: What will happen now?

Speaker: Mentor
English: The islands will be sinking.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Your generation will know the surface,<20> as we did.
Translation: Hire belaunaldiak ere gainazala ezagutuko dik,<20> guk ezagutzen genuen bezala.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Thanks to you, the world will be whole once again.
Translation: Hiri esker, mundua bat izango duk berriro ere.

Speaker: Mentor
English: It will be difficult to adjust to life<nl>on the surface after all this time...
Translation: Hainbeste denbora igaro duk,<nl>zaila izango dela gainazaleko bizitzara ohitzea...

Speaker: Mentor
English: But it will be overcome.

Speaker: Mentor
English: I hope you don't blame us for what we've put you through.
Translation: Espero diat ez diguala pasarazi diagunagatik errua leporatuko.

Speaker: Mentor
English: We tried to change the universe, and we paid a price for that.
Translation: Unibertsoa aldatu nahi izan genian, eta baita larrutik ordaindu ere.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You paid that price too.

Speaker: Mentor
English: In order to end the Loop, we were willing to do anything.
Translation: Begizta amaitzearren edozer egiteko prest geundean.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Even risk our future.<30> Your present.
Translation: Baita geure etorkizuna arriskatu ere.<30> Hire oraina.

Speaker: hero
English: .<10>.<10>.<10>I'm not sure I understand.

Speaker: Mentor
English: It doesn't matter.

Speaker: Mentor
English: All you need to know is that we wanted<nl>to discover the nature of the Universe,<nl>and in doing so<20> we lost ourselves.
Translation: Jakin behar duan guztia duk<nl>unibertsoaren izaera deskubritu nahi genuela,<nl>eta hartara jartzean<20> geure buruak galdu genituela.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Maybe one day, in this life or the<nl>next, you will learn about the Loop.
Translation: Agian, egunen batean, bizialdi honetan<nl>edo hurrengoan, Begizta zer den ikasiko duk.

Speaker: Mentor
English: But there are far more rewarding things to<nl>learn about the universe than how it ends.
Translation: Baina badituk unibertsoari buruz ikasteko gai<nl>askoz interesgarriagoak, hura nola amaituko den jakitea baino.

Speaker: Mentor
English: You're probably worried that this is the end for you.
Translation: Agian arduratuta hago, hau hire amaiera delakoan.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Don't worry.

Speaker: Mentor
English: In this world we've created,<30><nl>there is always a second chance.
Translation: Sortu dugun mundu honetan,<30><nl>beti zagok bigarren aukera bat.

Speaker: Mentor
English: Our time is up.

Speaker: Mentor
English: And I know I'm not the only one, but...
Translation: Eta bazakiat ez naizela bakarra, baina...

Speaker: Mentor
English: I've always believed in you, Otus.

Speaker: menu?
English: Over here!!

Speaker: menu?

Speaker: menu?

Speaker: menu?
English: Asio has told you to patrol for pirates today.
Translation: Asiok pirata bila zaintzan egoteko esan dizu.

Speaker: menu?
English: The troublemaker went into this cave...

Speaker: menu?
English: Chase the troublemaker! He escaped downwards!
Translation: Joan bazter-nahaslearen atzetik! Beherantz joan da!

Speaker: menu?
English: You found something the Professor might be interested in.
Translation: Irakasleari interesatuko zaion zerbait aurkitu duzu.

Speaker: menu?
English: Find the Professor and Asio, and stay safe!
Translation: Bilatu irakaslea eta Asio, eta kontuz ibili!

Speaker: menu?
English: Are the other villagers OK?

Speaker: menu?
English: Go up and out of Vellie, and find the Owl temple.
Translation: Igo gorantz eta irten Vellietik, eta bilatu Hontzaren Tenplua.

Speaker: menu?
English: Find the Owl temple's control room and shut it down!
Translation: Bilatu Hontzaren Tenpluko kontrol-gela eta itzal ezazu!

Speaker: menu?
English: The control room is broken! Go upwards, warn Advent!
Translation: Kontrol-gela hautsia dago! Igo gorantz, jakinarazi Abendukoei!

Speaker: menu?
English: Blow the pirate dreadnought up from within!

Speaker: menu?
English: Alphonse wanted to talk at the house...
Translation: Alphonsek zurekin hitz egin nahi du etxean...

Speaker: menu?
English: Fly up above Tropos, towards the Floating Continent!
Translation: Egin hegan Tropos pasata, Kontinente Hegalarirantz!

Speaker: menu?
English: Get the final Relic!

Speaker: menu?
English: Twig just joined. Try to find a path back to Vellie.
Translation: Twig batu zaizue. Saiatu Vellierako bidea aurkitzen.

Speaker: menu?
English: There's a pirate base in Mesos! Warn Twig's family!
Translation: Piraten base bat dago Mesosen! Ohartarazi Twigen familia!

Speaker: menu?
English: You have to find the entrance to the pirate base, in Tropos.
Translation: Piraten basera sarrera aurkitu behar duzu, Troposen.

Speaker: menu?
English: Stop the pirates from using the Relics!

Speaker: menu?
English: The Relics are above Mesos. Ask around in Vellie.
Translation: Erlikiak Mesosetik gora daude. Galdetu Vellien.

Speaker: menu?
English: Kernelle has a way above Mesos.
Translation: Kernellek badaki nola igo Mesosetik gora.

Speaker: menu?
English: It's time to get the Relics back!
